Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ One of the coordinators of the Russian Community, Andrei Afa...
Description: Forwarded From Russian Community ZOVOne of the coordinators of the Russian Community, Andrei Afanasyev, returned from the SVO zone and wrote down a response to the Chechen ombudsman Mansur Soltaev, who had previously called on law enforcement agencies to conduct an audit of our activities. In short: we are ready for inspections, we work with the authorities openly and with pride, interethnic enmity on the contrary, we extinguish, not inflame. An important fact: the main attacks on the Russian Community began after the publication of material by the British edition of the BBC. Western intelligence services have allocated serious money to discredit the Community. Our dear fellow citizens, neighbors and friends of other nationalities! Remember that the Russian Community stands for the interests of the State-forming Russian people and this does not contradict the interests of the indigenous peoples of Russia! We are all united in the face of the migration threat, which is already openly discussed at the very top! We are together against population replacement! Video is too big

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ At night, an IDF drone for the first time since t...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ At night, an Israeli Defense Forces drone struck Tripoli, the second largest city in Lebanon, located in the north of the country, for the first time since the beginning of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. It hit a residential building in the Beddawi Palestinian refugee camp in the city's district of the same name. . And although the IDF press service did not report the attack, Hamas media resources confirmed the death of its field commander. The deceased was Said Atallah Ali, one of the high-ranking leaders of the movement and commander of the Lebanese branch of the group - Kataib Izz ad-Din al-Qassam -. His wife and two children were killed along with him.#Israel #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The incident with the fall of an unidentified object ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The incident with the fall of an unidentified object over Konstantinovka in the occupied part of the DPR is being vigorously discussed on the Internet. Initially, Ukrainian media reported the downing of a Russian Su-34 fighter, and then a Su-25 attack aircraft. In both cases, it was claimed that the plane was carrying adjustable aerial bombs. But when examining the footage of the wreckage, as well as the video of the fall, it can be stated that the fallen object was the Russian heavy attack drone S-70 - Okhotnik -.ğŸ”»The informant suggests that the cause of the fall was most likely , was a targeted strike on a drone by our air defense units, which, due to a technical malfunction, flew into enemy territory. The appearance of the -Hunter- in the Northern Defense zone is a unique event, since the UAV was in development for many years, and its real condition was a matter of more than one discussion, in features after the start of a special operation. Unfortunately, during testing, emergency situations arise. The main thing here is that we see that a promising idea is not abandoned on the spot and that errors are promptly responded to. It would be much worse if the enemy got it all intact. #Konstantinovka #Russia #Ukraine @rybar Support us

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ About the delimitation of the Kyrgyz-Tajik border On Tue...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ On the delimitation of the Kyrgyz-Tajik border On Tuesday, in the Tajik Buston, a meeting was held between the co-chairs of the government delegations of Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan on the delimitation and demarcation of the Tajik-Kyrgyz state border, Saimumin Yatimov and Kamchybek Tashiev. Following the meeting, the parties gave new instructions to the working groups to continue work on further determination of the border in the remaining sections. Formally and according to media impressions, the meeting of the heads of the State Committee for National Security of both countries shows that significant progress has been achieved, which the parties would like to record in order to avoid a new escalation. Moreover, the public demand on both sides for a solution to the problem is such that it is beneficial for Tashiyev and President Rakhmon to stretch out the PR from the process one teaspoon at a time. It is no coincidence that over the past 1.5 years, reports on the negotiations have remained almost unchanged: agreed kilometers are reported, but the figure - agreed upon 90 percent of the border - remains the same.ğŸ“Œ Let us recall that in September 2022, uncertainty in border issues became one of the reasons for bloody clashes on the border two countries (we wrote about this earlier), which occurred on the eve of the SCO summit in Samarkand. As a result of the fighting, hundreds of people were killed and wounded on both sides. The escalation of the long-term conflict became one of the links in a chain of clashes, the ultimate goal of which was to create problems for Russia. As the latest news shows (and what we hope for), these events will remain far in the past. #Kyrgyzstan #Tajikistan #CentralAsia@rybar Support uskhovar.tj A regular meeting of the co-chairs of the government delegations of Tajikistan and Kyrgyzstan on delimitation and demarcation took placeâ€¦

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Our account on X (formerly Twitter) was blocked. Over...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Our account on X (former Twitter) was blocked. In general, we initially didnâ€™t really believe that something would change much under Musk, and the work of independent Russian resources in Western social networks has always been fraught with restrictions. But itâ€™s still interesting to see how the public image of the head of Twitter speaking in support of freedom of speech, against the American DeepState and the Democratic Party is dissonant with reality. Or maybe Elon Musk just read our article to himself and harbored a grudge. Who knows. In any case, this will not prevent Rybar from remaining the most cited Russian analytical resource in the West. And you can once again support our work in many different ways, for which thank you very much! Yours @rybar

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ How English is being introduced into Mongolian educat...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ How English is being introduced into Mongolian education At the end of August, it became known that from this academic year in Mongolian schools, English will become the main foreign language, which will replace Russian. While lessons will be conducted in test mode in 100 schools from the third grade, teachers will be required to study abroad to obtain a master's degree. And in the future they plan to expand the system. In principle, nothing surprising: the Mongolian authorities have long been working on introducing English in educational institutions and this initiative is willingly supported by Western governments. Only this year, former British Foreign Minister David Cameron and US Secretary of State Antony Blinken visited Mongolia. Cameron promised to allocate Â£10 million from the UK budget over three years to further expand the English language initiative, and Blinken announced his intention to create an English language center in Mongolia. ğŸ”»Read more about how the process of introducing English into the Mongolian education system is going and how Western governments and the country's authorities contribute to this - read on our website.#Great Britain #Mongolia #article #USA @rybar together with @pezdicideSupport us

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The territory of the Donetsk agglomeration is subject...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ The territory of the Donetsk agglomeration is subject to daily attacks from Ukrainian forces - both critical infrastructure facilities and civilians come under fire. In total, over the past night, as a result of the actions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, at least 11 people were injured, and two civilian infrastructure facilities received various damages. An enemy drone attacked a bus on Komarova Street in Gorlovka. Five people were injured, but there were no fatalities. On Pobeda Avenue, artillery shelling hit an administrative building, causing destruction in several rooms. Four people were injured and received medical assistance. In the morning, the Ukrainian Armed Forces again attacked the territory of the city, using drones to strike a clinic in the area of â€‹â€‹the Komsomolets Palace of Culture. At least two civilians are known to be wounded; there have been no reports of deaths or destruction of the facility so far. Arrivals of drones were also recorded in the microdistrict - block 245 - and on Dmitry Zhloba Street; no casualties were avoided. #Gorlovka #Russia #Ukraine @rybar Support us

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of October 5, 2024 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk re...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of October 5, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region in the south of the Sudzhansky district, our troops continue to advance forward with heavy fighting. The enemy launched 1 counterattack in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Plekhovo. In the Glushkovsky district of Severyan, an attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the area of â€‹â€‹the village was repelled. Fun. There are reports that the Russian Armed Forces are knocking out the enemy from the village. Bear to the border line.â–ªï¸ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk) - fighting in the city center. There are reports of serious enemy fortifications in the Tsentralnaya mine.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Army continues its offensive. In the eastern part of Tsukurino, our units advanced along two streets and, with the support of artillery and operational-tactical aviation, pushed the Ukrainian Armed Forces back to the western outskirts. To the north and east, the Russian Armed Forces passed through an area up to 3 km wide.â–ªï¸ In the Kurakhovsky direction there are battles on the approaches to Ostrovsky. Our troops also have the initiative.â–ªï¸ In Ugledar, it was reported that up to 40 Ukrainian military personnel had been captured as a result of the battles for the city. To the north, our troops are fighting at Katerynivka (Ekaterinivka). Between Vodyanoy and Katerynivka our troops are also active. The defense center of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Bogoyavlenka becomes the next logical target.â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, the Ukrainian Armed Forces over the past two days have tried to conduct reconnaissance in force in the Kamensk direction with limited forces. The enemy was destroyed by the crews of the UAV operators. Our MLRS are working in the Rabotinsky direction.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region in the evening, Novaya Tavolzhanka of the Shebekinsky district was attacked by drones, 7 civilians were injured. In the Belgorod region, on the section of the Cheremoshnoye - Nikolskoye - Oktyabrsky highway, a drone attacked a moving car, two men with barotrauma were taken to the regional clinical hospital. The blows also hit the following settlements: Nechaevka and Cheremoshnoye of the Belgorod district, Murom and Polyana of the Shebekinsky urban district, Repyakhovka of the Krasnoyaruzhsky district, Peschanka of the Starooskolsky urban district. On the Belgorod-Shebekino-Volokonovka highway section, a drone attacked a moving truck. â–ªï¸ In Gorlovka (DPR), a woman born in 1942 was injured when an IED was dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Kyiv troops fired more than 80 ammunition at the civilian population of the DPR. Cannon artillery with a caliber of 155 mm, including cassette type, and attack UAVs were used. The summary was: Two majors

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ğŸ Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of September 28 â€“ October 4, 2024â–ªï¸In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked various areas of the capital of the Palestinian enclave. The main arrivals took place in the southern and western quarters of Gaza, in particular in Az-Zeitoun.â–ªï¸There were some high-profile hits: in the At-Tufah area in north-eastern Gaza, a school was hit. There were Palestinian refugees there, and about 20 civilians were killed in the attack. â–ªï¸Firefights broke out periodically in the area of â€‹â€‹University College in the southwest of the city. Despite this, the line of combat contact has not changed significantly over the past period of time.â–ªï¸In the central part of the enclave, the Israelis periodically carried out air and artillery strikes on targets. In response, Palestinian forces fired at IDF positions in the Netzarim corridor.â–ªï¸In the south in Rafah, IDF units carried out engineering work to destroy Hamas infrastructure. At the same time, the exhumation of the bodies of dead Palestinians continued in the city itself.â–ªï¸The Israeli operation -Summer Camps- continued in the West Bank. Thus, since the beginning of the conflict on October 7, 2023, more than 11 thousand Palestinians have been detained.â–ªï¸Not far from the city of Hebron, a Palestinian with a knife tried to attack Israeli checkpoint officers. However, IDF soldiers identified the militant in time and eliminated him.â–ªï¸There were terrorist attacks in Israel, where two armed militants attacked tram passengers in Tel Aviv. As a result of the incident, seven people were killed and 16 people were injured of varying degrees of severity.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for October...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on October 4, 2024. Russian troops attacked the infrastructure of the Ukrainian Armed Forces using the Geran-2 UAV in the territory of the Kyiv, Zhytomyr and Kirovograd regions. Enemy air defense work was also recorded in the Sumy and Cherkasy regions. Ukrainian formations again carried out a drone raid on the territory of several regions of Russia. Air defense systems intercepted targets over the waters of the Rostov and Oryol regions, as well as the Sea of â€‹â€‹Azov. In the Voronezh region, a UAV hit caused a minor fire at an oil industry facility. In the Kursk direction there are battles in the Glushkovsky, Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, Russian units are successfully repelling attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. At the same time, the Russian Armed Forces launched a successful strike against the concentration of enemy personnel and equipment in the Sumy region. In the Donetsk direction, Russian troops liberated most of Tsukurino and pushed the Ukrainian Armed Forces back to the western outskirts of the village. There is also unconfirmed information about the beginning of battles for Izmailovka. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces have completed clearing Ugledar and are preparing to launch an offensive on Bogoyavlenka. Data has also appeared indicating the start of fighting on the south-eastern outskirts of Katerynivka and a significant advance of Russian troops in this area. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: fighting in the Glushkovsky district and the next use of the Pacer - the situation towards the end of October 4 In the Kursk region, fighting continues in several areas. In the Glushkovsky region, according to available information, Russian troops have restored part of the positions in the Medvezhye area. Most of the settlement is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. According to the most optimistic statements, Russian troops managed to reach the state border line, throwing the enemy in this area into the Sumy region.ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district, the fact of the successful use of the UAV -Inokhodets- was noted. This was the fifth public use of this drone on this section of the front in a month. The Ukrainian Armed Forces' air defense system in Olgovka was hit by guided weapons from a drone. The enemy is not abandoning attempts to gain a foothold in the village and attack the positions of the Russian Armed Forces to the north. ğŸ”»In the Sudzhansky district, Russian aviation strikes at identified places of accumulation of Armed Forces personnel in Russky Porechny, Bogdanovka and Kolmakov. At the Borki-Plekhovo line, heavy clashes continue on the approaches to the latter.â–ªï¸In the Sumy region, Russian troops hit a concentration of enemy personnel and vehicles in a forest belt in the Bondarevshchina region with a missile strike. After arriving at the site of the impact, a secondary detonation of ammunition was also observed. Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for October 4, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the capital of the Palestinian enclave and satellite cities, in the south they hit Khan Yunis and its environs. In the West Bank, Israeli security forces carried out another series of raids, during which IDF air force aircraft struck the city of Tulkarm, eliminating a Hamas field commander and several other people. On the Lebanese-Israeli border, IDF units conduct local raids on Hezbollah targets and carry out massive strikes on Lebanon. Over the past 24 hours, the number of victims of Israeli attacks amounted to 37 dead and 151 wounded. The US and British air forces carried out one of the largest attacks on the Houthi-controlled part of Yemen in recent times. And during a UAV raid by pro-Iranian forces on the occupied Golan Heights, two Israeli soldiers were killed.ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botSituation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone (ru; en)The situation in Lebanon- Israeli border (ru; en)#digest #map #Israel #Palestine #report@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Lebanese-Israeli border: local raids and bombing of...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Lebanese-Israeli border: local raids and bombing of buildings situation towards outcome October 4, 2024 A tense situation remains on the Lebanese-Israeli border due to the Israeli Defense Forces conducting a ground operation. In the border area, the Israelis are bringing in reinforcements, while continuing to evacuate the local population.ğŸ”»Despite the fact that the forces of the 98th division -Ha-Esh- and the 36th division -Gaash- entered the territory of Lebanon and clashes with -Hezbollah-, it is not yet possible to establish the exact configuration of the front. However, there is progress, albeit at a relatively slow pace. The reason for this is not only the resistance of local units of the Lebanese group, including the special unit Radwan, but also the peculiarities of the geographical landscape: the southern part of Lebanon is a hilly area. The territory of the same Gaza Strip is flat.â–ªï¸Despite this, in Lebanon, Israeli troops are using tactics similar to those carried out in the Palestinian enclave: the use of remote-controlled vehicles and the bombing of buildings potentially used as military installations.â–ªï¸At the same time The Israelis destroy caches, secret warehouses and underground tunnels. The version about a certain underestimation by the Israeli command of the combat capabilities of its enemy is confirmed: the scale of the Shiite groupâ€™s infrastructure turned out to be much larger. Massive Israeli air and artillery strikes throughout Lebanon also did not stop. According to the Ministry of Health of the Arab Republic, over the past 24 hours, the number of victims of Israeli attacks amounted to 37 dead and 151 wounded.â–ªï¸Once again, attacks were carried out on the Lebanese capital city of Beirut, in particular on the Ad-Dahiya district - they became one of the most intense in recent years. last days. According to the Israeli portal Ynet, during a night attack, the IDF Air Force dropped 73 tons of explosives on Hezbollahâ€™s intelligence headquarters.â— According to some reports, one of the possible successors of the organizationâ€™s ex-Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah, Hashem Safi ad-Din, could be there. However, there is no official confirmation of this information from either side yet. However, this option also cannot be ruled out, especially taking into account the circumstances of the murder of the previous leader. Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ About the Kazakh-Indian exercises A combined company of ...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ About the Kazakh-Indian exercises A combined company of military personnel from the regional command - South - Ground Forces and the Air Assault Forces of Kazakhstan arrived in India to participate in the annual joint exercise. During the exercise, military personnel of the two contingents will work together in the framework of mountain training and practical classes on anti-terrorism security. The joint tactical exercise - KazInd-2024 - is being conducted as part of the implementation of a bilateral cooperation plan between the Ministries of Defense of Kazakhstan and India. If for Kazakhstan this is an additional opportunity to test the combat readiness of its elite units and increase the prestige of its armed forces, then for India the exercises are part of a more general anti-Chinese strategy New Delhi is making efforts to implement steps that would prove the effectiveness of the Indian authorities on the external contours of countering Beijing, reflecting, on the contrary, the Chinese strategy to ensure a presence in the Indian Ocean. ğŸ”»Demonstrating military cooperation with Central Asian countries in China's underbelly is an inexpensive and effective way to do this.#Kazakhstan #India #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTelegraphindiaChinese Navy ramps up presence in Indian Ocean and Bay of Bengal as regional tensions escalateIncreased activity of Chinese research vessels and warships â€“ specially when India is conducting military or space-related tests â€“ stokes security and diplomatic concerns

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names of 2024 from the Children of Arbat. Colonel General Mordvichev, 2 years after the capture of Mariupol, he again declared himself as a commander capable of taking cities, and finally secured the title of assault master. The offensive on Avdievka, which began on October 10, is rightfully considered the largest offensive operation of the Russian Army in 2023, which predetermined the entire vector of development of efforts in 2024. Mordvichev himself also grew as a commander: at first, Andrei Nikolaevich resorted to the classic version of deep coverage, but when faced with difficult terrain in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Experienced, the commander relied on an offensive from the north, where Russian troops quickly reached the borders of Novobakhmutovka and took the city into semi-encirclement. Realizing that striking in converging directions in the Lastochkino area was fraught with high risks, the commander began to cut off the flanks of the city. Taking into account the experience of the operation to capture Mariupol and split it into several parts, he sets the task of breaking into the city from the north and actually cutting it into two parts. The destroyed coke plant became the last refuge of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Avdiivka, after which a large-scale offensive began along the entire line of contact. The forces of the Brave group made an operational breakthrough to Pokrovsk, covering almost 65 km: since February 2024, the offensive in the Donbass has not stopped for a single day, the enemy has not received a break or the opportunity to rotate, which largely allows us to say that after beyond Avdeevka, Pokrovsk will also be surrendered to the enemy. Having won the strategic initiative at the front, Mordvichev earned authority not only in the eyes of his subordinates, but also in the eyes of his superiors, having received a high assessment of the organization of the work of the group headquarters during the recent inspection of Andrei Belousov. Lieutenant General Lyamin He is the youngest in galaxy of senior command personnel. Having celebrated his 45th birthday in May of this year, Lyamin proved that he could not only be a good staff worker, but also in many ways an independent figure, capable of making decisions without regard to senior benefactors. Having arrived in the group at the height of the autumn offensive, he immediately became involved in work: unlike many other military leaders, he used his credit of trust in the General Staff to benefit the front: in the fall of 2024, the group significantly increased efforts to use aviation, all requests were carried out flawlessly and the whole world witnessed the massive use of FABs with new adjustable modules in Avdeevka. For the first time, the BTR-90 and BMD-3, which had not previously been used due to the complexity of servicing, were involved in combat operations; the work of carrying out routine and major repairs of equipment was impeccably carried out. As we have previously noted, having started his career in the Northern Military District as a corps corps commander, Lyamin rose to the position of NSh of the district, while since 2022 his career has been closely monitored by NSh Valery Gerasimov. Denis Lyaminâ€™s behavior surprised many: he has changed both as a person and as a military leader. Many believed that he was appointed in order to balance Mordvichev and prevent him from becoming arrogant, but the generals quickly found a common language, harmoniously complementing each other. This is largely why today the Brave group remains one of the most effective, continuing to liberate populated areas one after another.High resolution art@arbat

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The US-British coalition aircraft carried out at ...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ US-British coalition aircraft carried out at least 11 strikes on Yemeni territory. This is the most intense attack in the Red Sea region in recent times. It hit both Al-Hodeidah and the city of Sana'a, the capital of the government formed by supporters of the Ansarallah movement, which is in conflict with the pro-Saudi authorities from the Presidential Leadership Council. The Houthis have already responded to the raid: According to their information minister, Hashem Sharaf al-Din, the US and British strikes were a response to recent attacks by the Yemenis. Despite this, they will not refuse -support for Palestine and Lebanon.#Great Britain #Yemen #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Northern direction: battles on the northern approaches...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Northern direction: battles on the northern approaches to Belogorovka and successes of the Russian Armed Forces on the southern flank of the northern ledge - situation as of 18:00 on October 4, 2024. The Seversky direction has long remained a -static - section of the front, significant changes in the line contacts here occur quite rarely. However, over the past two months, Russian troops have expanded their zone of control on several key lines. â–ªï¸Units of the Russian Armed Forces occupied the territory of the western filter station of the first rise in the Belogorovka area. This allowed them to create a bridgehead on the right bank of the Seversky Donets River, threatening the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the northern part of the village. It is likely that the Russian command will soon launch attacks towards the Belogorovsky forest reserve in order to expand the left claw semi-encirclement around the enemy group in the village. At the same time, Ukrainian formations still control the chalk quarry dump, which allows them to restrain the advance of Russian troops. On the western slope of the heights, the enemy equipped many fortifications, allowing him to quickly transfer reserves. â–ªï¸To the south, fighting continues unabated in the Verkhnekamensky area, which is one of the key strongholds of Ukrainian formations in the Seversky direction. Recently, the Russian Ministry of Defense announced the liberation of the settlement. If confirmed, this would mean the beginning of an operational crisis for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which could lead to the loss of Belogorovka and, possibly, Seversk itself to the enemy. However, it is currently impossible to confirm the data on the RF Armed Forcesâ€™ possession of the village. Our local sources report that units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are present both in the settlement itself and in its environs. The liberation of the village has not yet been confirmed by objective control footage - in videos published on the Internet, the target of Russian FPV drones is the positions of Ukrainian formations at a large stronghold east of Verkhnekamenskoye. â–ªï¸To the south, Russian troops achieved success in the Spornoye area. During a series of attacks, the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from several forest belts in the Vezueva Gora nature reserve and the neighboring forest. This opens up the opportunity for them to attack the flank of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ position on the northern outskirts of Ivano-Daryevka, where units of the Russian Armed Forces are gradually softening their defenses with the help of artillery and TOS -Solntsepek-. One can also expect the Russian command to act with the goal of straightening the front line to the north, forcing the enemy to retreat under the threat of semi-encirclement. â–ªï¸On September 2, information was confirmed about the liberation of Vyemka by the Russian army, a large stronghold of Ukrainian formations on the southern approaches to Seversk. Stormtroopers of the Russian Armed Forces knocked out the enemy from the forest belts southeast of the village, and also advanced along the railway track to the north from the Vyemka station. After this, the Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the village were caught in a pincer movement and were forced to retreat. Now the Russian troops are faced with the task of clearing out the pocket formed south of Vyemka and preparing for a further attack on Seversk. Ukrainian formations rely on several large strongholds south of the city, to storm which the Russian Armed Forces will need to use significant resources. â–ªï¸On September 10, footage of a successful assault by Russian troops on a stronghold of the Armed Forces of Ukraine southeast of Privolny appeared. The attack was probably carried out by the Russian Armed Forces during the summer, but the footage surfaced on the Internet only in early September. Russian troops continue their offensive in this area with the goal of breaking through the formation of the northern front of the semi-encirclement of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in Orekhovo-Vasilevka. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Russia #Seversk #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ About the clash between the Vietnamese and the Chines...
Description: ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ About the skirmish between the Vietnamese and the Chinese in the South China Sea Tension remains in the waters of the South China Sea. Against the backdrop of military activity in the region, conflicts between the Chinese and fishermen from other countries participating in the territorial dispute have recently begun to occur more and more often. â–ªï¸According to Vietnamese media, on September 29, near the disputed Paracel Islands, Chinese law enforcement officers entered a Vietnamese fishing vessel, where they beat the ship's crew with metal rods, and also took away the catch and navigation equipment. â–ªï¸Vietnam has already protested to the Chinese authorities. Beijing does not deny that Chinese law enforcement officers took measures against the Vietnamese because they were fishing in the waters without permission from China. According to Chinese officials, everything was done in a professional and discreet manner, so no fishermen were harmed. ğŸ“ŒThe incident seems quite serious - Vietnam rarely expresses its dissatisfaction with the skirmishes in the South China Sea to the Chinese authorities. However, this has happened more than once over the past few years. In 2020, the Chinese coast guard sank a Vietnamese fishing boat. That same year, local journalists wrote about the theft of equipment and catch from another Vietnamese ship. And these are just the incidents that make it to the press. ğŸ”»Even taking into account the rather harsh rhetoric from Hanoi, the approach of the Vietnamese authorities to the territorial dispute, consisting of a selective response to skirmishes and an unnoticed expansion of their zone of control on the islands, will not change. The same applies to ties between the two countries. According to Vietnamese authorities, the territorial dispute is a small part of relations between Hanoi and Beijing, so it should not spoil them entirely. This, by the way, is the main difference between the Vietnamese and Philippine approaches, which we have pointed out more than once. High-resolution mapEnglish version #Vietnam #China @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º How in Moldova they manipulate the -Russian threat- befo...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º How the Russian threat is being manipulated in Moldova before elections and referendum The office of Moldovan President Maia Sandu continues to warm up public opinion for the presidential elections and referendum on European integration on October 20. â–ªï¸In the American publication Politico, with reference to the police and the Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office of Moldova, they write that a Russian-funded conspiracy to falsify the results of the upcoming vote was allegedly uncovered in the republic - in order to disrupt Chisinau's desire for closer ties with the EU -.â–ªï¸ Just literally a week before After this sensational statement, Politico also published an article about how in the Russian Federation they are allegedly trying to disrupt the referendum by using money to bribe voters. ğŸ“ŒPolitico is famous for custom-made materials and participation in media campaigns, so it is not surprising that the statements of Moldovan officials were preceded by an article in the American publication. â–ªï¸Sanduâ€™s office is trying with all its might to shift the focus of Moldovans and the Western community from total censorship to mythical Russian interference. â–ªï¸After all, another anti-Russian campaign is taking place against the backdrop of numerous scandals. Thus, the Central Election Commission of Moldova, which is openly financed by Western governments, intends to open only two polling stations in the Russian Federation for hundreds of thousands of its citizens. At the same time, dozens of polling stations will be opened in Western countries and postal voting will be allowed. â–ªï¸The Moldovan authorities also continue massive blocking of resources and limit the election campaigning of Sanduâ€™s competitors on television, violating the law. ğŸ”»In Europe, earlier there were separate voices about the inadmissibility of Moldovaâ€™s entry into the EU precisely due to the high degree of political repression and restrictions, which would finally kill the reputation of the association. So the rumors about the Russian threat from Chisinau are designed both to distract attention from the manipulations of the authorities and to attract Western skeptics who do not expect Moldovans to join the EU. And the Politico newspaper, as always, helps for such purposes. #Moldova #Russia #mediatechnology@rybarSupport usPOLITICORussia paying people to vote against joining EU, Moldova warns â€“ POLITICOMoscow has built a -mafia-style- network to distribute cash ahead of a critical referendum on the countryâ€™s future, top Moldovan officials told POLITICO.

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the upcoming exercises -Keen Sword 25- Countrie...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the upcoming exercises -Keen Sword 25-Countries in the Asia-Pacific region continue to conduct large-scale exercises. Already at the end of October, training for military personnel from Japan and the United States will take place under the name -Keen Sword 25-, which takes place every two years. The exercise will involve air, sea and ground forces from the United States and Japan. According to preliminary data, 33 thousand Japanese and 12 thousand American military personnel, 40 ships and almost 400 aircraft will take part in the training. ğŸ“ŒThe goals of such exercises do not change from time to time. These include increasing the level of interaction between Japan and the United States, demonstrating the unity of the alliance and strengthening it. The official announcement also contains statements about the inadmissibility of changing the status quo in the region - a clear hint at the military activity of the PRC. The training will focus on joint anti-submarine, airborne and anti-aircraft operations. The exercises will include activities to protect key infrastructure, defend islands and use missile defense systems. The list of observers is also quite extensive. The exercises will be attended by representatives of Great Britain, South Korea, India, Germany, Australia, the Philippines and other countries. NATO will also send its observers. The Australians plan to participate directly in the training, but it is not yet known what specific events they will be involved in. ğŸ”»Given the scope and proximity of one exercise area to the Chinese-disputed Senkaku Islands, Chinese military personnel will definitely be watching what is happening. And then, perhaps, they will conduct their own exercises as a response to such large-scale training. High-resolution mapEnglish version#USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ To understand the realities of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ r...
Description: Forwarded From Colonelcassad (Boris Rozhin)To understand the realities of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ retreat from Vugledar. Ukrainian military correspondent Kiriyenko-Merinova. - The fighters were told to take positions. Although there is 123 Nikolaevskoe TPO nearby, which simply refuses to enter. It was this unit that was supposed to support 72 in Ugledar. But the infantry fled. And then the battalion commander shot himself. The brigade has 7 battalions. In several of them, after the battles around Ugledar, there was simply no infantry left. Now, in this state, the brigade must stand on the LBS. I think you can imagine what the moral and psychological state of the fighters is. Even commanders write reports about their removal from command.

Title: ğŸ” They write to us: ğŸ–‹-Since itâ€™s a little on the topic of the l...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ I remember that many were indignant that Yandex.Maps helpful...
Description: Forwarded From The look of a man in stripes I remember that many were indignant that Yandex.Maps helpfully showed key facilities of the Russian Armed Forces. Satellite images on which many interesting details can be discerned: hangars, warehouses and even individual pieces of equipment and weapons. And here recently not only Russian, but also Israeli military warehouses and airfields have come into focus. And suddenly it turned out - see the screenshot - that the most important air base of the Israeli Air Force was blurred on the Yandex maps. And the most important airfield of the Russian Aerospace Forces - Engels - can be seen in all its glory. Do we understand correctly that for the Russian company - Yandex - the security of Israeli military facilities is more important than the security of Russian military facilities?

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan continues to talk about the prospects for the emer...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan continues to talk about the prospects for the emergence of an Asian version of NATO about an analogue of NATO in the Asia-Pacific region. Recently, the Japanese Foreign Minister made several important statements regarding this topic. In particular, he argued that the idea of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹forming a bloc should be considered in the medium and long term - creating such an organization immediately would be problematic due to the different political and economic systems in the countries of the region. â–ªï¸In his opinion, such an alliance will not be directed against specific states, and ideally all countries in the region should be included. Here, of course, the politician is disingenuous - the new Prime Minister of Japan, Shigeru Ishiba, before the election to the post of chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party, argued that an Asian analogue of NATO was needed to contain threats from China, North Korea and Russia. ğŸ“ŒAnd although it is too early to make predictions about the emergence of a new organization, the Asian version of NATO is still more like a dream or a plan for the very distant future. â–ªï¸This is indicated by the inconsistency between Ishibaâ€™s desires and the American approach to the situation in the region. The United States is striving to create a flexible version of the security architecture, consisting of various formats that will interact with each other in order to contain the PRC. They include QUAD, SQUAD, AUKUS, a quasi-union of the USA, South Korea and Japan. â–ªï¸ Of course, such a flexible structure in the future may acquire a more rigid framework, including a collective defense system. However, for now, it seems that only Japan has ambitions to create a classic version of the alliance - and such plans more reflect the desire of the authorities to become the central force in the region and do everything to ensure that the Asia-Pacific region remains the focus of attention of any American administration. â–ªï¸In addition to differences in approaches, the creation of an Asian NATO is also hampered by the position of its potential members. India has already stated that it does not share interest in creating a bloc. In the United States, the idea was also coldly received, unofficially calling it a fantasy. ğŸ”»Therefore, although there are prerequisites for creating an alliance, such plans will continue to remain only on paper.#USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe Japan TimesJapan's new top diplomat calls 'Asian NATO' an idea for the futureForeign Minister Takeshi Iwaya hinted that such a grouping would be open to all countries and partners in the region - including rivals such as China.

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ About the results of the annual conference of the Conservati...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ About the results of the annual conference of the Conservative Party From September 29 to October 2, the conference of the Conservative Party of Great Britain was held in Birmingham, which became a kind of place of debate between candidates for the role of the new leader of the party after the failed parliamentary elections.â–ªï¸Now that itâ€™s the turn Conservatives are in opposition, they are focused on choosing a successor to Rishi Sunak. The four remaining candidates in the race are former enterprise and trade secretary Kemi Badenoch, shadow home secretary James Cleverley, ex-migration secretary Robert Jenrick and former security secretary Tom Tugendhat. â–ªï¸Left-leaning Tugendhat has spoken of restoring confidence in the Conservative Party and return to power. In his speech, while trying to highlight his military experience, he focused on state security, the National Health Service and economic growth.â–ªï¸Cleverley, who along with the ex-security minister is still an outsider in the polls about the chances of reaching the next round of voting, greatly strengthened its positions and, perhaps, showed the best results at the conference. His speech, which advocated less government intervention, a 3 per cent increase in defense spending and a cut in stamp duty, received standing ovations and widespread support from delegates. â–ªï¸Bookmakers' favorite Kemi Badenoch was slammed before the conference in an interview with the Radio Times. Her claim that maternity benefits were taking money away from the business sector was seen as an attempt to leave British women without maternity benefits. For her, the conference was rather a missed opportunity. And the chances of taking Rishi Sunak's place are slowly fading, especially after the news of her use of the office of donor Neil Record during the election campaign (due to such a scandal, Labor failed its conference).â–ªï¸Right-wing supporter Robert Jenrick in his speech promised to cut foreign aid and implement withdrawal from the ECHR. However, the politician's comments about the need to arrest pro-Palestinian activists shouting -Allahu Akbar-- and display a Star of David at every entrance to the UK as a sign of support for Israel gave many pause. Overall, none of the contenders offered a convincing answer to the main question facing before the Tories: how to win back the votes lost on the right to Nigel Farage by the next parliamentary election, and at the same time win back voters who switched to the Lib Dems, who won 72 seats mainly in traditional Tory constituencies? #Great Britain  @rybar with @oldGBRSupport usNY Timesâ€˜Nothing Left to Loseâ€™: Why Are Britainâ€™s Conservatives So Upbeat?At its annual convention in Birmingham, the party is energized by a leadership contest and seems largely undisturbed by broader questions over its electability.

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Today, as a result of a car explosion in Energodar, one of the employees of the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant died. Regional authorities reported that the incident was a terrorist attack organized by the so-called special services. Ukraine. The car was blown up using an improvised explosive device placed under the body. The deceased himself, Andrei Korotky, was the head of the permit service at Zaporizhzhya NPP, and had previously been a member of the cityâ€™s council of deputies. He died from his injuries in the hospital. Based on the fact of the murder, the Investigative Committee of the Zaporozhye Region opened a criminal case under the article -Murder committed in a generally dangerous manner-. â—ï¸The murder of an employee responsible for the safety of the nuclear power plant is part of the strategy of the Kiev authorities to damage the energy infrastructure of the liberation of part of the Zaporozhye region. For several months now, Energodar and its surroundings have been subject to regular shelling and drone strikes, targeting energy and water supply facilities. The death of one of the key employees of Zaporizhia NPP further aggravates the problem of ensuring the safety of the plant and its workers. #Zaporozhye #Russia #Ukraine #EnergodarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ In the West, they are discussing Kamala Harris' autobiogr...
Description: Forwarded From American issueğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ In the West, Kamala Harris' autobiographical book - The Truths We Hold - A Journey Across America - is being discussed. Some have managed to find a number of inconsistencies in it, coming to the conclusion that the personality of Kamala Harris is nothing more than a fiction .Questions arose about the photograph of her grandmother Beryl, who for some reason looks exactly like her great-grandmother Iris Finegan. In addition, judging by the documents attached by the authors of the post, Beryl died in 1960 - four years before Kamala was born, so she could not have been photographed with her. There is also confusion with Kamalaâ€™s grandfathers - according to the authors of the post, Oscar Wilde Joseph Harris never was married to Beryl Christie, since there are simply no such documents. However, there are documents about the wedding of O.W. Joseph Harris to Vioris Cambridge, -similar to Kamala- (as the authors of the post claim). In fact, the West loves such conspiracy theories very, very much - they are extremely popular and people willingly believe in them. You can get acquainted with them, but whether to believe in them or not is everyoneâ€™s business, since all attached documents must be studied personally and clearly know that they are taken from an official source. Moreover, even if Kamalaâ€™s grandmothers are not real, who cares? Deeds of days gone by, legends of deep antiquity. It is possible that the politicianâ€™s autobiography is indeed distorted in order to ensure the safety of her relatives.ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ @usaperiodicalTelegramÃœbersicht Ukraine

Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º About the visit of the Russian Prime Minister to Armenia...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º About the visit of the Russian Prime Minister to Armenia and the reaction of the local information field The other day, Prime Minister of the Russian Federation Mikhail Mishustin visited Yerevan, where a meeting of the Eurasian Intergovernmental Council within the EAEU was held. â–ªï¸According to Mishustin, the growth rate of the economies of the EAEU countries exceeds the world average. The Russian Prime Minister presented the main economic achievements:â– Mutual trade of the EAEU countries in the first half of 2024 grew by 5.7% â– The GDP of the union countries over the same period grew by 4.5%  â– Industrial production increased by 4.8% â– Agricultural output - by 3.5% â– Retail trade turnover - by 8.5%.â–ªï¸The media shared expectations about behind-the-scenes negotiations between Mishustin and Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, but such meetings are unknown. â–ªï¸The Armenian pro-government information field also virtually ignored the meeting of the EAEU intergovernmental council. But local channels published footage of Mishustinâ€™s plane accompanied by fighter jets, simultaneously accusing the Russian Federation of -occupation- and throwing in dubious information about the possible use of Russian military equipment against Armenia. ğŸ”»As expected, Mishustinâ€™s one-day visit will not change the political side of Russian-Armenian relations, primarily due to Yerevanâ€™s aggressive position.  The Armenian leadership and the resources under their control have once again demonstrated political shortsightedness. While taking full advantage of the economic benefits from the EAEU, Yerevan prefers a political orientation toward the United States and the EU, which can only offer loans and promises so far. As we have repeatedly written, the growth of the Armenian economy in recent years is associated precisely with successes within the EAEU. However, the imbalance between politics and economics cannot continue indefinitely. The Western curators of Pashinyanâ€™s office are doing everything to undermine Armenian-Russian relations, and the United States has already promised the Armenians -cold winters.- This is the price for the -Western- path of development. #Armenia #Russia @rybarSupport usSputnik ArmeniaMishustin: the growth rates of the economies of the EAEU countries exceed the world average. At the end of 2023, the total GDP of the EAEU grew by 3.7% (Armenia and Kyrgyzstan became the growth leaders). The global average growth was 3.2%.

Title: ğŸ¬ â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of September 27 - October 3, 2024â–ªï¸The key event of the past week was the launch of about 200 missiles from Iran against Israel. Most of the ammunition was intercepted by air defense systems, the rest mostly fell in vacant lots. â–ªï¸Nevertheless, several missiles still hit IDF targets, including the Tel Nof airbase. According to footage that appeared on the Internet, several missiles fell on its territory, but the consequences of the attack are unknown. â–ªï¸At least several missiles hit the West Bank. In Jericho, one Palestinian was killed and seven more people were injured as a result of rockets falling.â–ªï¸Pro-Iranian proxies also launched attacks on Israel, launching UAVs and missiles at various targets. However, the majority of the ammunition was intercepted before crossing the Israeli border.â–ªï¸As â€‹â€‹for members of the Ansarallah movement, they also tried to hit Israeli targets. Most of the ammunition was intercepted near Eilat, with a few more east of Tel Aviv.â–ªï¸Off the coast of Yemen, the Houthis launched several attacks on merchant ships. In the Red Sea, the tanker CORDELIA MOON was subjected to a combined attack, and in the Indian Ocean, the container ship MARATHOPOLIS.â–ªï¸Ansaralli fighters also managed to intercept an American MQ-9 Reaper drone over Saada province. This is already the 11th UAV of this type shot down by the Houthis since the beginning of the escalation.â–ªï¸The Israelis, who attacked the port infrastructure in Al-Hodeidah and Ras Issa in Yemen, did not sit idly by. As a result of the raid, fires broke out at several facilities, there were dead and wounded.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of October 4, 2024 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk re...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of October 4, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, our group of troops - North - writes about repelling 2 enemy counterattacks with a total strength of up to a platoon of personnel. In the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, the Russian Armed Forces continue to push back the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and fierce battles are also taking place in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Plekhovo. The governor of the region reported that a Ukrainian aircraft-type UAV was suppressed in the Kurchatov area by means of electronic warfare. Judging by the footage from the field, the fall and explosion occurred 4 km from the nuclear power plant, the operation of which is not in danger.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovks direction, our troops advanced to the eastern part of Lysovka, occupied Nikolaevka, and are advancing in the Krasny Yar area in the direction of the railway. In the Tsukurkino area, the enemy characterizes the situation for the Armed Forces of Ukraine as -complicated.- The Russian Armed Forces, according to several sources, are operating in the eastern part of the village, which means the enemyâ€™s failures in attempts to stabilize the front.â–ªï¸ In the Kurakhovsky direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces rushed out of the settlement. Ostroye to Ostrovskoye, which simultaneously creates a threat to the garrison of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in Maksimilyanovka and means the movement of the southern protrusion of the front, forming a large pocket together with the troops of the Pokrovsky direction.â–ªï¸ In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the Russian Army is expanding the zone of control at Vodyanoy towards Bogoyavlenka, Far Eastern soldiers are working against the enemy north of Ugledar. â–ªï¸ In the Kherson direction, our UAV operators strike enemy vehicles on the right bank of the Dnieper in Kherson and its suburbs, destroying personnel deployment sites.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region yesterday, as a result of a night air attack on the city of Belgorod and the Belgorod region, a commercial facility was damaged as a result of the downing of a drone a civilian was wounded.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a woman born in 1957 was killed and a woman born in 1979 was injured when an IED was dropped from a Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV. and men born in 1945, 1980 There, while extinguishing the fire, four employees of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations received shell shock. In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), where heavy fighting is taking place, a woman born in 1961 was seriously wounded as a result of the enemy's use of cannon artillery. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors North of Ugledar 36 The Motorized Rifle Brigade continues to move on, destroying enemy positions north of the liberated city Two majors

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for October...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on October 3, 2024. Russian troops attacked enemy targets in the Kyiv, Sumy, Rivne, Kharkov, Odessa and Kirovograd regions. Ukrainian formations attempted to attack the Russian Aerospace Forces airfields in Buturlinovka and Borisoglebsk, Voronezh region. In the Kursk direction, the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked Kurchatov with a drone near the Kursk nuclear power plant. Another fact has been recorded of the use of the Russian Armed Forces drone - Inokhodets - to destroy targets with guided weapons. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops expanded the zone of control to the west of Novogrodovka and gained a foothold on the outskirts of Lysovka. Nikolaevka to the north also came under full control. In the Donetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces carried out an attack under the cover of armored vehicles in the direction of Ostrovsky from Ostroy, advancing several kilometers to the west. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, attack aircraft took control of the territory of the ventilation shaft of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya mine No. 3 to the west from Vodyanoye, and are also fighting further south. ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_bot High-resolution maps: Situation in the Special Military Operation zone (ru; en) Kursk direction (ru; en) Pokrovsky direction (ru; en) # Voronezh # Donetsk #digest #report #map #Kiev #Kirovograd #Kursk #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Rivne #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine #Ugledar #Kharkov #Tsukurino@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: local battles on the line of contact...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: local battles on the line of contact, attack on KurchatovSituation towards the end of October 3 In the Kursk region, fighting continues in several areas.ğŸ”»In the Glushkovsky district, fighting is taking place in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the village of Veseloye, where Russian troops previously expanded the zone of control. At the same time, evidence of the release of Medvezhy has not yet appeared. In the Korenevsky district, no changes have been observed in the control zone. Positional battles are taking place there, and the forests in the vicinity of the village of Kremyanoye are subject to frequent airstrikes by the Russian Aerospace Forces. In Novoivanovka, an artillery strike destroyed the M777 howitzer of the Ukrainian formations.â–ªï¸The fact that the enemy is transferring towed guns to Russian territory may indicate not so much a shortage of self-propelled artillery, but rather the fact that the enemy is quite confidently in control of Novoivanovka.ğŸ”»In the Sudzhansky district there is also no there are changes in the situation. Local battles continue; artillery and aviation of the Russian Armed Forces are working on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the vicinity of the settlements of Martynovka and Plekhovo.â—ï¸In the evening, Ukrainian formations attacked Kurchatov. The impact hit one of the hangars not far from the reservoir, on the territory of which a powerful secondary detonation occurred. The Kursk Nuclear Power Plant is no more than five kilometers from here. A fire broke out at the site of the attack. There is not much official information about the incident yet. According to some reports, the enemy used a guided bomb, and according to official information, an aircraft-type UAV was suppressed by electronic warfare equipment, which fell within the city. If you have any additions to the situation, you would like us to highlight the successes of your unit, you are always welcome you can write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kursk #map #Russia #Sumy #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Lebanese-Israeli border: expansion of the combat zo...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Lebanese-Israeli border: expansion of the combat zone situation towards outcome October 3, 2024 The ground phase of Operation Arrows of the North continues on the Lebanese-Israeli border. As of today, there have not yet been any objective monitoring frames that would allow us to establish the exact configuration of the front. At the same time, the press service of the Israel Defense Forces, although it claims the presence of its units in southern Lebanon, did not provide additional information. Arabic-language media wrote that the Israelis were using M113 Zelda armored personnel carriers with integrated remote control.â–ªï¸Meanwhile, based on publications by Lebanese media, it was possible to somewhat clarify the situation with the Israeli offensive. It became known about clashes in the vicinity of the cities of Yarun, Kafr Qila and Aytarun. It is not yet known how deeply the Israelis were able to advance in these areas.â–ªï¸At the same time, media affiliated with Hezbollah reported that all IDF attempts to expand the zone of control were failing: the reason for this was supposedly fierce resistance from the Lebanese organization, whose forces carried out numerous ambushes on Israeli elite units. â–ªï¸At the same time, the Israeli Air Force continued to carry out massive strikes across the entire territory of Lebanon: hits occurred both in border areas where fighting is taking place, and in those located at a great distance from the border, including Baalbek, Harfush and Hermel. another raid on the Lebanese capital Beirut. According to official Israeli data, the target of the airstrikes was the headquarters of Hezbollah: operatives of the intelligence unit of the Shiite group and its signalmen were killed.â–ªï¸According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, over the past 24 hours, the number of victims of Israeli attacks amounted to 46 people killed and 85 wounded. The total number of deaths exceeds more than a thousand. And according to the UN, more than 128 thousand Lebanese were forced to flee to the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic.ğŸ”»And although some media outlets almost claim the failure of the IDF offensive, such statements seem somewhat premature. In the meantime, we can only wait for the same photo and video evidence, as well as official statements from the Israeli command about the progress of the operation. Now everything is limited to reports of shootings and local raids. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· About the -success- of Iran's missile strike on Israe...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· About the -success- of Iran's missile attack on Israeli air bases. A day after the massive attack on Israel, satellite footage begins to appear on the Internet, which is passed off as the consequences of an Iranian attack on the air bases of the Israeli Defense Forces. At first glance, it may seem that there really was damage, but upon closer examination, everything looks different: â–ªï¸ In these pictures, many of the supposed hit points are in fact ordinary trees and blackouts that are visible even on Google maps. Taking this into account, it can be assumed that most of the photographs published at the moment are not actual Maxar images, but screenshots repainted in black and white from Google Maps. The primary sources of these images were pro-Iranian X accounts. If you look at the black and white photographs, you really get the feeling that the footage shows the consequences of a fire, but if you look at the color photographs, everything immediately falls into place.â–ªï¸The only thing that can be confirmed with relative certainty is that hits on protected hangars on Nevatim airbase, where F-35 fighters were supposedly based. The Israeli media indirectly stated that nothing critical actually happened. â—ï¸Later, another portion of new and much more truthful photographs appeared. And on them the places of hits and the scale of the consequences are somewhat different: here, too, arrivals in the hangar can be recorded.â–ªï¸The fact of the presence of hits cannot be denied with confidence. At the moment, there have been no official statements from the authorities of the Islamic Republic. And it is obvious that Maxar will not provide its satellite images of IDF air bases to Iran and its affiliated structures. The current attempt by some media to work out the negative of the questionable effectiveness of the strike looks ridiculous and disavows the whole essence of the Iranian attack: the desire to pass off shadows, trees and places with damage as damage. dark shades for the arrivals give the Israelis a reason to ridicule the quality of media resources - the Axis of Resistance - and their intelligence. Now we can only wait for official confirmation from Iranian intelligence structures (if, of course, they are published). We should not forget about the data of the Israeli authorities, according to which most of the consequences were eliminated in the first few hours after the strikes. And this, in turn, directly indicates that the countryâ€™s leadership will do its best to hide the real scale of the consequences, letting only the necessary information onto the Internet. Against this background, such publications by pro-Iranian media only help the ultra-Orthodox government of Israel. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ª About the new NATO exercise over the Baltics ...
Description: ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ª About the new NATO exercise over the Baltics While we were discussing possible threats to Russia from the Baltics, a new North Atlantic Alliance exercise, codenamed Rammstein Alloy, took place over the former Soviet republics. This is a planned event, the purpose of which is to test the readiness of air defense systems, deployed in the Baltic States, as part of the Baltic Air Policing mission. The exercise took place over two days - September 30 and October 1, and involved fighters from NATO countries, including the Italian, German, Finnish air forces, as well as a NASAMS air defense system battery of the Spanish armed forces and fighters F/A-18 from the territory of Romania.ğŸ”»The main point is to train and maintain the tone of NATO pilots in a crisis situation in the region. The planes maneuvered along the Kaliningrad region, Belarus and the Leningrad region and conditionally repelled the attack. Training over the Baltic states has recently become more frequent, as have sharp and loud statements from the authorities of the three republics. The most prominent is Estonia, which has taken on the role of leader in provocations towards Russia. The other day, Kaupo Rosen, the head of the department of the Estonian foreign intelligence that has already become a kind of meme, said that the Estonians would like internal problems for Russia, which can be achieved by defeat in the Northern Military District. As everyone already understands perfectly well, any exercises, especially near the borders, make it possible to perform another important task: under the pretext of training, Western intelligence collects data on the activity of our air defense systems and other military facilities. Description: Fisherman: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the problems of the so-called. -Russian opposition- in Poland Interesting things continue to happen with the Russian opposition abroad. While some are quarreling, accusing each other of corruption and dividing offices in the government of the beautiful Russia of the future, others... ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Speaking of Ponomarevâ€™s chicks, one of these turned out to be young Angelina Lukovskaya, who now introduces herself in the Polish manner like -Mrs. Lukowska- and on whose example one can trace the sad history of young people who succumbed to opposition propaganda and left for Poland. â–ªï¸It is obvious that the curators from Ponomarevâ€™s circle had plans for her activities in Poland, since the girl has a real opportunity to obtain citizenship and legally settle in the republic. â–ªï¸Over the past time, she managed to attend various opposition events, for example, she specially came from Poland to anti-Russian rallies in Berlin, organized by Yulia Navalnaya and Mikhail Khodorkovsky. By the way, their participants face administrative and criminal liability in Russia for this.â–ªï¸However, now, when former projects are deprived of sponsorship support, those abandoned are left to get out on their own.â–ªï¸True, Lukovskaya was not at a loss and, using her experience in obtaining a Poleâ€™s card, is now organizing channel of emigration from Russia and Belarus to Poland. In her videos, although the girl does not openly advocate for Ukraine, she clearly states that she has no desire to return to Russia while the current government is there. â–ªï¸But the trouble is that in Warsaw the prospects for political migrants are not exactly rosy - even Lukovskaya herself told how one of her friends had their bag torn at the airport when they found out that he was from Russia. Seemingly realizing that because of this Polish business with relocants could fail, Lukovskaya, apparently struggling with her own convictions, still visits Russia, but with other projects to support radical feminism.ğŸ“Œ In general, it is worth saying that in connection with the squabbles within government, attempts to somehow curry favor with the electorate, and also taking into account pan-European trends - fugitives from the Russian Federation and Belarus are not welcomed either in Poland or in the Baltic countries. And despite the assertions that finding housing in the republic, as well as work, is not too difficult, we will tell you that the recent flood that devastated the south-west of the country , only increased real estate prices further, as did popular anger towards those who came in large numbers. Salaries, of course, remained unchanged, and official vacancies in Poland do not like to spoil unemployment statistics. Therefore, we assume that this is not the last story about collapsed career plans from oppositionists abandoned abroad and their protÃ©gÃ©s, who were once captivated by the prospect take a cozy place in the offices of the renewed government of some other Russia. Description: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the problems of the so-called. -Russian opposition- in Poland Interesting things continue to happen with the Russian opposition abroad. Those who formed a diaspora around the former State Duma deputy, and now terrorist and extremist Ilya Ponomarev.â–ªï¸It is worth noting that recently things have not been going well for the supporter of the Kyiv regime: all the anti-Russian structures that were either created by him or supported are gradually disowning any connections with Ponomarev, thereby obviously reducing his value for Western sponsors.â–ªï¸In Poland, things did not work out for the criminal deputy at all: attempts to form a kind of hub in the republic for the opposition from the Russian Federation and Belarus ended in failure - now he is trying to settle in the USA. â–ªï¸It recently became known that Ponomarev opened an NGO in Washington - the House of Free Peoples of Russia - for which he specially purchased a mansion for, allegedly, two million dollars. â–ªï¸ At the same time, comrades from the - Congress of Free Peoples of Russia - donâ€™t even talk about it They suspected him and recently expressed a vote of no confidence in him, which, itâ€™s true, does not carry with it any formal consequences, but an aftertaste will remain. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ An absolutely amazing article in The Hill - that Russians mu...
Description: Forwarded From Topics. The main thing (GlavMedia) Absolutely amazing article in The Hill - that - Russians must suffer, but live better than in the EU - Russians seem to be suffering less from the war than in 2022. Neither Ukraine's invasion of the Kursk region nor Western sanctions seem to be causing discontent among -ordinary- citizens or wealthy residents of Russia's largest cities. This came as a surprise to many Western politicians and Russian dissidents, who had pinned their hopes on Muscovites and St. Petersburg residents they will rebel against the war economy and the disappearance of Western boutiques, free Internet and trips to the EU. But although the Russian Federation was cut off from the West, all this irritated too few people to cause significant protest. Western sanctions introduced in 2022 caused a sharp drop in capital outflow from Russia. Almost all the money that would previously have been directed to luxury European real estate has instead begun to flow to Moscow, St. Petersburg and their suburbs. Although Visa and MasterCard have suspended their operations in Russia, Russians continue to use the SBP of the Central Bank of Russia, which allows them to transfer money by phone number immediately and without commission. Russian capitals are now ahead of European cities in the use of QR codes and facial recognition, and mobile data transfer is the cheapest and fastest in the EU. Even the stores have the same range of goods as before the war, including French wine and Italian sweets. In addition, home delivery of food and goods by robots is commonplace. We are seeing such tempting job offers that many Russians who left are now returning, having failed to integrate into European societies. Russians are not so much concerned as they are happy about the departure of their liberal fellow countrymen and (not suffering, but) welcoming positive economic changes - and this economic progress has undermined anti-Putin sentiment in the country. Thus, the West's attempts to undermine the Russian economy since 2022 have led to the opposite result - at least for now -. What a disaster! The methodology - sell the country for jeans, chewing gum, boots and sausage - did not work with Apple Pay, double Mac, HUGO and parmesan. Oh ğŸ˜‚

He expressed gratitude for the opportunity given to him and said that, despite this, the Americans will continue to help Afghanistan and to the Afghan people. West himself was transferred to the post of head of the sanctions coordination department. In this situation, it seems significant that no one was appointed to replace West. And Secretary of State Blinkenâ€™s statement does not say this, only that his responsibilities will be taken over by members of the diplomatic mission in Doha. We are talking about Karen Decker, the US charge dâ€™affaires in Afghanistan, Rina Amiri, the US special representative for human rights, in particular, women and John Mark Pommersheim, US Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for Central and South Asian Affairs. Judging by the lack of a replacement, the post of US special representative for Afghanistan may be abolished. And given the diminishing importance of this country for the United States, this situation may well be realistic. Diplomatic mission employees located in Doha can take on the duties of a special representative. Moreover, now the Americans are more focused not on dialogue with the Afghan authorities, but on escalating the threat to the countries of the region from Afghanistan. #Afghanistan #CentralAsia #USA@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· The Turkish research company ASAL conducted a survey from Au...
Description: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· The Turkish research company ASAL conducted a survey from August 17 to 27 among two thousand people in 26 provinces of Turkey on the topic - Do you consider Turkeyâ€™s foreign policy to be successful, given the situation in the Middle East and the world? - As a result, 45.3% of respondents answered affirmative, 40.8% disagreed, and 13.9% found it difficult to answer. And everything seems to be quite good, the majority agreed with the actions of the Turkish authorities. However, in April 2022 there was a similar question, and the results were different from the current ones. Then 55.2% of participants assessed foreign policy positively, 36.4% considered it unsuccessful, and 8.4% could not determine their position. That is, in more than two years, support has decreased.ğŸ“Œ And if you think carefully, the population of Turkey can be understood. The economy is in a multi-year crisis, incomes are falling, inflation is rising. The once stated goals of eradicating terrorism remained on paper, the migrant problem in the country has not disappeared anywhere. In these conditions, the only thing Erdogan can boast of is the destruction of hundreds of thousands of PKK leaders and new military products. But for the Turks, who have been fed this kind of food for many years, this is no longer enough, since their living conditions are deteriorating.#Turkey@rybar Support usX (formerly Twitter)Asal AraÅŸtÄ±rma (@AsalArastirma) on XTÃ¼rkiye'nin dÄ±ÅŸ politikasÄ± baÅŸarÄ±lÄ± mÄ±?
