Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Today is the second anniversary of the reunification of Donb...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev Today is the second anniversary of the reunification of Donbass, and indeed the entire Novorossiya, with Russia. And I want to remind you all a little of what happened before that. Vladik Dmitriev was killed on April 2, 2021. A Ukrainian copter operator dropped a grenade on a four-year-old boy. The boy was born during the war in Donbass, died in the war, and did not know a peaceful life. -Multiple injuries with traumatic amputation of the upper and lower extremities-. This is from the conclusion of a forensic expert. And then a portal to the underworld opened in our former liberal media. Cover of the morning broadcast on Ekho Moskvy the next day. Find it. Satisfied faces. Plyushchev and Felgenhauer. Topic of the program: -Killed boy- in Donbass-. Ekho Moskvy, following the Ukrainian media, called the information about the murder of a child fake, hence the quotation marks. They discussed on air whether this could have happened or not. Tanya Felgenhauer: There was some kind of incredible wave on the federal channels. Everything is escalating: war, war, war. A classic plot with a murdered child appeared. ALLEGEDLY. Already because of which Mr. Volodin began to speak. And the Investigative Committee began to initiate something. Now this conflict is more in the realm of propaganda? Or is this a real military threat? - When the bastard Plyushchev climbed into the YouTube trends with a vile video - Donetsk boy -, Alexey Venediktov joyfully commented on this event on his channel: - a trifle, but nice -. Even the OSCE mission eventually confirmed the death of Vladik Dmitriev from explosive injuries. But, you know, what is significant in this story is not how the liberal cannibals behaved. Whatâ€™s more telling is that we endured all of this. They tolerated mockery of the murder of a child. All these people walked quietly among us, they were invited to all sorts of events, even quite official ones. And the work of this portal to the world of Lovecraftâ€™s monsters of the independent media was paid for from the money of the state company. Do you understand the degree of our general degradation at that time? The sin of betraying our brother, in which we lived, do you understand? Imagine that now somewhere in the media in Russia they are mocking those who died in the Kursk region. Isn't it possible? And three years ago it was quite comme il faut. Remembering all this is much more important than celebrating and hiding your previous mistakes behind the current celebration.

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names for 2024. Colonel General Lapin A shocking military leader who again became the object of everyoneâ€™s attention this summer, turning his actions into statements, and doubts about himself into a source of surprise. It was not for nothing that Lapin reshuffled positions and returned to the post of commander: On the path to realizing his personal ambitions, he always went ahead, which ultimately led to a series of mistakes. In May of this year, the military-political leadership sets before him the task of creating a sanitary area in the Kharkov direction, without allocating additional forces and means for the group, but with the subordination of the African Corps. The commander is faced with a difficult choice: to attack with what is at his disposal or to use the resource of cover groups that have a certain amount of weapons and military equipment. By the beginning of the invasion of the Kursk region, most of the equipment, including the reserves of 44 AK, went to Volchansk and Liptsy, which, of course, could not go unnoticed by the enemy. During this time, the Russian Army managed to take control of about 260 square kilometers, which, however, is far from the lines occupied in May 2022. With the start of fighting in the Kursk region, the commander is actually forced to be torn between two operational directions. Many seriously believe that Alexander Lapin will no longer overcome this blow of fate: problems fall not only on him, but also on his son, against whom a prosecutorâ€™s investigation was initiated. Should a commander be judged for his character? If the troops were commanded by spineless commanders, then we would have already lost this war, but it is worth noting that once again Alexander Pavlovich attaches too much importance to criticism on the Internet. Colonel General Nikiforov-Chief cannot be better, it can only be worseâ€”thatâ€™s what Yevgeny Nikiforov liked to say about personnel changes in the Armed Forces, but could the former commander have thought that he himself would soon rise to become a big boss. With the start of the offensive The Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region, to restore order, the Chief of the Main Staff of the Ground Forces, Colonel General Nikiforov, was sent there, who, having arrived at the place, immediately got involved in the work and began setting tasks for his former subordinates, including the Deputy Commander of the Leningrad Military District, Esedulla Abachev, who was responsible for coordination of actions in the Kursk direction. It is worth noting that before Nikiforov, Colonel General Lapin, who regulated the work of cover groups during inspections, dealt with exactly the same issues in the border area. However, now this approach and setting tasks for former subordinates on the part of Yevgeny Nikiforov actually led to the establishment of dual power, to combat which a coordination council for border security was subsequently created, where Yunus-Bek Evkurov began to play the main role. Today, both military leaders are in a difficult relationship, largely due to differences in temperament: Nikiforov considers himself a superior commander and does not take into account any emotional attachment, remaining a pragmatist and considering everyone equally obliged to him, while Lapin believes that the commander of the group is it is an independent person who builds a homogeneous but closed organism that does not tolerate outside interference. The Minister of Defense reacted to the situation quite philosophically: without getting involved in the work of the General Staff, he entrusted the work of the cover groups to himself, thus gaining the opportunity to completely control the situation, reserving the right to personnel and organizational conclusions. High resolution art@arbat

Description: ğŸ–ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Happy Reunification Day of New Regions with Russia! Today marks two years since the reunification of the Donetsk and Lugansk People's Republics, as well as the Kherson and Zaporozhye regions with Russia. In September 2022, residents of these regions voted in referendums to return to the country, and on September 30, agreements were signed in the Kremlin that consolidated their new status. This was an important step for millions of people who chose stability and protection in difficult times. Much has changed since then: infrastructure is being restored, security is being strengthened, and important social issues are being resolved. The work continues, and there are still many tasks ahead, but the main thing is the people who made their choice. Art in high resolution #art #holiday@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ’° Are the pension savings of Kazakhstanis floating overseas?...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ’° Are the pension savings of Kazakhstanis floating overseas? It became known that in August of this year, the National Bank of Kazakhstan invested 433 billion tenge from the Unified Accumulative Pension Fund (UPF) into government securities of the US government. It is significant that at the same time there are publications in the press that investments in Russian securities, already cheap, turned out to be unprofitable. In 2022, the National Bank invested the pension funds of Kazakhstanis in Eurobonds of the Ministry of Finance of the Russian Federation, denominated in dollars, for 18.8 billion tenge, and since then the cost of these securities has decreased by 385 million tenge.ğŸ“Œ All this is done under the pretext of investing in -income instruments- in order to preserve and increase in this way. The Kazakh authorities generally like to use the pension savings of Kazakhstanis - they have already bought shares in Air Astana (the airline is not a national carrier and is generally under British control). Also, funds from the UAPF were used to purchase cars - freight and passenger - for the Kazakhstan Railways, a state monopoly. Moreover, this was not done directly, but also through the purchase of securities, the essence was that the UAPF acquired bonds of the national holding on market conditions - Baiterek - for $382 million, after which this amount is used to purchase 3,300 cars. In the report, there was confusion in the testimony: it turned out that there was $24 million more money than the UAPF invested in Baiterek, and 200 fewer cars were purchased. In general, trends show that the West continues to develop Central Asian capital. Thus, recently the President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev proposed to provide foreign companies with access to the pension assets of citizens of the republic. At the moment, these savings amount to about 20 trillion tenge, or in terms of the current exchange rate - 41.6 billion dollars. With such actions, Astana contributes to the fact that Americans do not have to turn on the printing press once again and increase inflation at home. And once again they support the American financial pyramid, politely called -national debt-.#Kazakhstan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usinformburo.kzThe National Bank invested the pension money of Kazakhstanis in August only in US government securities. There were no investments in other financial instruments.

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¶ About the visit of the President of Equatorial Guinea to...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡¶ About the visit of the President of Equatorial Guinea to Moscow From September 25 to 28, the President of Equatorial Guinea Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo visited Moscow, where he met with Vladimir Putin. At the meeting, he noted the prospects for economic development, including the opening of a Russian bank in an African country. Military cooperation between the parties was also noted.â–ªï¸In addition, speaking at the plenary session of the Russian Energy Week, Nguema Mbasogo expressed interest in cooperation in the energy sector. As a member of OPEC, Equatorial Guinea has some resource base for relevant initiatives. Under pressure from the West, Nguema Mbasogo is trying to enlist support from China and Russian partners. After the failure of the Chinese project of a logistics point on the Atlantic coast, this niche remains unoccupied. Also in the country, presumably, there are some deposits of coltan, for the possession of which an invisible war broke out between the United States and China. In such a situation, the expansion of Russian influence in Equatorial Guinea could make adjustments to the current situation in central Africa. Gaining control over the key to the Atlantic and coltan could undermine the West's position in the region.#Africa #Russia #EquatorialGuinea@rybarSupport usTelegram SOLOVIOVğŸ–¥ï¸ A meeting between Vladimir Putin and the President of Equatorial Guinea Teodoro Obiang Nguema Mbasogo began in the Kremlin.âœ Subscribe to Solovyov!

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in Dzerzhinsk and the surrounding area of â€‹â€‹Novgorod (New York) situation as of 11.00 September 30, 2024 Russian troops continue the offensive in the east and within the borders of Dzerzhinsk, knocking out the enemy with the support of artillery and aviation . ğŸ”»In the area of â€‹â€‹the high-rise building block on 91st Division Street, the enemy launched several fairly large-scale counterattacks, but was unable to stay in the development. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ“…ğŸ– Military operation in the Syrian Arab Republic - 9 years ...
Description: ğŸ“…ğŸ– Military operation in the Syrian Arab Republic - 9 years On September 30, 2015, the whole world shuddered at the news: Russian aviation began to strike the positions of international terrorist formations in Syria. After the Crimean spring, at the height of the war in Donbass, another confrontation appeared: we began to fight terrorism at distant approaches. Over these nine years, the operation has changed: active combat operations are no longer carried out, there is periodic bombing and destruction of enemy targets in the provinces of Idlib and Aleppo Yes, patrolling certain areas. I would, of course, like to see more active actions, but in the conditions of the Northern Military District, this is probably an unacceptable waste. During active operations, significant areas of territory were liberated and the basis for further settlement was laid. Perhaps, in the context of the Lebanese-Israeli war, the role of the Russian Armed Forces will grow even stronger: but to what extent and in what capacity, whether the conflict will spread to Syria, whether there will be a need to increase the contingent again - we will find out over time. High resolution art #art #holiday@rybarSupport us

The main goal of the exercise is to improve interaction and increase the combat capability of the operational units of the armies of Azerbaijan and Uzbekistan.ğŸ“Œ Compatibility of combat units in any military alliance is one of the key areas for preparation, as evidenced by regular exercises of the United States and allies. And it seems that the exercise is small and not entirely significant, but, adding up all the events that were carried out over two or three months, the trend can be seen more and more clearly. #Azerbaijan #Uzbekistan@rybar Support us

Title: ğŸ¬ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ Chronicle of a special military operation: events of the week of September 23 - 29, 2024â–ªï¸Russian Aerospace Forces carried out numerous targeted strikes on the industrial zone of occupied Zaporozhye throughout the week. Among others, the production workshops of Zaporozhstal and one of the workshops of the Motor Sich plant were hit.â–ªï¸Another target of Russian aviation was the premises of the Ivchenko-Progress enterprise. As a result of the arrivals, a massive fire was recorded at the facility.â–ªï¸In the Odessa region, the port infrastructure of Izmail and a ship repair plant came under attack from Russian UAVs. In addition, enemy targets were also attacked on Zmeiny Island and in the Belgorod-Dnestrovsky region.â–ªï¸In addition, Russian troops hit the territory of the Yuzhmash enterprise in Dnepropetrovsk. This is the second strike on the plant this year, the previous one was on February 23.â–ªï¸In turn, the enemy launched drones in the Rostov region. Russian air defense forces shot down six UAVs on approach to Novoshakhtinsk, there were no casualties or destruction.â–ªï¸On the night from Saturday to Sunday, the Ukrainian Armed Forces staged another massive UAV raid. The Russian Ministry of Defense reported the interception of 125 drones in seven regions and over the Sea of â€‹â€‹Azov.â–ªï¸In the Sudzhansky district there are battles in the vicinity of Plekhovo. Russian UAV operators and artillerymen are working on positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the village.â–ªï¸In the Kursk region, combat operations continue in the Glushkovsky district. After suffering losses and a number of unsuccessful attacks, Ukrainian formations reduced the intensity of attacks.#video #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 30, 2024 â–ªï¸ All night, e...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of September 30, 2024â–ªï¸ All night, enemy resources reported the work of our attack UAVs, the main target of which was the enemyâ€™s capital region. Explosions were also recorded in Dnepropetrovsk, Zaporozhye, Zhytomyr, Vinnitsa and Cherkasy regions. The Kharkov and Sumy regions were processed by the FAB with the UMPC.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine over the past day have been increasing pressure in the Novy Put - Vesyoloye direction, expanding the zone of control near the border Volfino and trying to bypass Vesyoloye from the left flank. In the Sudzhansky district, active actions of our units south of Plekhovo were reportedâ–ªï¸ In the Krasnolimansky direction, the liberation of Makeyevka (LPR) was confirmed. Along with the expansion of the zone of control to the south, two front ledges have been formed in Nevsky.â–ªï¸ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), the Russian Armed Forces continue assault operations, fighting for every house. The enemy carries out counterattacks with the support of armored vehicles. Heavy fighting continues in the northern part of New York (Novgorod).â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, our troops north of Nikolaevka are destroying enemy strongholds that stand on the way to Mirnograd. Selidovo and Tsukurkino are included in half-coverage, the logistics of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in populated areas is limited. â–ªï¸ Ugledar is almost completely surrounded, the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ escape routes from the city are under fire. The commander of the 72nd brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, responsible for the defense of the city, was removed from his post. Our troops are methodically destroying enemy firing points in the city. To the west, units of the Vostok group of troops managed to come close to the eastern borders of Zolotaya Niva. â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are shelling the Zaporozhye Nuclear Power Plant again. A transformer at the Raduga substation was destroyed by a direct hit from Ukrainian Armed Forces artillery. The energy supply situation in Energodar is under control, the city is powered. â–ªï¸ Belgorod region is under constant shelling of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In Oktyabrsky, Belgorod district, a self-defense fighter was killed and a civilian was wounded. Vyazovoe, Krasnoyaruzhsky district, Murom, Shebekinsky urban district, Shebekino were fired upon.â–ªï¸ In the DPR, six civilians, including a child, were injured today as a result of the actions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, under attacks in Donetsk and Gorlovka. In the liberated part of Dzerzhinsk, when an explosive object was dropped from an Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, a man born in 2001 received moderate injuries. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Assault on Ugledar. Assessment of the situation by the enemy: Ukrainian units are actually surrounded in Ugledar, wrote a Ukrainian military man with the call sign -Muchnoy-. According to him, the Russians deliberately do not cut the last route to Ugledar, near which they are located. They are trying...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: new att...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: new attacks on Lebanon situation towards the end September 29, 2024 Israeli troops continue the air operation - Arrows of the North - without reducing the intensity of bombing of Lebanese territory. According to the IDF press service, Hezbollah headquarters were among the targets attacked during the day. â–ªï¸At the same time, the IDF command does not pay attention to the accompanying casualties among the civilian population. In just one day, in the eastern suburbs of Sidon, more than a hundred people were injured as a result of an airstrike on a multi-storey building, a third of them died. The total number of victims in Lebanon since the escalation has already exceeded one and a half thousand people, including foreigners. â–ªï¸Despite statements by representatives of the Lebanese organization about launching missiles at various IDF targets, most of the ammunition is destroyed in the air by air defense systems, some of them even fall on Lebanese territory. Multiple air defense alarms in the Haifa area in the evening, according to local resources, were associated with the passage of just one air target.â–ªï¸Meanwhile, one of the shells fired by Hezbollah fell east of Jerusalem, causing several large fires and a power outage in populated areas in Western bank of the Jordan River. Lebanese rockets, although they reach the territories of the Palestinian Authority, often fall within populated areas, including in the area of â€‹â€‹Arab villages. â–ªï¸At the moment, American authorities are calling on the Israelis to abandon the idea of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹conducting a ground operation in Lebanon, fearing tougher actions by Hezbollah and active intervention by Iran, which will inevitably lead to escalation. In addition, the United States assumes that if the conflict escalates, American facilities in the region will come under direct attack.â–ªï¸ The Islamic Republic of Iran is in a rather vulnerable position in front of a rival with a stronger position. The outcome of the confrontation will depend on the ability of Tehran and its allies to create new threats to the enemy. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on September 28-29, 2024. Russian troops hit the infrastructure of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in several regions of the so-called. Ukraine and the occupied territories of Russia. In Zaporozhye, the Motor Sich enterprise again came under attack. Ukrainian formations carried out a massive UAV raid that affected seven Russian regions. Air defense systems intercepted 125 drones, but there were no casualties. In the Kursk direction, Ukrainian formations are not abandoning attempts to dislodge the Russian Armed Forces from Vesely, and battles have also been noted in the Sudzhansky district. In the Liman direction, Russian troops liberated Makeyevka and drove the enemy out of the surrounding forest belts. To the south there are battles in the Nevsky area. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops knocked out the enemy from two strong points north of Grodovka, essentially breaking through the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ defense line located here. Also, the RF Armed Forces, according to some sources, established control over the waste heap of the Novogrodovskaya No. 2 mine. In the Donetsk direction, Russian troops knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from several positions on the eastern approaches to Tsukurino and captured a district stronghold north of Gornyak. At the same time, information appeared about the RF Armed Forces clearing a pocket in the Nevelskoye area. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, Russian troops are advancing in the Katerynivka area. To the south, the assault on Ugledar continues, a semi-ring of Russian troops is gradually shrinking around the Ukrainian formations in the city. Title: â†©ï¸ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸŒ About the reaction of countries and movements in the ...
Description: Rybar: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ In the situation with the death of Hezbollahâ€™s secretary general as a result of a strike on Beirut, the US reaction looks quite interesting: publicly, representatives of the American administration approved the death of Hassan Nasrallah, but behind the scenes they expressed dissatisfaction with the actions and plans... ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸŒ About the reaction countries and movements of the Middle East to the death of the Secretary General of Hezbollah. If we talk about the reaction of countries and political movements of the Middle East to the death of Hassan Nasrallah, then for the most part it comes down to verbal condemnation of Israel, differing only in form. At the same time, almost everywhere the matter has not yet gone beyond statements.â–ªï¸Iranian spiritual leader Ali Khamenei introduced a five-day mourning period in the country. Other government officials spoke matter-of-factly about the imminent revenge while condemning the killing of IRGC deputy commander Abbas Nilforoushan, who died alongside Nasrallah.â–ªï¸Iraq's prime minister and Shiite religious leaders spoke out against Israel, and Islamic Resistance factions threatened to fire at him and his allies . So far, only the Yemeni Houthis have moved from words to action, launching missiles at Tel Aviv and shelling ships in the Red Sea.â–ªï¸In Syria, the authorities declared three days of public mourning, recalling in a statement the role of Hezbollah in liberating the country from militants. In areas of the provinces of Idlib and Aleppo controlled by opposition groups, on the contrary, the death of Nasrallah was celebrated.â–ªï¸Some of the Sunni countries in the region reacted curiously to the attacks on Beirut - they condemned Israel, but without much condolences because of the death of Nasrallah. This was caused by a long-standing ideological confrontation with Shiite Iran and Hezbollah.â–ªï¸Inside Lebanon itself, both allied and opposition Hezbollah, Sunni and Christian parties came out in its support, considering the murder of Nasrallah as an attack on the country. And several movements radically opposed to the group chose to remain silent. In general, Israel can hardly expect any powerful military response to what happened - Hezbollah itself is suffering very heavy losses, and Hamasâ€™s statement about creating a united front with it the matter will not have much impact.â—ï¸Iran found itself in a situation where it laid all its cards on the table and was left without trump cards in front of an opponent with a stronger deck. The further course of the confrontation will determine the extent to which the Islamic Republic and the forces it supports will be able to reorganize and create threats to their opponents from an unexpected direction&High-resolution infographicsEnglish version#Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ In the situation with the death of the Hezbollah Sec...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ In the situation with the death of Hezbollahâ€™s secretary general as a result of a strike on Beirut, the US reaction looks quite interesting: publicly, representatives of the American administration approved the death of Hassan Nasrallah, but behind the scenes they expressed dissatisfaction with the actions and plans of Israel. Thus, The Washington Post writes that officials in Washington are urging the Israelis not to carry out a planned ground invasion of the south Lebanon. The reason is fears of Iranian retaliation and the start of a larger regional war. It is unlikely that the United States here is afraid of the prospects of major Iranian attacks on Israel - as practice has shown, the IDF, with the help of its allies, is capable of repelling missile and drone attacks. Another thing is that the expansion of the war in the Middle East risks hitting the Americans themselves. In this case of conflict, any US facilities in the region will come under direct attack. And if now some kind of guarantee against this is the current level of escalation, when the United States and Iran tacitly limit each other in the choice of targets, then otherwise the pro-Iranian forces may simply -break the thread-. For example, Hezbollah fighters - in the face of problems with management on their own initiative will want to blow up the American embassy in Beirut, factions of the Islamic Resistance in Iraq will begin to pour fire on the airfields of the International Coalition, and Houthis - shoot at the oil fields of the Persian Gulf countries.â—ï¸In each case, the United States will be forced to make a large-scale response, which contradicts its own plans to reduce its military presence in the Middle East. And the Democratic Party needs such a war even less on the eve of the presidential elections, especially against the backdrop of the shaky position of Kamala Harris. Therefore, Washington will clearly strive to prevent the IDF invasion of Lebanon by resorting to carrots and sticks - promises of new preferences and support for resolving the Palestinian issue. and threats to cut ammunition supplies in the event of a ground operation.#Israel #Lebanon #USA@rybarSupport UsWashington PostU.S. scrambles after Hezbollah leader killed, braces for potential Iranian retaliationSenior Biden administration officials said that they were still assessing the situation in Lebanon and their next steps, warning that it was difficult to predict what might follow after the death of Hezbollah leader Hasan Nasrallah from an Israeli airstrike.

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Although the economic situation of the so-called Ukraine, co...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Although the economic situation of the so-called Ukraine, contrary to sometimes appearing reports, is still far from critical, let alone collapse, the Kiev regime is experiencing certain difficulties with finances. This is manifested at least in the field of taxation. In particular, one of the local deputies stated that if the military tax increases from 1.5% to 5%, teachersâ€™ salaries will simultaneously have to be reduced by 3.5%. It is characteristic that the salaries of the Verkhovna Rada employees themselves are planned to be increased by a quarter. As we have repeatedly mentioned, the collective West is curtailing support for the so-called. Ukraine is not yet planning and discussing the allocation of new large tranches. But they go mainly for military assistance and minimal basic needs, sufficient to continue the war until the last Ukrainian. The entire social sphere for the sponsors of the Kyiv regime is an extra expense, so they seek to shift these costs to the so-called Ukraine. And the authorities of this quasi-state entity will be able to do this only by squeezing the maximum out of what is still left in the territories under their control.#Ukraine@rybarSupport uswww.mk.ruThe salaries of Ukrainian teachers will decrease after increasing the military levyPeople's Deputy Southerner: Ukrainian teachers will receive less after increasing the military levy .

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Scandal with the Tashkent branch of VGIK: consequence...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Scandal with the Tashkent branch of VGIK: consequences A few days after two high-profile events in Tashkent, we are informed about the ongoing work on the errors that have arisen. Remember the scandal with the local branch of VGIK: training was conducted not in Russian, but in Uzbek, there were no big names. Well, the public outcry helped. A commission came from Moscow from VGIK itself to check, and the Russian actor Sergei came to the branch in Tashkent Bezrukov. Sergei Bezrukov visited the university, talked with students and performed the play -Uncle Vanya- at the local palace of arts -Turkeston-. Photos from the event can be seen on the actorâ€™s personal page. Moreover, the current unsightly events may be part of the confusion due to the change in leadership. The ex-director of the branch, Eldar Yuldashev, lost his position back in July. Now the director of the branch is Ikbol Melikuziev, who may not have had enough time to restore order. Now the new director of the branch is trying to correct the mistakes of the previous management, and the students, judging by the latest reviews, are happy with everything, and there were no more complaints from them. Of course, there are still plenty of problems, but it is gratifying that, against the backdrop of all the scandals, a review of the work of the branch is beginning. We didnâ€™t have time to write about the problem, but they quickly rushed to solve it. This means that not everything is lost, the public outcry allows the situation to be corrected for the better, and the efforts of officials can be reversed.#Russia #Uzbekistan@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ’‰UK one step closer to assisted suicide Last week -...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ’‰UK one step closer to assisted suicide Last week, a citizen jury of the Nuffield Council of Bioethics (NCOB) concluded that assisted suicide should be legal in the UK. The jury concluded that a person suffering from a terminal illness should be able to legally access medication-assisted suicide. The council's conclusion is advisory in nature, but can subsequently be used as a decisive argument when amending laws. The UK is just following a trend that is sweeping the Western world. Assisted suicide is already practiced in Canada, Belgium, the Netherlands, Switzerland, as well as certain states of the USA and Australia. Based on the experience of other countries, we can expect that if suicide is legalized in the UK, the following events will occur:â–ªï¸the number of drug-induced suicides will increase every year, perhaps even exponentially (as in Canada);â–ªï¸the list of people who will be able to commit suicide, will gradually expand, and over time will include people whose diseases are not fatal or incurable (including those of a psychological nature), and minors; â–ªï¸a market for services will begin to form around assisted suicide: from service personnel and medications to devices that facilitate the procedure. ğŸ”»Assisted suicide fits perfectly into the globalist agenda. It is easier for the state to let a chronically ill (but unable to pay for expensive medicine) citizen die than to provide him financially; get rid of a veteran suffering from PTSD rather than rehabilitate him in society; eliminate the result of a failed gender experiment rather than admit a mistake. â—ï¸Canadian experts already shamelessly estimate how much money assisted suicide helps save in the healthcare budget, and Swiss entrepreneurs are presenting capsules for independently carrying out medical suicide. The most difficult stage for beneficiaries of assisted suicide is its legalization in the minimum possible form. And subsequently, the boundaries of what is permitted can gradually expand. It seems that for the UK the decision has already been made, and all that remains is to prepare society morally for the coming changes.#Great Britain #globalism@rybar Support usSky NewsAssisted dying should be allowed in England, according to 'citizens' jury'The top two reasons the panel were concerned about a law change were that it could be used for the wrong reasons if safeguarding is not in place, and that it could be misinterpreted or misused.

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ About possible successors to the leader of Hezbollah Afte...
Description: ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ About possible successors to the leader of Hezbollah. After the death of Hassan Nasrallah, the question arose of who would replace him as Secretary General of Hezbollah. The new leader must meet certain criteria, such as having religious status, experience and position in the leadership of the organization, so at least two figures are suitable for this role: Hashem Safi ad-Din According to some reports, he is the head of the Hezbollah Executive Council and a member of the Council jihad defining military strategy. Safi ad-Din is Nasrallah's cousin, and his son is married to the daughter of Qassem Soleimani. He bears the title of Sayyid (descendant of the Prophet Muhammad), and studied at Shiite educational centers in Najaf and Qom. Safi ad-Din's relatively young age and oratory skills speak in favor of him: in particular, he speaks publicly at events, while Nasrallah has not appeared in public for a long time. Naim Kassem Started his path in politics back in the 70s - initially was a member of another Shiite party, Amal, but then participated in the formation of Hezbollah in the mid-80s. According to media reports, Kassem is a member of the Shura Council, Hezbollah's central executive body. Experience speaks in his favor - Kassem has been Hezbollah's deputy secretary general since Nasrallah's predecessor, Abbas al-Musawi, who was killed in 1992. He also underwent training in Shiite religious centers. Lesser-known figures, including one of the sons of Hassan Nasrallah, are also formally suitable for the role of the new leader of the group. However, they have less experience and weight within the structure, which may affect its capabilities in the current crisis. In general, one of Hezbollahâ€™s main problems now is the physical disappearance of the middle command level, intermediate between the top and the junior staff. What affects the reduction of the bench, including the search for a new leader. High resolution infographicsEnglish version#Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Raid of Ukrainian UAVs on Russian regions Last night,...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian UAV raid on Russian regions Last night, Ukrainian formations launched another massive drone raid. Air defense systems of the Russian Armed Forces operated in seven regions of the country, intercepting 125 UAVs. â–ªï¸The largest group of 67 drones was destroyed in the airspace of the Volgograd region. Several explosions were recorded in the Kotluban area, where the arsenal of the GRAU of the Russian Ministry of Defense is located. According to available data, injuries and serious damage to the facility were avoided. â—ï¸Despite statements from enemy media resources about the defeat of the railway train during the raid, data from fire monitoring services indicate the absence of any fires in the area of â€‹â€‹the railway line located on the territory of the arsenal and nearby settlements. The force of the explosions recorded in this area also does not fit with the version of the Armed Forces of Ukraine - the defeat of a train with, as stated, artillery ammunition would have caused much more extensive destruction on the territory of the facility.â–ªï¸In the Rostov region, 17 UAVs attacked civilian infrastructure facilities in the Tsimlyansky district. Local residents reported partial power outages both in the locality of the same name and in neighboring Volgodonsk. There have been no reports of damage to energy facilities in the region at this time. â–ªï¸In the Voronezh region, the Russian Armed Forces destroyed 17 air targets. One of the drones of the Ukrainian Armed Forces hit an apartment building in the regional capital. A fire started on the upper floors, affecting several apartments, but the residents were evacuated in time - there were no casualties. â–ªï¸Air defense systems also repelled an enemy raid on the Belgorod region, intercepting 18 air targets. In the Bryansk and Kursk regions and the Krasnodar Territory, one Ukrainian Armed Forces drone was destroyed, and three more were shot down over the Sea of â€‹â€‹Azov. In all cases there were no casualties. High resolution map English version #Belgorod #Bryansk #Volgograd #map #Krasnodar #Kursk #Rostov #Russia #Tula #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

However, against the backdrop of recently appeared footage from Chernenkoâ€™s repeated meetings with Mi6 intelligence officer Christopher Joyce, another side of her also reminded of itself activities related to work in the interests of Western countries.ğŸ”»Why a journalist from Kommersant might need a meeting with a representative of the Foreign Office, and how, using her example, interaction between Western non-governmental organizations and employees of Russian media has been established - we tell in our new article.#Great Britain # article #Russia @rybar Support us

Title: ğŸŒğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Business development in Africa, as expected, has become on...
Description: ğŸŒğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Business development in Africa, as expected, has become one of the popular topics during the Russian Energy Week. Especially considering the recently increased activity of various Russian departments and enterprises in this area. This time, the statement of Deputy Head of the Ministry of Energy Sergei Mochalnikov that Africa has all the resources for the development of the fuel and energy complex, and Russia has almost all the technologies needed, attracted attention. for their development. Thus, hinting at plans to develop energy projects on the continent.â–ªï¸A good example is Rosatom, which is building a nuclear power plant in Egypt and whose activities are actively supported by Egyptian partners. The successful implementation of such projects helps to find new clients. ğŸ“ŒFor example, the South African authorities recently resumed discussions on the construction of a nuclear power plant in their country. Earlier in 2018, President Ramaphosa, under pressure from Western NGOs and environmental activists, as well as the IMF, abandoned the Rosatom project under the pretext of environmental threats and high costs (which Western loans allegedly could not cover). But over time, the problem of aging energy infrastructure has only gotten worse. Permanent blackouts are common in South Africa, and alternative energy projects have proven to be ineffective imitation. And so, the ordeals of South Africans on the issue of nuclear energy naturally led them to the starting point.â–ªï¸The role of the RusHydro company is also noted, which is now shifting its vector to work specifically with Africa, where many projects that require modernization remain unfinished.ğŸ”»No matter the bureaucratic difficulties, with many African partners it is possible to find a common language and promote their own economic influence, benefiting from diplomatic and military interactions. But, as the example of South Africa shows, the struggle for the same nuclear market should be comprehensive and not limited only to specific projects and individual companies.#Africa #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸŒğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºAbout Russian energy projects in AfricaRecently, Dmitry Semenov, Director of the Department of International Cooperation of the Russian Ministry of Energy stated that in the energy sector, Russian companies are developing about 40 projects in 14 different countries.â€¦

Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸŒ About promoting the liberal agenda through consumer products Western social networks never cease to amaze us with examples of disdain on the part of the media and large corporations for everything traditional and conservative, as well as their undisguised political prejudice.â–ªï¸Users of virtual assistants -Siri- (Apple) and -Alexa - (Amazon) have already caught the company openly supporting Kamala Harris in the election race. Upon request - Why should you vote for Donald Trump? - both voice assistants answer that they cannot give political advice. However, as soon as the name is replaced with -Kamala Harris-, virtual assistants begin to list those positions of her election program that deserve a vote in the elections.â–ªï¸After the assassination attempt on Donald Trump in July, users noticed that when entering the query in the Google search bar -Attempted assassination President... - the platform offered options to automatically fill in the line with the names of other presidents, but not Trump. Even when entering his name by letter.â–ªï¸In the new service for personalizing inscriptions on Coca-Cola cans, consumers noticed limitations: the software does not allow entering the word -Jesus- (at the same time, the words -Buddha-, -Allah- and -Satan- there are no such restrictions), and also does not allow you to write the slogan -Trump 2024- on the can. Of course, with the slogan - Harris Waltz 2024 - you can register a jar.ğŸ”»These are just a few examples of systematic work to promote liberal values â€‹â€‹in the everyday life of residents of Western countries. And if the major media have already lost the trust of the population, then influence with the help of artificial intelligence and algorithms is a more sophisticated and effective method of propaganda, which affects all age categories. #globalism #USA@rybar Support usMail OnlineCoke went woke! Title: ğŸ” #Review #Summary for September 29, 2024 â–ªï¸ Last week, the war ...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Summary for September 29, 2024â–ªï¸ Last week, the war in Ukraine took place against the background of foreign policy actions of Russia and its opponents. Zelensky visited the United States with his -victory plan,- which aroused criticism due to the fact that everything hinges on receiving new multi-billion-dollar shipments of military-technical assistance, as well as permission to fire NATO missiles deep into Russian territory. That is, Zelensky is thus trying to shift responsibility for the consequences of such attacks to the United States. Kyiv needs this to directly draw the Alliance (and not its proxies) into hostilities against Russia. Regardless of public statements, weapons from NATO countries are used with complete impunity on the territory of our country, which has been repeatedly previously designated as -red lines.- The seriousness of the issue of a retaliatory strike from Russia (for some reason everyone perceives that it will be against Ukraine) is emphasized by the statements of the Supreme Commander at the meeting where the new Nuclear Doctrine was announced (the journalistic name of the Supreme Decree in force in 2020 - On the Fundamentals of State Policy of the Russian Federation in the field nuclear deterrence-). At the same time, the clauses of the still valid document made it possible to launch a nuclear strike on Ukraine in response to the actions of Kyiv. So it is most likely that changes are needed to justify a strike against those subjects of international law who use Kyiv to cause damage to our country. In addition, the allied Belarus is taken under the nuclear umbrella. Significantly, according to the not yet adopted updated doctrine, a massive launch and crossing of our border by aerospace weapons, including airplanes, missiles and UAVs, under certain conditions can become the basis for the use of nuclear weapons. Just tonight, 125 Ukrainian UAVs were shot down by our air defense. â–ªï¸At the front, the repulse of the attempted invasion of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region continues, as it writes every day in the reports of the Ministry of Defense. The offensive impulse of the Ukrainian Armed Forces has practically disappeared, although the enemy is carrying out counterattack actions. In the south of the Sudzhansky district, the Russian Army is advancing in the area of â€‹â€‹the village with heavy fighting. Plekhovo, in the Glushkovsky district we managed to hold back the onslaught of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, our troops are operating in the Korenevsky district. Apparently, our command decided to protect the personnel and iron out the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Kursk region and their concentration areas in Sumy. Zelensky, despite the impossibility of achieving military goals in the region (such as the capture of the Kursk nuclear power plant), is forced to keep units in this bag and send them reinforcements, since the withdrawal of enemy troops will show the senselessness and futility of the death of Ukrainian soldiers in the Russian region from a military point of view.â–ªï¸The offensive continues Russian armies on the Pokrovsky direction to the west and south. The battles for Ugledar became important; the fall of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ defense became a matter of time. In the Kupyansk direction, attack actions of the Russian Army are also periodically reported. The Ukrainian Armed Forces garrison in Chasov Yar is gradually being covered from the south and north. In the Kharkov direction, the enemy, with the help of elite GUR units, occupied the aggregate plant in Volchansk, which led to its powerful bombing by our aircraft. Heavy fighting is taking place in Toretsk.â–ªï¸Despite the successes of the Russian Armed Forces, the advance is proceeding extremely cautiously, which is explained by the difficulties in supplying advanced units under fire from enemy drones. There were assessments from enemy deputies about the insufficient level of preparation of defensive structures in the depths of the defense of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the future, this may play into the hands of our advancing troops. However, it is important to understand the severity of the battles and the pace of advance of several hundred meters per day of the Russian Army, which is due to the new technological way of war. continued belowTelegramTwo majorsstarted above â–ªï¸ This week, a meeting of well-known public military correspondents/military bloggers took place with the Minister of Defense Belousov. Feedback suggests that the minister is aware of the current problems at the front and is making practical efforts to improve the situation. Neverthelessâ€¦

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· About the third stage of the Poker-2024/3 exercise Septem...
Description: ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· About the third stage of the Poker-2024/3 exercise September turned out to be quite fruitful for events surrounding nuclear weapons. In addition to the United States, training of the nuclear component took place recently in France, where the third stage of the Poker-2024 exercise took place. This year, unlike previous years, the French command conducts training of strategic nuclear forces throughout the year as part of this series of exercises. In accordance with a plan, Rafale B/M aircraft (carriers of nuclear warheads) and Triumphan-class nuclear submarines are working out the scenario of deployment in an armed conflict.ğŸ”»Against the background of increasing tensions in relations between Russia and the North Atlantic Alliance, changes in the Russian nuclear doctrine, the French are trying with all their might to keep keeping their units in good shape. By the way, according to the Fifth Republic, the French have restored the center for coordinating nuclear forces in Taverny, mothballed since 2011. So the new stage of the Poker exercise may be associated with testing its readiness. These seem like understandable measures, but if you remember that a similar training took place in the USA, and before that in Russia, and they also started talking about testing nuclear weapons in the DPRK, then it turns out a very alarming picture. To complete it, only a few powers - the nuclear club - are left to join the general trend. High resolution mapEnglish version#France@rybar Support us

Judging by the published footage, a group of reconnaissance officers fired at the vehicle at once from four RPG-7s on both sides. After this, hardly anyone inside the armored car survived. It is worth noting that previously this area was considered more of a rear area and the presence of Ukrainian Armed Forces units was not expected here. Title: ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the victory of a hawk and a NATO supporter in the Japa...
Description: ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the victory of a hawk and a NATO supporter in the Japanese elections On September 27, the election of the chairman of the Japanese Liberal Democratic Party took place. Shigeru Ishiba won them - next week he will officially become Prime Minister of Japan instead of Fumio Kishida. â–ªï¸Many people call Ishiba a -hawk- - he is a supporter of increasing the potential of the Self-Defense Forces and increasing the military budget. In this, he will continue the policy of the former leader, who actively advocated for strengthening Japanese troops. â–ªï¸Speaking of foreign policy priorities, relations with the United States, of course, come first. In his speeches, the politician pointed out the need for joint management of bases and the deployment of the Japanese army on US territory in order to make the alliance more equal. ğŸ”»Ishibaâ€™s most resonant statement in the election campaign was the proposal to create an Asian analogue of NATO. The new prime minister explains this initiative by the need to protect Japan, as well as the tense situation in the region. American authorities, according to Japanese media, reacted rather coldly to this idea. There is no doubt that a new alliance is needed to contain China. However, some observers claim Ishiba's pragmatic approach to relations with his neighbor. This is indicated by his intentions to balance between diplomacy and defense in foreign policy. Ishiba's approach to Russian-Japanese relations remains unknown. The local press expresses hopes for progress in the issue of Japanese visiting the graves of their ancestors in the Kuril Islands - the Russian authorities have canceled the simplified visa regime for them in 2022. However, there are so far no prerequisites that the new prime minister will be able to achieve its return, as well as move away from the anti-Russian policy that is now characteristic of the Japanese authorities. #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe Japan TimesFifth time's a charm: Shigeru Ishiba set to be Japan PM after LDP poll winIshiba, who has also served as party secretary-general, won the LDP presidential election on Friday, defeating economic security minister Sanae Takaichi in a runoff vote.

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Almost immediately after the first rumors about changes...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Almost immediately after the first rumors appeared about changes to Russiaâ€™s nuclear doctrine, a training session of strategic nuclear forces took place in the United States. Two B-52N aircraft with nuclear weapons flew into the Pacific Ocean. One flew south of Unimak Island, and the second turned around off the coast of the United States. At the same time, a nuclear submarine was located along the western American coast, and coordination with the control point was carried out by an E-6B control and communications aircraft. Periodically, the Americans carry out such maneuvers that allow you to maintain the strategic forces of your country in combat readiness, but this does not happen very often. For example, a similar training on the West Coast last took place in May 2023 year, so enough time has passed. And there is practically no information on the Internet. Taking into account quite significant changes in Russian doctrine, as well as growing tensions in the Asia-Pacific region, this flight appears to be politically motivated in order to show the readiness of American nuclear forces. High-resolution mapEnglish version#USA@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: the mur...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: assassination of the Hezbollah leader during an attack on Beirut situation as of 18:00 September 28, 2024 The press service of the Israel Defense Forces announced the neutralization of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah: he was killed as a result of another Israeli Air Force raid on the Lebanese capital. Condolences in connection with the death of His Eminence Seyyed Hassan Nasrallah were expressed by almost all participants of the so-called. -Axis of Resistance- and its allies. These are both Palestinian formations and various groups in Iraq, the Yemeni Houthis and Iran.â–ªï¸At the same time, one of those killed during the strike on Beirut was Iranian Brigadier General Abbas Nilforoushan, commander of the Quds Force from the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps in the Republic of Lebanon . This is confirmed by government media. Nilforushan himself is known for his participation in several military campaigns, including in Iraq and Syria. At the same time, his statement from 2021 is being circulated in the media, when he spoke on state television about Israelâ€™s weakness and inability to pose any threat to Iran. â–ªï¸Meanwhile, according to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, since the beginning of a series of strikes by the IDF Air Force, the number of casualties has amounted to about 700 dead and 2,600 wounded. Of these, six killed and 91 injured were residents of the southern suburbs of the Lebanese capital. At the same time, the UN stated that more than 50 thousand Lebanese fled to the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic, a total of 200 thousand were internally displaced. Also, representatives of the international organization reported that humanitarian needs had reached an unprecedented level.â–ªï¸Against the background of what happened in Hezbollah, they reported launches on about ten Israeli Defense Forces targets. Nevertheless, such attacks cannot boast of effectiveness: most of the ammunition is either intercepted by air defense systems or falls in wastelands, often on the territory of Lebanon itself. It is noteworthy that the total number of missiles launched today also remains at a relatively low level - only a few dozen, whereas previously their number could be measured in the hundreds. ğŸ”»The killing of the leader of the Lebanese group was one of the most effective Israeli strikes as part of the recently launched air operation - Arrows of the North -. This was preceded by the death of other Hezbollah commanders, such as Fuad Shukri, Ibrahim Aqil and Ali Karaki. Despite the loss of almost all top leadership, most allied Hezbollah media indicate that the movement as a military-political organization will not disappear anywhere. Nevertheless, Hassan Nasrallahâ€™s successor cannot be envied against the backdrop of the significant damage the Israelis have inflicted on the group in recent days and their virtual complete dominance in the conflict. At the same time, everyone is waiting for a response from both Hezbollah itself and Iran. However, what it will be like and what the Israelis will do in the future is difficult to predict. At the moment, the parties are doing what is already familiar to them: hitting each otherâ€™s positions, maintaining the already high degree of tension. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Zaporozhye direction: successes of the RF Armed Force...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Zaporozhye direction: successes of the Russian Armed Forces on the Rabotinsky salient and attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on Energodarsituation as of 17:00 on September 28, 2024. The Zaporozhye direction, which has recently fallen out of the information field, remains one of the key sectors of the front. Russian troops exchange artillery, UAV and aviation strikes with the enemy, and also conduct local attacks in several sectors at once. â–ªï¸On the Kamenskoye-Novoandreevka section, Russian units are fighting on the approaches to Pyatikhatki. To the east, attack aircraft of the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control north of Nesteryanka. During the attack, they knocked out the Ukrainian Armed Forces from their strong point and occupied part of the forest belt. In parallel with this, the Russian Aerospace Forces regularly strike places where enemy personnel are concentrated in Novoandreevka and Novoyakovlevka. â–ªï¸To the northwest of Rabotino, units of the Russian Armed Forces squeezed the enemy out of several forest belts. Thus, Russian troops managed to knock out the enemy from the ledge, which had previously threatened the left flank of the Russian Armed Forces units in the village. To the east of the settlement, Russian troops, during several assaults, expanded the zone of control on the approaches to Chubenkova Gully. Features of the landscape slow down the advance of the Russian Armed Forces and turn battles for each strong point into battles that can last for weeks. The beam itself, towards which Russian attack aircraft are approaching, is used by the enemy as a concentration point for their units and plays an important role in the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. â—ï¸Over the past two months, Ukrainian formations were forced to abandon a significant part of their positions on the former Rabotino ledge. Successful offensive actions of the Russian troops not only secured the flanks of the Russian Armed Forces group in Rabotino, but also led to the beginning of the formation of half-coverage around the Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the area from the northern approaches to the village to Chubenkova gully. Nevertheless, it is clearly not worth expecting large offensive operations in this area with the aim of breaking through the front. Both sides have equipped powerful defensive lines here, the assault of which will be resource-intensive and will probably not lead to significant successes. â–ªï¸At the same time, last summer was marked by an increased intensity of attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on Energodar and its surroundings. As a result of drone strikes and artillery shelling, the city and surrounding communities experienced water supply disruptions three times. Recently, one of the schools in Kamenka-Dneprovskaya came under fire from Ukrainian forces. There were more than a hundred students in the building at the time of the attack, but there were no casualties. The region's energy system is also suffering. Following massive attacks by enemy drones on local substations, significant power outages have been recorded several times since the end of July. This also affected the neighboring Kherson region, where, as a result of enemy attacks on the energy sector of Zaporozhye, several thousand people were left without electricity in August. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot communications @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Zaporozhye #map #Russia #Ukraine #Energodar@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ Dear friends! Six months of development, testing, calibratio...
Description: Forwarded From Older Edda Dear friends! Six months of development, testing, calibration and other things have come to an end. The Ural craftsmen from the team -Turned in War-, the creators of the famous folk kamikaze drone -Ghoul-, already noted at the highest level, have created the product that our troops so desperately lack. Heavy drone -Berdysh-. This is a combat drone, there is nothing superfluous in it and it has one task - war. Berdysh is, first of all, a front-line drone, a weapon of assault troops. It can easily carry 20 kilograms for at least 15 km, that is, it can fully ensure the supply of assault groups and reinforcement groups with everything necessary, in conditions of isolation of the enemy battlefield. Berdysh can engage in mining, ensuring the laying of anti-tank and anti-personnel mines at any time of the day. Berdysh can drop a powerful landmine on enemy dugouts, can conduct reconnaissance and, most interestingly, can inflict fire damage from the RPO -Shmel- or RPG-30 -Hook-. Berdysh is a modular drone, that is, through simple manipulations and in the shortest possible time, the miner turns into a supply worker, and on the next flight into a combat unmanned helicopter. The guys made it relatively compact so that it could be transported in a UAZ, the deployment time is like that of the Ghoul, that is, within a couple of minutes you can unfold and collapse the bird. Plus, as noted in the video, Berdysh is a repeater drone for the FPV family -Ghoul-. And most importantly, Berdysh was able to be made as cheap as possible, cheaper than Chinese agricultural drones, but more functional and suitable for combat operations. Dear friends, we are now announcing a BIG collection for Berdyshi. This will be the people's second drone. You, dear Brothers and Sisters, have already turned the people's drone - the Ghoul - into a real weapon, which is now being used by the troops. Now we ask you to help with the implementation of this machine, which is so necessary for our army. Anyone who wants and has the opportunity to help can do so on the card of Radio Russia presenter Dmitry Konanykhin 2202206288336105 The enemy will be defeated, humiliated and destroyed, and Victory will be ours! Also, the Iranian media denied reports about the death of the commander of the Quds Force, Brigadier General Ismail Qaani - earlier on the Internet it was stated that he was in the underground headquarters of Hezbollah in Beirut. â–ªï¸Despite Israeli claims that the United States was informed before the bombing of Beirut, several American media outlets claim the opposite. Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡º About protests in Sydney against censorship on social net...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡º About protests in Sydney against censorship on social networks Today there were mass demonstrations in Sydney against the disinformation bill proposed by the Australian government under the leadership of Prime Minister Anthony Albanese. ğŸ“ŒThe essence of the bill: Australian authorities want to introduce fines for digital platforms, which, according to the authorities, do not effectively combat so-called disinformation. If the law is adopted, social networks could be fined up to 5% of annual turnover. ğŸ”»Of course, the law will primarily become a tool for suppressing freedom of speech, allowing the authorities to interpret what constitutes disinformation and put pressure on social networks to remove incorrect content. The main blow will probably fall on X (formerly Twitter), since the majority of bloggers with alternative opinions broadcast on this site. Therefore, one of the prominent opponents of the law is Elon Musk. We have already observed similar measures in post-Soviet countries, where local authorities, under the supervision of Western NGOs and USAID, are fighting Russian propaganda, but still cannot overcome it, demanding new subsidies and tightening legislation. ğŸ”»And recently, against the backdrop of anti-migrant protests, the British government has sharply tightened censorship. Looking at British law enforcement practices, where migrants are given relatively lenient sentences for rape and other serious crimes, while native Britons are given exemplary harsh prison sentences for making jokes on Facebook, Australians have something to fear. #Australia #UK #protests@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Now only 10 thousand citizens of Moldova will be able to take part in the presidential elections and referendum on European integration on October 20. According to the most conservative estimates, about 100 thousand Moldovan citizens now live in the Russian Federation. â–ªï¸Initially, 29 polling stations were supposed to be opened in the Russian Federation, but then they were reduced to five, despite the fact that 60 will be opened in Italy, and 26 in Germany. â–ªï¸At the same time, more than 8 thousand Moldovans have already completed preliminary and optional registration to vote from Russia, that is, the actual number of voters will be much higher. However, according to the law, only 5 thousand ballots can be allocated to one polling station. ğŸ”»Sanduâ€™s office and the Western curators of the Central Election Commission of Moldova do not want to spoil the picture with protest voting, so they continue to come up with the most sophisticated measures, including the ill-fated postal vote from Western countries. We will not be surprised if sites in Russia are not opened at all. Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§About the results of the annual conference of the Labor Party. On September 25, the three-day Labor conference in Liverpool ended. British Prime Minister Keir Starmer spoke at it for the first time as head of government. ğŸ”»Instead of talking about a happy future, we had to talk about less pleasant things.â–ªï¸One of the main topics of Starmerâ€™s speech was the decision to cancel fuel payments in the winter for some categories of pensioners, which was announced by the Minister of Finance of the United Kingdom Rachel Reeves at the end of July.â–ªï¸A stab in the back for the prime minister, on the last day of the conference, there was a defeat in the vote against the governmentâ€™s decision to block subsidies on heating for millions of elderly people. Despite the fact that the decision of the delegates is not legally binding for Labor, the voting results had a negative impact on the positions of Keir Starmer.â–ªï¸Along with this, the Prime Minister also commented on the situation in the Middle East, calling for a de-escalation of the Lebanese-Israeli conflict and an immediate ceasefire in Gaza. However, at the same time, Foreign Minister David Lammy said that the UK would not impose a complete ban on the supply of weapons to Israel.â–ªï¸Starmer also assured that he would implement reforms in the field of remuneration of doctors, projects in the field of renewable energy sources and GB Energy, education, border security, tenants' rights and the nationalization of the railways.ğŸ”»After the conference, the Labor government faces the task of setting a budget for next year. At the end of October, the head of the British Ministry of Finance, Rachel Reeves, will announce who will have to fork out to implement Starmer's plans.#UK @rybar together with @oldGBRSupport usMail OnlinePM faces humiliation at Labor's conference over winter fuel paymentsUnite and the Communication Workers Union have put forward proposals calling for the policy to be scrapped at Labor's gathering in Liverpool.

Description: Forwarded From Call sign BruceğŸ“Œ Colleagues, provocations and sabotage on the part of the Baltic states could have been expected for the last ten years. All the military activity described by you and not only you in the Baltic region is a long-known and predicted process. Exercises to block the Gulf of Finland or the Suwalki corridor are carried out constantly and began long before the start of the war in Ukraine. All with the same involvement of divisions from Finland and Sweden. Only then they were not legal members of the alliance. But they were already actual. Regarding the attacks from Estonia, which alarmed everyone so much, I also wrote the other day. In their potential, everything is very consistent. Are the headquarters new in Finland? You can study the logic of creating NATO regional headquarters at the division level and everything will fall into place. Therefore, the only thing that the current activity of the Baltic states and Finland indicates is that NATO, as it pursued a policy of aggressive military construction near our borders, is still pursuing it. And the experience of Ukraine taught her nothing. It has only become more convenient for them to justify their actions. Is a direct clash with NATO in the Baltics possible in the short term? In my opinion, probably not. In the medium term, I consider this collision inevitable. And we will have to start it. If we donâ€™t agree otherwise. The word -rather- is highlighted in bold, since now any sensible assessments can be shattered by the very great instability of the military-political situation in the world as a whole. Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Aggravation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone chronicle of events for September 27, 2024 In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops again worked in the capital of the Palestinian enclave and satellite cities. Residential buildings and infrastructure were damaged, more than ten people were injured, and some were killed. In the southern Gaza Strip, IDF units are fighting in several areas of Rafah, while Palestinian forces respond with ambushes and mortar fire. At the same time, the Israeli Air Force is launching missiles at the outskirts of Khan Yunis and Abasan al-Kabirah. Another series of operations by Israeli security forces took place in the West Bank, as a result of which several dozen people were detained. The most violent clashes occurred in Nablus, where members of local armed groups were active. Massive shelling continues along the Lebanese-Israeli border. In the evening, the Israeli Air Force dropped an air bomb on Hezbollah headquarters in Beirut, where the movement's Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah could be located. Two people died and more than 70 were injured. Israeli aircraft also carried out strikes on the Syrian province of Damascus, where they hit a settlement near the border with Lebanon. Five SAA soldiers were killed, and the target of the attack, apparently, was Hezbollah supply routes. The fighters of the Ansarallah movement also showed activity, launching a rocket at Tel Aviv and a drone at Ashkelon. Both munitions were intercepted by missile defense systems, but 17 Israelis received various injuries on the way to the shelters. ğŸ”»A detailed analytical report on events in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botSituation in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict zone (ru; en)Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border (ru; en)#digest #map #Israel #Palestine # report@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The Israeli Air Force launched another massive atta...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The Israeli Air Force launched another massive strike on Beirut. This time they demolished an entire block with bunker-busting bombs, destroying six buildings to the ground and damaging those standing next door.â—ï¸According to the IDF press service, the target of the attack was the main Hezbollah command post in the Lebanese capital, where the movement's Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah could be located . The fate of the group's leader is not known for certain. Israeli resources report that he was at the facility at the time of the bombing, but Saudi media claim that Nasrallah is alive and in another place. The exact number of victims has yet to be calculated, but the number is clearly in the dozens. Considering that the bombs hit a residential area, a considerable part of them are clearly ordinary civilians. At the same time, the raid again clearly demonstrated the reconnaissance and combat capabilities of the IDF, which continue to knock out the top of Hezbollah for days in a row. In fact, without a ground operation, they inflicted extremely significant damage on the entire team to the structure of the organization. The Lebanese group cannot yet counteract these attacks. It does not have air defense systems that could even slightly disrupt the total Israeli air supremacy, and it is impossible to ensure secrecy in these conditions. It is difficult to say now how the situation will change in the event of a ground invasion by the IDF. But so far it seems that Hamas has turned out to be a much bigger tough nut to crack for the Israelis than Hezbollah. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us
