Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ª What is NATO preparing against Russia in the Baltics...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ª What is NATO preparing against Russia in the Baltics? The information background around the Baltics in recent weeks has almost inconsistently made it into the editorial pages of various media. And it seems that the Baltic states have always been distinguished by populist slogans and shouts against the Russian Federation. However, in reality, in comparison with previous years, there is one significant difference. Now on the northern front they are echoed by a newly formed member of the Alliance - Finland, which immediately began working as part of the bloc. Exercises that take place almost weekly with allies in the bloc or independently affect Russia in one way or another - either in the Gulf of Finland or on the Kola Peninsula , then a couple of tens of kilometers from Karelia. The situation is aggravated by the high political activity of the Finnsâ€™ neighbors in the Gulf - Estonia and other countries in the region:â–Recently, the head of the General Staff of the Estonian Defense Forces, Vahur Karus, announced the countryâ€™s preparation for a preventive strike on Russia.â–Then the commander of the forces Defense of Estonia Andrus Merilo traveled to Helsinki, where he announced the preparation of a plan to close the Gulf of Finland.â–The German media, echoed by the Estonians, stated that Russian civilian vessels were conducting reconnaissance in the Baltic and North Seas, which raised the question of the need to close the passage for them. â–Now in the Estonian segment the words of the head of the military committee Rob Bauer are being spread that the Alliance must be ready for war with Russia.â–German Defense Minister Boris Pistorius said that Germany will be the pillar of containment of the Russian Federation in Europe, and the German base in Lithuania will be fully formed by 2027.â–Immediately after this, it became known about the formation of NATO headquarters in the Finnish city of Mikkeli, bordering Russia. And all these events took place almost in the past week. Quite a lot even for the Baltic republics, which act as a plug in every NATO barrel. And if we look again at the exercises that took place over the course of six months, including Steadfast Defender, we can see one common trend for almost each of them - everywhere they worked out a scenario of direct conflict with Russia. First of all, what was paid attention to during the imaginary war was the blockade of the main arteries, namely the Gulf of Finland by the forces of the NATO expeditionary group, as well as the Kaliningrad region by cutting the Suwalki corridor. One of the key aspects that the Alliance worked out was the establishment logistics to the Baltic states and Finland. Both we and our colleagues spoke more than once about how the construction of Rail Baltica was progressing. One thing can be said is that the speed of infrastructure construction was too high even for NATO. It would seem that the Baltic countries have always been distinguished by bellicose statements that were in no way visible in reality, but since the start of the Northern Military District, funding for the region has seriously increased, as has the number of battalion- NATO tactical groups and the number of exercises. And with changes to Russiaâ€™s nuclear doctrine in the information space, there is even more talk about the advisability of a preventive strike on Russian territories. Moreover, attacks by Ukrainian formations have shown that the threats of the Russian authorities do not work without their implementation. From the point of view of the Westâ€™s desire for total destabilization of the situation, provocations and even sabotage from the territory of the Baltic states and Scandinavia cannot be ruled out. After all, to close shipping or the corridor to Kaliningrad, they only need a reason, which they can organize themselves. High resolution mapEnglish version#NATO #Baltics #Russia #Finland #Estonia@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names of 2024. Colonel General Teplinsky His group right now is the largest grouping of troops in the area of â€‹â€‹the Northern Military District. Over the course of a year, a huge amount of criticism descended on him, but he continued to fulfill his military duty, despite all the obstacles that his superiors created for him. From excessive nervous fatigue, the commander began to develop neuritis of the facial nerve, which in turn causes severe headaches, while Teplinsky himself does not like to go to doctors and does not consider himself sick. The commander fell out of the public field after the notorious Krynki: spiteful critics did not hesitate to ironize that even the main favorite of the general public could not turn the situation around, resolve the issue of air defense, rotation of l/s, and finally failed to build vertical connections along the line of headquarters and units on the contact line , demanding slides before organizing a fire strike, but few people know that Teplinsky was reprimanded at least twice by senior commanders, criticized for Bonapartism, and for the first time in a long time he made concessions, becoming conformist. It is noteworthy that despite his difficult relationship with the NGSH, Teplinsky actually combines two positions and at the same time continues to deal with recruitment issues in the Airborne Forces. He was the first to publicly talk about the losses in the troops and was pulled back, but increasingly, on the front line in the airborne troops you can meet over-aged soldiers, some of whom are already 60 years old. In the spring of 2024, it seemed to many that the Russian Army would get bogged down and would not be able to reach the Dnieper, but already on July 17, the last units of the Ukrainian Armed Forces left Krynki. Time after time, Mikhail Teplinsky proved his indispensability, but seeing rejection from his inner circle, he became a closed person, withdrawn from everyday routine. We believe that the commander of the Ili force still has something to say: avoiding his rebellious heart, the glory of the main firefighter of the Russian He will secure armies more than once in fire and smoke. Colonel General Rudskoy He again managed to prove that the cold operational calculation underlying the analysis of the situation weighs more in specific terms than primary value judgments, which have an emotional overtones, for which, however, he paid a lot expensive and lost the favor of his immediate superior. On August 6, the question echoed loudly in the General Staff: -What to do?- The events in the Kursk region no longer resembled the usual entry of the DRG or reconnaissance in force; intelligence reports, including through intelligence, were confirmed: the accumulated operational reserves near Shostka rushed into an operational breakthrough on the border. But Rudskoy would not have been himself if, in the course of operational calculations on the map, he had not come to the conclusion that in such a quantitative ratio the enemy would not be able to enter the operational space and would not only not complete the task of disrupting the work of the cover group headquarters, but also not will be able to fulfill the subsequent goal of sending raid groups to the Kursk NPP. The GOU was able to correctly assess the situation and come to the conclusion that the operational intensity in the Donbass should not only not be reduced, but also increased, and for two months now, reports have not stopped coming in about the capture of further settlements in the DPR. Not everything is like that moment they agreed with this line of behavior: for example, the first deputy head of the GOU Viktor Poznikhir advocated for the speedy closing of the bridgehead to prevent the introduction of reserves, the beginning of digging in and conducting systematic rotation in positions, but in this case it would be necessary to significantly change the existing operational configuration and slow down the pace offensive in Donbass. The correctness of the judgments of Sergei Rudsky is indirectly confirmed by the words of the commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Alexander Syrsky, who publicly stated that the offensive in the Kursk region did not allow achieving the goals of stopping the offensive on Pokrovsk and Ugledar, where the Russian Army today began to achieve significant success. High resolution art@arbat

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ Last night, Israeli aviation from the occupied Go...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ Last night, Israeli aircraft from the occupied Golan Heights launched missiles into the countryside of Damascus province. The hit occurred in the vicinity of Kafir Yabus, a settlement located near the Syrian-Lebanese border. According to the Syrian Ministry of Defense, five soldiers were killed and another was injured. At the moment, the Israel Defense Forces have not commented on what happened, but it is highly likely that the infrastructure used to transfer weapons to Lebanon will be reported. This area of â€‹â€‹the terrain itself relatively regularly comes under fire from the Israelis - primarily due to the fire that passes here Damascus-Beirut highway, which is popularly nicknamed the Road of Death. It is through it that the main supplies of weapons and ammunition pass, as well as the transfer of available forces. At the same time, against the backdrop of the aggravation of the Lebanese-Israeli conflict, we should expect an increase in the intensity of attacks on the Syrian border, including along other Hezbollah supply routes from the territory of the neighboring Arab republic - in addition to the province of Damascus, the target of attacks could be the city of El-Quseirah -Iranian corridor-.High resolution mapEnglish version#Damascus #Israel #map #Lebanon #Syria@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ After loud scandals, bickering and mutual exchanges of p...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ After loud scandals, bickering and mutual exchanges of pleasantries, Donald Trump and Vladimir Zelensky finally agreed to meet. The former American president presented everything as if he had mercy on the Ukrainian leader and generously accepted his offer, scheduling a meeting for the latter at Trump Tower. In fact, all this theatrical performance once again reflects the actively ongoing domestic political election struggle in the United States, in which both Republicans and Democrats view the Ukrainian case as an opportunity to score political points before the main event of November. The open letter from the Speaker of the US House of Representatives, Republican Mike Johnson, is nothing more than ordinary indignation at Kyivâ€™s reluctance to bet on the victory of the US Republican Party, as well as a kind of tool pressure on Zelensky in order to force him to interact with Trump, who is unfavorable for the Ukrainian leadership. From the outside, this tugging of the Ukrainian blanket looks comical and so far this whole scandal seems to have only discredited the Republicans and Trump rather than bringing any serious political benefits.#USA #Ukraine@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican numberâ—ï¸Speaker of the House of Representatives of the US Congress is a Republican Mike Johnson sent a letter to Vladimir Zelensky demanding the dismissal of Ukrainian Ambassador Oksana Markarova from her position. Dear President Zelensky, I demand immediate dismissal...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: a breakthrough to G...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction: breakthrough to Gornyak and battles on the approaches to Mirnogradsituation as of 16:00 on September 27, 2024 In the Pokrovsko-Kurakhovskoe direction, Russian troops are conducting active battles in two main areas. The greatest successes can be achieved on the southern approaches to Mirnograd near the Pokrovskaya agglomeration and on the Tsukurino-Girnyak-Galitsinovka line, advancing in the direction of Kurakhovo.â–ªï¸On the northern flank, Russian troops recently knocked out the enemy from Krasny and Krutoy Yarov. Later, footage of an ambush on a Ukrainian armored personnel carrier north of Nikolaevka, moving from the direction of Promin, was published on the Internet. At the moment, Nikolaevka is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. It remains to go two kilometers to the southern outskirts of Mirnograd, and also to occupy a number of enemy strongholds on the outskirts of the city. Somewhat further south, near Novogrodovka, no change in the configuration of the front has yet been recorded. However, if an offensive begins along the railway, it will be possible to attack the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Mirnograd from two directions at once.â–ªï¸On the southern flank, Russian troops are trying to close the lid of the boiler in the fields near Nevelskoye. Over the past week, the Russian Armed Forces liberated Zhelannoe Pervoy and started fighting in Zhelannye Vtoroy, and also gained a foothold on the northern outskirts of neighboring Gornyak. In the latter, the Russian flag was hoisted on the territory of school No. 17. To the south, the enemy holds a section of terrain about four kilometers wide, from where, in theory, it is possible to supply Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the fields near Nevelskoye. In the event of further advance at the Gornyak - Zhelannoye Second line in the direction of Kurakhovka and Zoryanoye, the Ukrainian formations holding positions east of Nevelskoye risk being completely encircled. Enemy targets in Kurakhovka are currently subject to massive fire damage from both cannon artillery and UAV operators. The targets are communication towers, armored fighting vehicles and power substations.â–ªï¸West of Ukrainsk, Russian troops carried out several raid attacks in the direction of the railway near the waste heap of the Selidovskaya mine, north of Tsukurino. At least twice, troops successfully landed on the site and gained a foothold in the area. According to some reports, the Russian Armed Forces have already started fighting on the northern outskirts of Tsukurino, but there is no objective evidence of this yet.â–ªï¸At the same time, the offensive in the direction of Kurakhovo from Ostroy continues. The other day, Russian troops completely liberated the village, gaining a foothold on the approaches to Selidovskaya correctional colony No. 82, bypassing Maksimilyanovka from the north. From here it is about a kilometer to the western outskirts of Kurakhovo. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kurakhovo #map # Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Law on -undesirable foreigners- in Uzbek Senate of the Oliy ...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Law on -undesirable foreigners- in UzbekThe Senate of the Oliy Majlis at a meeting on September 20 approved amendments to the law on the legal status of foreign citizens and stateless persons in Uzbekistan.ğŸ“ŒAccording to the approved law, now foreign citizens and stateless persons making calls, contradicting the state sovereignty, territorial integrity and security of Uzbekistan, provoking interstate, social, national, racial and religious enmity, discrediting the honor, dignity and history of the people of Uzbekistan, will be considered unacceptable for stay in Uzbekistan. They will be included in the appropriate register. â–ªï¸The law provides for a five-year ban on such persons entering Uzbekistan, opening bank accounts, purchasing real estate, participating in the privatization of state property, entering into financial and contractual relations.â–ªï¸The law was adopted after the resonance caused in the Central Asian republic by Zakhar Prilepinâ€™s statements last year about the need to join to the Russian Federation of all territories of the former USSR.â–ªï¸Obviously, any persons who speak out against the current migration policy or point to the Russophobia incited in the republic may fall under calls that may be considered undesirable. In Uzbekistan they went even further, immediately banning the participation of undesirable persons in the program of state property privatization supervised by the British. ğŸ”»How the law will be applied in practice - time will tell, but the information background and the discussion that stimulated its adoption do not bode well. #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usNewspaper.uzSenators approved the law on recognizing foreign citizens as undesirableThe Senate approved amendments on recognizing foreign citizens as undesirable to stay in Uzbekistan. The reason may be speeches and actions that threaten the sovereignty, integrity and security of the country, incite hostility, humiliate honor, dignity or history...

Title: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º How the EU Ambassador participates in election campaigni...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º How the EU Ambassador participates in election campaigning in Moldova amid censorship for other politicians EU Ambassador to Moldova Janis Mazeiks changed his shoes in the air and said that the negative results of the referendum on European integration, which will be held on the same day as the presidential elections, will create confusion- into the further process of association negotiations. â–ªï¸At the same time, Mazeix previously repeated several times, following Brussels officials, that the referendum on European integration has no legal force and does not oblige Brussels to anything. â–ªï¸It is obvious that the legally controversial combination of the EU referendum and presidential elections is the political strategy of Maia Sandu, who cannot boast of real success in governing the republic. â–ªï¸However, the change in Mazeixâ€™s rhetoric is a clear participation in election campaigning on the part of a foreign official. Moreover, he noted that he has no doubts about the positive outcome of the referendum. Such a statement can also be attributed to political manipulation of public opinion.â—ï¸It is also important that Mazeix said all this on the main TV channel of the country Moldova1, which refuses to show election videos of the opposition Party of Communists of Moldova (PCRM).â–ªï¸The PCRM accused the leadership of Moldova1 of political censorship and gross violation of the Electoral Code. The party held a rally at the channel's office. ğŸ”»The manipulations of Sanduâ€™s office and her Western curators before the elections and referendum will cross all possible boundaries, from fraud with polling stations abroad to the participation of foreign officials in campaigning. At the same time, in recent years, Sandu has closed and banned almost all media outlets that cover the opposing point of view. However, even after the systematic cleansing of the political field, her regime is still extremely unsure of its positions before the approaching election day and referendum. #elections #EU #Moldova@rybarSupport usmoldova1.mdJanis Mazheiks: A negative answer to the referendum on the country's accession to the EU may create uncertainty. However, if the result turns out to be negative, this may create confusion, since Moldova is a candidate country for accession...

Title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡© Deterioration of the situation in North Kivu due to the July...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡© The deterioration of the situation in North Kivu due to the July offensive - the March 23rd Movement - forced the authorities of the neighboring region to ban resource extraction. Now, after the situation had stabilized, the ban was lifted. This indirectly indicates the failure of the operation of pro-Rwandan Tutsi militants who tried to penetrate South Kivu. The government retains still significant reserves of tantalum, cobalt and gold, which the rebels were after. And precisely because of this, they can still be of interest, including for Chinese companies actively investing in infrastructure projects. But do not forget that instead of M23, other, openly terrorist groups are now becoming more active. If the authorities do not take measures to strengthen the army, then the possibility of losing control over the resources of the rich south of the country is likely. On August 4, a humanitarian truce initiated by Washington was formally declared. The agreement was concluded between government forces and the rebels...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼The annual NATO exercise âš¡ï¸Sea Breeze 2024, which was previou...
Description: Forwarded From Two MajorsThe annual NATO exercise Sea Breeze 2024, which was previously held in Ukraine, has ended. The exercises were held in three stages by the command of the 6th Fleet of the US Navy: â˜‘ï¸-2024-1- organized jointly with the British Navy from June 26 to July 5, 2024 in the Gulf Firth of Clyde (ğŸ´gliskogland). The maneuvers involved ships of the standing NATO Mine Countermeasures Group 1 (SNMCMG1) consisting of SS Donau (A516) ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªGerman Navy, EML Ugandi (M315) ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ªEstonian Navy and CMT Cephee (M652)ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· French Navy, and  minesweepers of the type Sandown -Cherkassy- (M311) and -Chernigov- (M310) also transferred to the Ukrainian Navy. Issues of mine action operations were worked out according to NATO standards. â˜‘ï¸-2024-2- and -2024-3- took place in the territorial waters and exclusive economic zone ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¬ of Bulgaria. The second stage (September 9-11) involved a conference to discuss collective demining of the Black Sea.â˜‘ï¸During the third stage (September 10-20), military personnel of the 8th Mobile Demining Unit  explosive ammunition  (EOD) and 2nd  mobile diving and rescue unit (MDSU) of the US Navy, together with the navies of Bulgaria, Denmark, Estonia, France, Georgia, Japan, Norway, Romania, Sweden, Turkey and Ukraine, practiced mine countermeasures and mine clearance operations in the Black Sea. Elements of the diving phase sea â€‹â€‹surface, underwater cutting and welding, were carried out by MDSU divers only with Ukrainian and Romanian specialists. During this phase, Remus underwater drones were used. In addition, from July 4 to July 14, the Breeze 2024 mine action exercise was also held near Bulgaria. They were attended by ships of the Black Sea Mine Countermeasures Task Force (MCM BLACK SEA) as part of the Turkish Navy ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· ,  Bulgaria ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¬ and Romania ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡´.âœ¨The increased activity of NATO countries in the Black Sea is covered by the need to neutralize the mines laid by Ukraine and (â—ï¸) Russia. At the same time, the enemyâ€™s development of skills in special underwater operations in the Black Sea region creates a long-term threat to Russian maritime infrastructure (gas production rigs -Chernomorneftegaz-, Crimean Bridge, energy bridge -Krasnodar Territory - Crimea-, gas pipeline -Turkish Stream-), which has more than once become the target of terrorist attacks Ukraine. Two majors

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡®ğŸ‡± At night, fighters of the Yemeni movement - Ansaral...
Description: ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡®ğŸ‡± At night, fighters of the Yemeni movement - Ansarallah - launched a rocket into the central part of Israel for the second time in the last month: surface-to-surface ammunition was intercepted by the Arrow (-Hetz-) missile defense system outside the country. Footage was published on the Internet as with the sounds of the air raid warning in Tel Aviv, and with the moment the Houthi rocket was shot down. Despite the successful interception, there were no casualties: according to Israeli media, 17 people were wounded - all were injured on the way to shelters. Apparently, the reason for another Yemeni attack was yesterday's murder by the Israelis of Hezbollah commander Muhammad Hussein Surur (-Abu Saleh-) - it was he who was the military adviser to the Houthis in the last decade, and also trained them in the management and use of drones. #Israel #Yemen #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· About the negotiations between Erdogan and Pashinyan and...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· About the negotiations between Erdogan and Pashinyan and the subtle humiliation of the latter On the sidelines of the UN General Assembly session in New York, a meeting was held between Turkish President Recep Erdogan and Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan. â–ªï¸The meeting was closed to the press, but the public was presented with the main theses of the negotiations, which are no different in content from previous Armenian-Turkish contacts. â–ªï¸The agenda includes the normalization of relations between the parties and the opening of the Armenian-Turkish border in the future for the transportation of goods. Erdogan predictably links this process with peace negotiations between Yerevan and Baku.â–ªï¸However, for both the Armenian and Turkish press, the main thing in the meeting was symbolism. The negotiations took place in the Turkish House in New York, that is, on the territory of Turkey. At the same time, Erdogan presented Pashinyan with his book -A more just world is possible.- A joyful photo of the latter with a gift spread across all media.â–ªï¸Erdoganâ€™s book is called a manifesto of Turkeyâ€™s dominance in the region. In the Armenian press the gift was called the transfer of the keys to the Caucasus Wall. This is what the founder of modern Turkey, Kemal Ataturk, called Armenia, which was a barrier to the Turks in the east. â–ªï¸In the main Turkish media TÃ¼rkiye Gazetesi, Erdoganâ€™s gift was called -significant- and -subtle-, drawing attention to the happy Pashinyanâ€™s posing with a book.â–ªï¸For Armenian society, such gestures are extremely painful, given that Pashinyan is ready to put up with Erdoganâ€™s public admissions about the participation of the Turks in the last Karabakh war.â–ªï¸At the same time, Pashinyanâ€™s speech at the UN in Armenia has already been called -pathetic and devoid of content,- similar to -the sermon of the head of a sectarian movement.- The speech did not touch upon the key problems of Armenia, which perfectly reflects the republicâ€™s loss of sovereignty and at least any influence in the South Caucasus. ğŸ”»At the same time, it is important for the United States that such meetings take place on American territory, as they need to outline their role as a peacemaker in the region. Moreover, the opening of the Armenian-Turkish border is connected with the status of the Russian border guards guarding it, whom Pashinyan will sooner or later ask to leave, fulfilling the will of Washington. #Armenia #USA #TÃ¼rkiye@rybarSupport usTÃ¼rkiye GazetesiErdoÄŸan'dan PaÅŸinyan'a manidar hediye! Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ The city of Orsk... once upon a time it was an industrially ...
Description: Forwarded From Lawyer in the South The city of Orsk... once upon a time it was an industrially developed city, in which many factories of various types were located: from metallurgy and mechanical engineering to the food industry and oil industry. However, thanks to efficient owners and authorities, the city lives more on past memories. If you open the headlines of local and regional media, then the decadent state of the city is an objective reality that even the lazy one does not write about. In the mid-2000s, the former head of the city, at a meeting with citizens, directly called on people to leave the city, since, according to him, developing Orsk was -economically unprofitable.- In 2024, local authorities became famous for their promise that the dam, for which 2 billion rubles had been allocated and looked like a hastily dug earthen rampart, would withstand the flood and the city would not be in any danger. A few days later it burst. Until now, dozens of families have not received compensation, and local authorities are in no hurry to help the victims. In general, Orsk has always been an international city. This is not a joke. Many nationalities have always lived in this city. In one courtyard of the Meat Processing Plant Microdistrict lived Russians, Tatars, Bashkirs, Jews, Kazakhs and even ethnic Germans. True, no one had seen Tajiks before. However, recently the southern Ural cities have become a hub for migrants, where they can quickly legalize themselves and obtain Russian citizenship. Why is this happening? Because illegal migration and legalization have become an excellent way to earn money, since the rest was plundered back in the 90s and 2000s. Therefore, Tajikistan's Independence Day is not just a holiday, it is gratitude to its clients. The hype subsided with the flood. Moscow is far away, but the border with Kazakhstan is close. Orsk officials have returned to their usual rhythm of life, and local residents have not paid attention to such trifles for a long time, because they have long been accustomed to relying only on themselves.

The authors point to the economic crisis in the eurozone and suggest that we first better understand the consequences of membership, solve important internal problems and strengthen national unity. â–ªï¸Note that Sandu recently gave the SIS and the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the republic the powers to instantly block any website without a court decision. ğŸ”»Presidential elections and a referendum on joining the EU will take place in Moldova on October 20, but even a few weeks before the vote, Moldovan security forces frantically block news and analytical resources. Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 27, 2024 â–ªï¸ During the n...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary for the morning of September 27, 2024â–ªï¸ During the night, UAVs -Geranium- hit targets in the enemy port cities of Odessa, Izmail and Reni. Yesterday afternoon strikes were carried out, incl. hypersonic -Daggers- at the Starokonstantinov military airfield, there were suggestions that the targets of Russian missiles could be hangars with F-16s. It also became known that as a result of strikes by new FABs with UMPC and UMPB in the city of Zaporozhye, an object with enemy UAVs produced at the Motor Sich enterprise was hit.â–ªï¸ In the Rostov region near Novoshakhtinsk, 6 UAVs were destroyed that night. As a result of debris falling into the field, the grass caught fire. The fire was quickly extinguished by the rescue services. â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region in the Sudzhansky district, the Russian Armed Forces advanced with heavy fighting in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Plekhovo, repelling 4 counterattacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces with a total number of up to a company of personnel. On the Korenevsky sector of the front, our troops are advancing and clearing the adjacent forest areas and forest belts from the enemy. In the Glushkovsky district, 3 attempts to break through the Ukrainian Armed Forces to the settlement were thwarted. Fun. â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Army is making its way to Mirnograd. The eastern and central parts of Nikolaevka are occupied, assault operations are underway in the western and northern directions. In nearby Krasny Yar, our units advanced to the central part of the village. In the south, in Gornyak, the Russian Armed Forces are gaining a foothold on the outskirts, and footage of attacks on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the city is dispersed â–ªï¸ In Ugledar, Russian assault groups occupied several houses in the eastern part of the city. The western part is under constant attacks from our FAB with UMPC and MLRS. â–ªï¸ In the Vremevsky direction, the front also began to move. The Russian army took up positions north of Staromayorsky in an area up to 4.5 km wide.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, near the village of Grafovka, Krasnoyaruzhsky district, a tractor working in a field ran over an explosive device, and the tractor driver was injured. In the Shebekinsky urban district, Belyanka and Bezlyudovka were shelled. In the village of Murom, as a result of an attack by an FPV drone, a private house caught fire. In the DPR, in the Petrovsky district of Donetsk, when extinguishing a fire after shelling by the Ukrainian Armed Forces, a second strike was carried out in the immediate vicinity of a fire tanker, resulting in six firefighters being injured. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Pokrovskoye direction Gornyak. The Russian army is preparing to storm the city. Two majors

Description: â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of September 20 - 26, 2024â–ªï¸Iranian proxies from Iraq do not stop trying to attack Israeli territory. Kamikaze drones and missiles were launched into the occupied Golan Heights, but without success.â–ªï¸Attacks were also carried out by pro-Iranian formations from the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic. The drones were launched towards the city of Tiberias in northeastern Israel, but were also intercepted.â–ªï¸In the Red Sea region, Ansaralli fighters tried to attack merchant ships affiliated with Israel. However, the forces of the Western naval group managed to intercept the Houthi drones.â–ªï¸In northwestern Syria, an American UAV launched two strikes on the territory of Greater Idlib. As a result, two field commanders of the terrorist group Ansar al-Islam were eliminated.â–ªï¸To the north of Latakia, militants Hayat Tahrir al-Sham attacked the positions of government troops. The military personnel of the Syrian Armed Forces managed to repel the Islamist attack, inflicting some losses.â–ªï¸Simultaneously with the attack of illegal armed groups, the Israeli Defense Forces launched a UAV in Tartus. Syrian air defense systems managed to intercept several Israeli ammunition on approach to the province.â–ªï¸Clashes broke out between pro-Turkish gangs in the Turkish-occupied territory of Syria. The reason was the reluctance of some of the militants - the Syrian National Army - to disband themselves.â–ªï¸Syrian and Russian air strikes continued on the hideouts of the terrorists -Islamic State-. At the same time, clashes were recorded between the Syrian Arab Army and jihadists near the city of Palmyra.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Also, militants from the military wing of Hamas published footage of a recent ambush on an Israeli convoy of Merkava tanks and D9 armored bulldozers. In total, the total number of people detained in the region since October 7, 2023 is 10,900. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: rumors ...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: rumors about possible negotiations on a truce; the situation is about to end September 26, 2024. The Israeli air operation - Arrows of the North - continues on the Lebanese-Israeli border. Despite reports of a decrease in the number of IDF strikes, in reality their intensity remains the same. The Israelis continue to target both the border areas in southern Lebanon and cities in other areas of the country. The IDF press service reported that over the past 24 hours, aircraft attacked more than 75 targets.â–ªï¸One of the hits was on the Lebanese part of the Mutrib checkpoint, located in the north in the border area with the Syrian province of Homs. Local news resources, citing the Syrian Ministry of Health, reported five casualties.â–ªï¸Israeli planes also once again flew around the suburbs of the Lebanese capital Beirut. According to unconfirmed reports, the target was Muhammad Hussein Surur (Abu Saleh), the commander in charge of Hezbollah's unmanned aircraft. The Lebanese themselves have not yet commented on these messages.â— According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, since yesterday, due to the actions of the Israeli army, 72 people have been killed and another 354 have been injured to varying degrees. Among them are many Syrian refugees, and 20 Lebanese were killed during air raids in the Bekaa Valley. In addition, according to the United Nations, at least 90 thousand Lebanese citizens have been forced to leave their homes since Monday, and 20 thousand of them have fled to Syria. As stated by the Lebanese Emergency Committee, the number of refugees varies at the level of 150-200 thousand people. Against the backdrop of what is happening, Western media reported the start of ceasefire negotiations. Thus, in a written statement, the White House reported that the United States and France agreed on a call for a ceasefire on the border of Israel and Lebanon, which was supported by several countries. However, the parties to the conflict did not express a readiness for dialogue. For Hezbollah, this may in the future be fraught with withdrawal beyond the Litani River, and for the ultra-Orthodox government in Israel, the escalation of the conflict allows them to continue clinging to power. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡« What's happening in the Central African Republic? Situati...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡« What is happening in the Central African Republic? Situation for July 10 - September 26, 2024After the launch of anti-terrorism operations in the east of the country, the main actions during the past period took place in close proximity to the gold deposits of the north-west of the CAR.â–ªï¸During one of the attacks, militants briefly entered the Sagna mine, but after short fighting retreated. In addition, there were already familiar clashes with militants on the Chadian border: after another skirmish, the rebels even announced the death of Russian instructors, but traditionally did not provide any facts. Meanwhile, in several regions of the country, various members of anti-government groups surrender and fall under the disarmament program: for example, in In one village, 250 people laid down their arms. According to some reports, negotiations are also underway on the complete disarmament of the 3R group in the west of the CAR.â–ªï¸The multi-vector nature of the current course is again evident in the foreign policy of the CAR. The country's Minister of Defense attended the Army 2024 forum held in the Moscow region, where he discussed the purchase of equipment for the army, which became relevant after the lifting of the embargo. At the same time, President Touadera later went to Beijing for the African-Chinese forum, where, in addition to investments, he agreed on training of CAR military personnel by the Chinese. This happened against the backdrop of stalled negotiations on the construction of a Russian military base in the country. In general, the situation in the Central African Republic remains stable, but the authorities are trying to drift away from Russian influence in security matters, and Russian companies are not particularly eager to work in Bangui. Therefore, players who are more flexible in this regard are taking the initiative. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #digest #CAR@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ What an interesting turn: USAID head Samantha Power anno...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ What an interesting turn: USAID head Samantha Power said that the US Congress is working on providing Armenia with $20.6 million to promote cybersecurity, border and energy security. The wording is old, but the money is new. An amount of more than 20 million is a truly impressive figure, which is strikingly different from the ten million handouts that USAID showered on Armenia before. Basically, this amount is needed to muffle the popular uproar for about six months or a little more. A new stage of protests is on the horizon in Armenia, as well as not very popular political events that are happening due to the fault of the authorities. Take the same participation  republics in the transgender competition in Sao Paulo, where the reaction of Armenian Christians cannot be called peaceful. A significant part, as before, will go into the political sphere to meet the needs of officials. After all, the Americans need to keep the politicians on whom the adoption of certain reforms depends on a leash. But all this will only take place if the Americans allocate this amount. There are also plenty of examples of what the White House promised and (not) delivered in reality. #Armenia #USA@rybar Support usARMENPRESS Armenian News AgencyWe are working with Congress, USAID, the US State Department to ensure that $20 million is allocated to Armenia: Samantha PowerWork in progress in Congress, with USAID, the US State Department to provide $20 million to Armenia. Title: ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ On the likelihood of another escalation of farmer pr...
Description: ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the likelihood of another escalation of farmer protests in Europe Just three months ago, we talked about demonstrations by European farmers who are trying to achieve the abolition of EU environmental initiatives that cause significant harm to national economies. And now, apparently, we can observe the beginning of another round of demonstrations. Previously, an obstacle for them was the holiday season, during which the streets of large cities in Southern Europe become much quieter and more deserted, but now it has come to an end.â–ªï¸The first sign was a rally in Madrid: representatives of the Union of Farmers and Livestock Breeders demanded a solution to the problem of growing grain imports from .n. Ukraine. Typically, Spain receives more than half of Ukrainian grain supplies to the EU.â–ªï¸Yesterday, protests moved to the port of Santander, from where food supplies are supplied to the largest Spanish retail chains. In the first half of the year, the blocking of roads in the port area led to serious disruptions in food logistics.â–ªï¸ The slogans of the demonstrators remain the same - they call on the European Commission to introduce new tools to control Ukrainian imports and regulate pricing on the market. While prices for local grain are falling, the cost of bread products is increasing.â–ªï¸ As colleagues from Spain @vakulinchuk note, local politicians are in no hurry to surprise anyone with sensational statements. For now, we are still talking about the fact that the losses suffered by the economies of European countries are not a sufficient basis for making any changes in interaction with the Ukrainian side. And, naturally, words about unity and cohesion are heard again: according to the Minister of Agriculture farms of Spain Luis Planas, trade preferences for the so-called. Ukraine - caused by obvious reasons of solidarity -.ğŸ“Œ Since no significant measures to save the European economy were taken before the elections to the European Parliament, it would be strange to expect that things will now move forward. So we are getting ready to watch the new season of this series, in which the writers are already exhausted, and the actors are tired of pronouncing the same text.#EU #Spain #Ukraine #protests@rybar together with @vakulinchukSupport usuniondeunionesUnion de Uniones congrega a mÃ¡s de 300 productores en el puerto de Santander para decir no al cereal ucraniano y pedir preciosâ€¦Ha criticado que el ministro de Agricultura, Luis Planas, quiera enfrentar agricultores y ganaderos

Title: â†©ï¸ğŸ¬ ğŸª–ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º About certain problems with systematizing your own co...
Description: Rybar: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª– Just yesterday we wrote about the issues of generalizing and systematizing combat experience in the Russian Armed Forces, when a bright illustration arrived: Those who turned in the war paid attention to the official footage of the episode of naval exercises - Ocean-2024 - to repel the landing in Kamchatka... ğŸª– ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º About certain problems with systematizing your own combat experience, which we wrote about some time ago, is clearly shown by official personnel of the Ministry of Defense from joint exercises with Laos in the Primorsky Territory. In the video, army aviation operates unguided missiles from a dive, and Su-25 attack aircraft carry out bombing from horizontal flight, as if there is no threat - from the ground - no. There is no smell of drones or at least the presence of barbecues on armored vehicles.â—ï¸The point here is not that at every exercise it is necessary to completely imitate the realities of the air defense. This is not practically feasible everywhere, and it is not always advisable: after all, many things that are now irrelevant in other conflicts may be quite in demand. But is it time to understand that the same UAVs have become an absolutely universal attribute of any modern conflict? They are already used everywhere from Africa to Myanmar, and the complete absence of this factor in the scenario of this kind of exercises somehow does not quite correspond to reality. If the problems with studying the experience of military education in third countries can still be explained by the phrase -you wonâ€™t understand until you experience it yourself-, then their presence in our country only speaks of the reluctance of some responsible people to learn. Probably there weren't enough big shots. #AFRF #Laos #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ As part of the election events, the ruling Geor...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ As part of the election events, the ruling Georgian party organized an interesting information campaign. Banners appeared in Tbilisi contrasting footage of destruction during the fighting in the so-called territory. Ukraine and pictures of prosperous Georgia. The message is simple: local voters are again reminded of the consequences of opening a -second front- against Russia, which is called for by the radically pro-Western opposition of Mikheil Saakashviliâ€™s supporters. And they seem to suggest that they draw logical conclusions themselves. Despite the simplicity of execution, the campaign turned out to be quite visual. Even the most pro-Russian citizens of Georgia see that balanced policies have led to economic growth, and trading prosperity for war in the interests of the collective West is a sad prospect. In general, all this corresponds to the main narratives of the ruling party, which seeks to decisively reduce the influence of the opposition by first defeat in the elections, and then the limitation of its power within the framework of the current legislation. At the same time, such steps do not suit the United States and the EU, which, although they have not yet introduced really serious restrictions against Georgia, are gradually increasing pressure. They also strive to weaken the position of the authorities, making them more accommodating and forcing them to act completely in the wake of Western politics. #Georgia #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

So far, plans are known to establish a council of heads of government/vice-presidents of the UTG, but it is quite possible that something more can be expected.#OTG #Turkey@rybar Support us

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ In the morning, footage appeared of another attack on...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ In the morning, footage appeared of another attack on the Motor Sich plant in occupied Zaporozhye, specializing in the production of aircraft engines. However, if previously the object was mainly attacked by OTRK-Iskander- and MLRS-Smerch- missiles, now the FAB with UMPC have been working on it. Perhaps this was a consequence of the appearance of new modifications of gliding bombs, pictures of which appeared several weeks ago. And if previously ammunition from the UMPC did not reach industrial facilities in Zaporozhye, now their range is sufficient to destroy such targets within the city limits.ğŸ“Œ If we talk about -Motor Sich-, then the enterprise, despite its location in relative proximity to the front line, is doing its job Since the beginning, SVO has not stopped and is still shipping engines for the Ukrainian Air Force. Contrary to rumors, any secret agreements and other similar things have nothing to do with it - the plant has more than once become the target of attacks. It was hit repeatedly in 2022 and 2023, and over the last six months, something flew into Motor Sich from time to time. Itâ€™s another matter to disable a huge production complex with capital workshops that are sporadic and not always extremely accurate. with blows, to put it mildly, it is very difficult. Therefore, each time the enemy patched up the holes and continued to work at Motor Sich. The situation can be corrected by regular launches of dozens of aerial bombs and missiles at specific workshops with the goal of their consistent and one-by-one destruction. But for now, in the matter of choosing targets for massive attacks, enterprises of the Ukrainian military-industrial complex are not a priority for some reasons.#Zaporozhye #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸŒ— Category: -not a day without Russophobia from Central ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ğŸŒ— Category: - not a day without Russophobia from Central Asian brothers -. A serious incident recently occurred in Tashkent. In one of the schools, a teacher attacked a student because of his request to explain the material in Russian, while adding that -Uzbekistan is for Uzbeks, and let the Russians leave.-ğŸ“Œ Chauvinism, which is now trending in the post-Soviet space, is becoming more and more widespread If a couple of years ago incidents occurred occasionally, now nationalists in Central Asia walk with their heads held high. You ask why? How could it be otherwise in the absence of any influence from the authorities? Somewhere they turn a blind eye to this, but somewhere, as, for example, in Kazakhstan, the president says that there is no trace of such a thing. But incidents with the oppression of the Russian-speaking population do arise, which completely contradicts the words of the same Tokayev. And in Uzbekistan they officially declared that nothing terrible happened at that school. The position of the Uzbek authorities is clear: they declare good neighborly relations with Russia and, in general, peace, friendship, chewing gum for everyone, and they do not need the dispersal of the incident on the Internet. However, others see this and understand that it is normal to oppress Russians. To summarize: the lack of a normal reaction on the part of local authorities, to which is added the inaction of our foreign policy bodies, leads to the spread of cave nationalism in the once fraternal countries. In their eyes, being friends with Russians becomes something... then shameful and disgusting, which leads to oppression on linguistic or national grounds, and with the same approach it will get worse in the future. Just imagine, uneducated Russophobes who hate Russia and its inhabitants with all their hearts, but come to Russia to earn money. Can we expect them to respect our laws and orders? #multinationalism #Russia@rybarSupport usTelegram The video shows that Uzbekistan is a country for Uzbeks, and let the Russians leave. In Uzbekistan, a Russian language teacher beat a schoolboy for asking to teach a lesson in Russian. A sixth-grader at a school in Tashkent objected to the teacher who taught her Russian language lesson entirely in Uzbek .â€¦

Title: â†©ï¸ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ–‡ Quite a lot of events are happening in the context of t...
Description: Rybar: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ Who knows, but the Tajik top political leadership is squeezing everything possible out of the next UN summit. While President Emomali Rahmon is holding one meeting after another on the sidelines of the summit, Tajik Foreign Minister Sirojiddin Mukhriddin spoke... ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ–‡ In the context of the UN summit in New York, quite a lot of events, various political meetings and dialogues are taking place, for example, like the ones we noted the Tajik leadership. Another country that is receiving increased attention from all sides is Iran, whose president Masoud Pezeshkian is participating in the UN summit for the first time as head of state. He has also held several high-level meetings, given interviews to various journalists and has already delivered a speech at the UN summit. But what everyone remembered was not this, but the loud headlines in the media related to Pezeshkian.â–ªï¸First, several publications published words that the Iranian leader condemns Russiaâ€™s military operation in the so-called Ukraine, which were also published in the Russian segment of the Internet. However, there is nothing of the kind on the websites and Telegram channels of Iranian state media, such as Tasnim, which raised doubts about the veracity of what was said. At the same time, the Iranians have more than once expressed their position on the NWO, saying that they support a peaceful resolution of the conflict and do not recognize Crimea as Russian territory, so Pezeshkian could have said something similar on the sidelines. One of the tasks of the Iranian government is to weaken the sanctioned pressure, and this can only be achieved negotiations with the West, so the Iranian president could please the United States and allies for the sake of demonstrating his intentions.â–ªï¸Another statement attributed to Pezeshkian was the words about Iranâ€™s readiness to get closer to Israel. They caused a stir around the world, especially against the backdrop of the start of Israelâ€™s air operation against Lebanon. Having watched the speech of the leader of the Islamic Republic, we can state that he did not say such a thing. On the contrary, he has repeatedly said that the Iranians will not leave Lebanon alone and will definitely answer for the murder of Ismail Haniyeh. Subsequently, even the Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi had to respond to the hype, who denied the statements of many information resources. From all this, several important points can be highlighted: Firstly, any publications on the Internet, even those considered respected, need to be checked, since in modern times in the world, the media is one of the tools of control and influence. Secondly, Iranâ€™s official position on the issue of air defense has not changed, itâ€™s just now in the wake of rumors about the transfer of ballistic missiles in the West they are again trying to make a sensation and create problems in relations with Russia. Thirdly, an attempt at rapprochement with the West was expected as a result of a change of government. The Pezeshkian administrationâ€™s task is to improve the economy in Iran, which will be difficult to achieve without easing Western pressure. Fourthly, the President of Iran is not the first person in the state. All important decisions are made by the Supreme Leader, who sees the development of relations with Russia as one of the ways to improve the situation in Iran itself.#Iran #mediatechnology@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About an hour ago, Russian troops launched another attack on the Starokonstantinov airfield in the Khmelnytsky region - this time they fired nothing less than four aeroballistic missiles - Kinzhal - at once. This is largely due to the presence of Soviet reinforced concrete units there, which provide better stealth and security for aircraft. This is precisely the reason for the use of Daggers to destroy an object. Despite reports of the destruction of several F-16s at Starokonstantinov, the effectiveness of the raid can be judged after the appearance of satellite images and other evidence. After all, it is unlikely that a loss of this kind will go unnoticed in the local and Western media field. And yet, a new attack on the airfield indicates consistency in the destruction of at least the infrastructure for basing American fighters. The number of Soviet reinforced concrete structures at Ukrainian airfields is still limited, and as they are destroyed, it will be much more difficult to hide F-16s.#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡¯ About the coup attempt in BeninNews about coups d'etat in West Africa have been coming with enviable regularity for the last four years. This is mainly caused, of course, by anti-colonial tendencies among the people. This was the case in Mali, Burkina Faso, Niger and Guinea. Any political disturbances in such a situation, especially not related to external actors, would be of no benefit to anyone. Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ About the defense agreement between South Korea and the Philippines Against the backdrop of relative calm in the South China Sea, the Philippines continues to gather other countries around itself to contain China. Last week, South Korea's ambassador to the country said the two sides were considering a defense agreement. ğŸ“ŒWe are talking about an agreement that will allow the Philippine and South Korean armies to participate in bilateral exercises. A similar document was recently signed between the Philippines and Japan. And although the South Korean embassy a few days later announced the absence of significant progress on this issue, the diplomats' comments hint at actively ongoing negotiations with the Philippine side. ğŸ”»It is worth noting that recently Seoul has become increasingly interested in the problem of the South China Sea. Activity in this area can be traced back to the arrival of new President Yun Seok-yeol. This is one of the main differences from past authorities, which were focused on the problems of the Korean Peninsula. Now in South Korea they are expressing intentions to cooperate with the same QUAD, and representatives of the trilateral quasi-alliance of Seoul, Washington and Tokyo are talking not only about regional problems, but also about global ones. All this, of course, plays into the hands of the still-current Joe Biden administration in forming a new security architecture in the region aimed at containing the PRC. However, we should not forget that the flirting of the South Korean authorities with the Philippine authorities could negatively affect relations between Seoul and Beijing - perhaps that is why the diplomatic authorities immediately issued a refutation of the ambassadorâ€™s words. #Republic of Korea #Philippines @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usphilstarSouth Korea embassy clarifies story on VFA with PhilippinesSouth Koreaâ€™s embassy has clarified that a possible visiting forces agreement with Manila has not been thoroughly discussed yet among relevant authorities.

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at a meeti...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at a meeting of the permanent meeting of the Security Council on nuclear deterrenceğŸ”»Main points: â–ªï¸The use of nuclear forces is an extreme measure to protect the country's sovereignty. â–ªï¸ Reliable information about the launch of aerospace attack weapons towards the Russian Federation will entail a nuclear response.â–ªï¸ A critical threat to the sovereignty of the Russian Federation and non-nuclear weapons will be the basis for a nuclear response.â–ªï¸ Russia is obliged to take into account the emergence of new sources of military threats and risks for itself and its allies. â–ªï¸Russia reserves the right to use nuclear weapons in the event of aggression against Belarus. â–ªï¸The Russian Federation may consider the use of nuclear weapons after reliable data on the massive launch of missiles and UAVs when crossing the border.â–ªï¸The Russian Federation takes a highly responsible approach to nuclear weapons issues, trying to prevent the proliferation of nuclear weapons and their components.â–ªï¸Russia has expanded the category of states and military alliances against which nuclear deterrence is carried out.â–ªï¸Today, the nuclear triad remains the most important guarantee of the security of our state.â–ªï¸In the updated version of the document, aggression against Russia by any non-nuclear state, but with the participation or support of a nuclear state, is proposed to be considered as a joint attack on Russian Federation.#digest #Russia@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About incidents in Japanese airspace Monday in Ja...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About incidents in Japanese airspace Monday in Japan was marked by a loud news event - a Russian plane entered the countryâ€™s airspace. Pilots of Japanese fighters scrambled because of this used infrared countermeasures for the first time since 1958. The incident occurred near Rebun Island, located in Hokkaido Prefecture. Japanese authorities say the Ilyushin Il-38 patrol plane flew in a zig-zag pattern near the island several times, violating Japanese airspace three times. ğŸ“ŒIn approximately the same area, by the way, the Russian-Chinese exercises - Beibu / Interaction - 2024 - are currently being held. Most likely, the Il-38 was also involved in training. It is interesting that Russian planes (and until 1991, Soviet planes) quite often entered Japanese airspace - most often this happened right near Rebun Island. However, this did not cause such a reaction from the military. Why did this happen now? The fact is that just a few weeks before this incident, a Chinese Y-9 reconnaissance aircraft violated the countryâ€™s airspace for the first time - this happened near the Danjo Islands in Nagasaki Prefecture. Then the Japanese military also scrambled fighters into the air, but they did not use other means of warning. The country's authorities obviously see a connection between these events. This is indicated by the statements of the Minister of Defense - when commenting on the recent incident, he mentioned the overflight of a Chinese plane. Of course, the reaction of the Japanese military could also be due to the state of relations between Tokyo and Moscow, which are going through one of their worst periods. In 2019, for example, a Russian plane that twice violated the countryâ€™s airspace was met only by fighter jets of the self-defense forces. However, China most likely played a role in the recent incident. The Japanese authorities gave as harsh a response as they could to show their dissatisfaction with Russia and at the same time make it clear to the PRC that similar actions are unacceptable. High resolution mapEnglish version#China #Russia #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Title: ğŸ” Espionage, lobbying, migration... It would seem, what does Lon...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Lugovoy. State DumaEspionage, lobbying, migration... It would seem, what does London have to do with it? An investigation into how the British planned to create a migration collapse in Russia through Russian NGOs confirms the scale and depth of the pit. Pay attention to the dates of the creation of the so-called human rights organizations. It's not even the day before yesterday. The Foreign Office has been entrenched in Russia for a long time and firmly. With money from the British Foreign Office, a whole network of organizations was created, the essence of which was not only the importation of migrants to the Russian Federation, but also their illegal settlement in the country. Migrants were supposed to become the electorate for the liberal party - Yabloko - it is clear that the electorate was protest and, most importantly, thoughtless and obedient in management. Migrants with full civil rights, a voice, capable of influencing political, social, and humanitarian decisions. Human rights activists collected this black force so that one day it could -shoot- and provoke internal conflicts in the country. Illegal immigrants were provided with support at various levels: from delivery to Russia to legal and financial assistance. The sponsors of the coming migration chaos were: Amnesty International, the European Commission, as well as the CAF-Russia Foundation, which itself is funded by the British Foreign Office. The fund acts as a financial cushion for the British Foreign Office to transfer money to Russian NGOs in order to conceal the foreign origin of the funds. In the 90s, it was the CAF that was the key structure that helped launch many NGOs in Russia. Not so long ago, the head of British military intelligence, Adrian Bird, reported on the priorities of his department. Among the top threats, even higher than Russia, which will remain the biggest threat to mainland Britain until 2030, is the migration crisis. That is, London is aware of the role of migrants who not only provoke a humanitarian crisis, but also create extremist communities and terrorist cells. If on their island they are trying (although they are doing poorly, as evidenced by large-scale protests and pogroms in Great Britain due to the dominance of migrants) to curb this force, then in Russia it is the other way around - the Anglo-Saxons are provoking a migration boom and want to use illegal immigrants to undermine society. Foreign investments - in the field of labor migration, lobbying for the priority of the rights of migrants, as well as the deliberate lack of adaptation and integration of those coming to Russia, must be stopped. And those involved in the operations of the British intelligence services to promote the migration boom have been prosecuted.â¡ï¸@lugovoyandrey | ğŸ’¬Discuss in the chatProject -Rybar -How Russian NGOs lobbied for migration with money from the British Foreign Office Some time ago it became known that six employees of the political department of the British Embassy were expelled from Moscow - signs were found in their actions...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Slobozhanskoye direction: oncoming battles in the Glub...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦Slobozhansk direction: oncoming battles in the Glubokoe area and the battle for Volchansk situation as of 16:00 September 25, 2024 Fierce fighting resumed in the Slobozhansk direction along the entire length of the front from Liptsy to Volchansk. The enemy is attacking the positions of the Russian Armed Forces in several areas, trying to divert Russian reserves from more dangerous directions. â–ªï¸In the area of â€‹â€‹the Deep unit of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, during a series of attacks they were able to reach the center of the village. Previously, footage of mechanized attacks by Ukrainian formations on the positions of Russian troops in forest belts south of the village had already appeared on the Internet, but it was difficult to assess the scale of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ advance. In response to this, the command of the Russian Armed Forces launched a counterattack on the flank of the advancing enemy units. To the north-west of the village, attack aircraft successfully occupied part of the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, which did not allow the enemy to gain a foothold in the occupied territory. Despite some successes in the area, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are unable to turn the tide of the battles for the village in their favor. Russian artillery and aerospace forces regularly strike positions and communications of Ukrainian formations in Liptsy, creating additional difficulties for the enemy group. â–ªï¸Ukrainian formations are not giving up attempts to take control of Staritsa. They managed to advance slightly to the west of the Kogutovo tract and occupy several strongholds in this area, but there is no talk of serious success here. Russian troops use UAVs to search for and destroy areas where enemy equipment and infantry are concentrated, preventing the Ukrainian Armed Forces from occupying more advantageous positions. â–ªï¸Yesterday, footage from the enemy appeared in the information field, demonstrating the entry of assault groups of the Armed Forces of Ukraine into the territory of the Volchansky Aggregate Plant. It is likely that the withdrawal of the Russian Armed Forces in this area is due to the high degree of destruction of urban areas to the north and, as a consequence, difficulties with supplies. After units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine entered the territory of the plant, they were hit by TOS -Solntsepek-. Considering the high degree of ruination of the industrial zone and the lack of established crossings across Volchya, it can be assumed that the enemy will face similar supply problems when holding the territory of the enterprise. Separate groups of Ukrainian Armed Forces infantry were also seen to the north, in the area of â€‹â€‹Shevchenko Street. Nevertheless, it is premature to talk about the enemyâ€™s consolidation in the area due to the lack of reliable shelters for attack aircraft here that can protect against regular attacks by the Russian Aerospace Forces and drone strikes. â—ï¸Today, Volchansk is mostly ruins, the retention of which is expensive for both sides. The regular exchange of artillery strikes and the combat work of the Russian Armed Forces aviation destroyed most of the city blocks. And if the strategic importance of the city for Russian troops is to attract the attention of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, then for the enemy, control over it is primarily of media importance against the backdrop of failures in other sectors of the front. â–ªï¸To the east of Volchansk, Russian attack aircraft established control over the northwestern outskirts of the Pacific, knocking out the enemy from several strong points. The center of the village is currently in the gray zone. Units of the Russian Armed Forces are also fighting in the vicinity of a populated area with the goal of taking the Ukrainian formations defending there into a semi-encirclement. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @ rybar_feedback_botHigh resolution mapEnglish version#Volchansk #digest #map #Russia #Ukraine #Kharkov@rybarSupport us

However, from the moment of its creation until 2022, the UTG did not have truly significant achievements. The biggest event, I remember, was a photograph in which the Xinjiang-Uyghur region of the People's Republic of China and the Russian regions of Altai and Siberia were included in the so-called Turkic world. But since 2022, the organization has begun quite active work on the implementation of various programs in the fields of education and culture. While the Russian authorities were distracted by the West, the influence of the Organization of Turkic States in the region was strengthening. And it would seem that the Turks had already tried to do something similar, but it was all unsuccessful. However, from chaotic cries about the unity of the Turkic nations in the bloc they moved to a more consistent policy, first focusing on education, and now moving on to military cooperation, which creates quite tangible threats to regional stability.#OTG #Turkey@rybar Support usTelegramDTMğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Not in alphabet united: about the scientific and educational expansion of Turkey in the post-Soviet space â–ªï¸The summit of the Organization of Turkic States, which will be held in Bishkek on October 24, will by all signs be significant. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ How âš¡ï¸NATO countries use the experience of the military conf...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors How âš¡ï¸NATO countries use the experience of the military conflict in Ukraine The general trend is to increase military budgets, the production of ammunition and military equipment, and the search for ways to attract recruits to the army. At the same time, there is an enlargement of units and a search for new technologies capable of suppressing the enemyâ€™s capabilities in conditions of general awareness of the warring parties. NATO exercises held in the Netherlands from September 10 to 20, 2024, on combating UAVs (C-UAS), were indicative. As part of the exercise, electronic warfare stations, anti-drone drones and cyber interceptors were used. For the first time, specialists from Ukraine took part in them, which means a direct transfer of experience in countering Russian UAVs to the Alliance countries. All the best developments in counter-UAV technologies are planned to be included in NATOâ€™s Integrated Air and Missile Defense (IAMD), elements of which are already being tested in Ukraine. In addition, the United States has begun implementing a special program -Replicator-, in August 2023, aimed at increasing production and accelerating the introduction of small UAVs (similar to DJI) into troops to create superiority over China. The Pentagon has already ordered 344 Teal 2 quadcopters from Teal Drones in 2023. As part of the program, in March 2024, the US Department of Defense ordered the first batch of unmanned surface vehicles (UAVs) Swiftships Swift-Sea-Stalker (S3). The UAV is capable of traveling up to 1,852 km and reaching speeds of up to 55 km/h. The device is designed for reconnaissance missions, but can carry up to 650 kg of payload. Its design visually resembles the BECs used in the Black Sea by Ukraine.ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±The Poles also joined the race of unmanned technologies. Polska Grupa Militarna S.A. presented a prototype of a lightweight multi-purpose maritime drone, ReconSea, which can carry 80-140 kg of explosives over a range of up to 100 km. Thanks to the design features (presence of hydrofoils) it is capable of accelerating to 70 km/h.  The company has also developed the concept of the ground-based unmanned platform ReconPATROL.ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§The British Navy is looking for solutions to introduce reconnaissance UAVs (helicopter-type) and UAVs into the fleet, which will complement and strengthen warships. BEC is being tested on the basis of rigid inflatable boats Pacific 24 and 950  with a 12.7 mm machine gun, which can also  be used as a kamikaze. âœ¨Ukraine remains a training ground for NATO to practice military tactics and test equipment in order to further direct this experience against Russia and China. Two majors

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the meeting of diplomats from the United State...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the meeting of diplomats from the United States, South Korea and Japan On September 24, a meeting of the heads of foreign affairs of the United States, South Korea and Japan was held on the sidelines of the UN. In addition to the already boring mantras about the need to respond to the rapprochement between Russia and the DPRK, the parties confirmed their intentions to formalize trilateral cooperation. In particular, they talked about a joint summit of the countries' leaders, at which it is planned to create a secretariat responsible for relations between Washington, South Korea and Japan and the implementation of concluded agreements. ğŸ“ŒThis need is really overdue for them. The fact is that a quasi-union between states actually does not have a strong basis behind it. This means that a change of power in a particular country can, in the worst case scenario, nullify all the progress achieved. â–ªï¸The likelihood of worsening relations in this triangle is very real. There will be elections in the United States in November, which Donald Trump may win. Considering his previous presidential term, he could create certain difficulties for South Korea and Japan.â–ªï¸In addition, elections for the leader of Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party will be held at the end of September. Some of the most popular candidates for the position differ from current moderate conservative Fumio Kishida, for example by taking a hard line on the country's imperial past, a highly sensitive issue in South Korea. ğŸ”»Therefore, it is now important for the parties to record the progress made in containing the DPRK. Well, to lay the foundation for an alliance that is interested not only in the Korean Peninsula, but also in the region as a whole. In this case, even under the worst scenarios, the trilateral format, which will already be based on specific legal agreements, will be difficult to pause. #Republic of Korea #USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usYonhap News Agency(2nd LD) S. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ -There is no greater love than that if someone lays down his...
Description: Forwarded From Older than the Edda - There is no greater love than this, if someone lays down his soul for his friends -. September 22, 2024, the 144th Guards Motorized Rifle Division storms Nevskoye. Private 59th Tank Regiment Maxim Olegovich Presnyakov is given the task of leading an assault group into a populated area and evacuating the wounded. On his infantry fighting vehicle, reinforced with additional protection and automatic fire extinguishing equipment, he flies into the village, being under incessant artillery fire and drone strikes. The vehicle periodically bursts into flames, and shells explode directly on the armor. Private Presnyakov carries out the task of unloading the attack aircraft and goes after the wounded, three heavy ones are loaded into the armor, after which Maxim rushes back. All this time he is beaten, beaten and beaten, but he saves everyone by driving his burning car to the rear area. The enemy posted a video of Maximâ€™s defeat on his channels, but the Little Russian, as always, lied. Maxim is alive, almost healthy (mild concussion), and all the wounded have been saved. Moreover, Private Presnyakovâ€™s infantry fighting vehicle requires little repair and is operational. I really hope that the guy will be awarded, a most worthy feat. In general, watch the video and you will understand everything yourself. Video is too big
