Title: ğŸ” The fact that in Abkhazia, which a little more than fully exis...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev The fact that in Abkhazia, which exists more than entirely on Russian money, a photo of the murderer of children and women, terrorist Shamil Basayev, hangs in the museum should not surprise anyone. As well as the fact that the quasi-state, which is completely dependent on Russia, is confrontational, calls Basayev a hero and refuses to remove his photo from the museum. This is a general trend, and itâ€™s only in Abkhazia. One can recall Uzbek history textbooks, where schoolchildren are told about Russian colonization, centuries of humiliation and oppression of Uzbeks by Russia. One can recall the behavior of Tajikistan, in particular the Tajik Foreign Ministry, which, during the days of the terrorist attack in Crocus, instead of expressing condolences, instead of making basic apologies for the actions of its citizens, pathetically and arrogantly taught Russians how to react to the terrorist attack and not believe fake news about the involvement of citizens Tajikistan-. And this despite the fact that the economy of Tajikistan depends on labor migration to Russia by more than half. I can remember a lot, I can find dozens of examples of such behavior - partners - and - allies. But is it worth it? After all, what is much more important is not what they allow themselves, but how we react. But we donâ€™t react at all. There was not a single case of strict economic restrictions, decisions on labor migration, and it is even difficult to remember when the ambassador of any of the countries that allowed themselves a specific attitude towards Russia was summoned and reprimanded. Well, systemic permissiveness gives rise to impunity, this is an axiom. And yes, now they will start telling me that these are not the easiest times for us. Sanctions, the economy depends on parallel imports and gray schemes. But the countries of Central Asia still depend much more on Russia. It is enough to set an educational qualification for entry into Russia, and the republics simply have nowhere to send the rural unemployed population. Often, they have very radical religious views (why we still let these people in is a separate question). But Abkhazia is even more dependent on Russia. But, I repeat, we are now dealing with an advanced problem. It needs to be resolved, and we shouldnâ€™t assume that tough rhetoric or consistently tough actions in response can create any problems for us. Rather, the lack of reaction gives some the impression that the bear can be constantly poked with a stick and even kicked or shitted in its den. This doesnâ€™t really affect the image of the bear. https://t.me/Hard_Blog_Line/9866TelegramHard BlogReceived video confirmation. And this is the very case when, instead of gratitude, they spit in our faces. How Basayev showed himself in Abkhazia no longer matters. He has tarnished himself so much that none of his past merits can serve as an excuse for the Abkhaz side...

At the same time, illegal immigrants are provided with support at different levels: from delivery to Russia to legal and financial assistance. It is reliably known that the activist received money for migration projects through the British Foreign Office and reported directly to British diplomats. ğŸ”»Read more about how the Foreign Office sponsored and gradually created a network of organizations in Russia lobbying for migration policy - read on our website.#Great Britain #article #Russia @rybar together with @pezdicideSupport us

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 25, 2024 â–ªï¸ By nightfall...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 25, 2024â–ªï¸ By nightfall, the enemy reported a missile attack on the port of Yuzhny in the Odessa region. In addition, for the third evening in a row, the Russian Armed Forces hit enemy targets in the city of Zaporozhye.â–ªï¸ Over the past days, important events have unfolded in Ugledar in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction. After several weeks of offensive operations by the Russian Army, the city was taken almost completely; yesterday evening there remained a narrow corridor and one road to the north for the Ukrainian Armed Forces. According to some reports, the road is under our fire control; the only escape route for the enemy remains through the fields. Artillery strikes of all types and aviation on Ugledar have been seriously intensified, and footage of the presence of advanced groups of our infantry in the city has circulated. At the same time, front-line soldiers warn about the inadmissibility of victory reports before the combat mission is resolved: against the backdrop of the unsuccessful offensive of our troops on Ugledar last year, the Ukrainian Armed Forces turned it into a powerful fortified area, which the Russian Armed Forces are breaking into by broadly covering it and depriving the enemy of supplies. Thus, to the west of the city, our units north of Prechistovka advanced in an area up to 4 km wide to a depth of up to 2 km, taking positions along the Berestov beam.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, fighting continues in the Glushkovsky district of the Kursk region. The Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying to break through in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Krasnooktyabrsky and Veseloye. In the Korenevsky district, fighting continues near Lyubimovka, at the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Olgovka and the settlement. Our Tolstoy Lug strikes with drones and heavy aerial bombs. They report active actions of the Russian Armed Forces in the south of the Sudzhansky district in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Plekhovo. â–ªï¸ In the Kharkov direction, as a result of counterattacks by elite units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the enemy occupied the ruins of the Volchansky aggregate plant on our bank of the river. Wolf. Against the backdrop of the frozen offensive of the Russian Army in the direction, this event does not carry prospects for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and the occupied buildings of the plant themselves will become a point of attraction for the FAB and the UMPC. â–ªï¸ In the Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky) direction there are reports of heavy fighting in the city, in which our troops continue to fight in the building.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction there are battles in Nikolaevka, the Russian Army surrounds Selidovo. The logistics of the Armed Forces of Ukraine near Tsukurino are breaking down, and the battle is unfolding for Gornyak. They reported on the successes of our troops in the Desired Second.â–ªï¸ In the evening, the Ukrainian Armed Forces again struck at the civilian population of Belgorod, wounding five civilians. In the city of Shebekino, one civilian was wounded. There, as a result of the shelling, there are local breaks in the power lines. Konovalovo, Volokonovsky district, was shelled.â–ªï¸ In the Kherson region, they also reported an intensification of attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces on civilians. In Novaya Kakhovka, a 75-year-old woman was seriously injured in both legs in her own home. In Kakhovka, two people were wounded: a 70-year-old woman and a 52-year-old man. In the village of Podokalinovka, Aleshkinsky district, a 42-year-old local resident was wounded.â–ªï¸ In the DPR, one civilian was killed and 11 were injured from shelling by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, including a teenager born in 2009. The strikes occurred in Donetsk and Gorlovka, and the death of the head of the fire and rescue squad was reported. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Ugledar under fire from our troops Two majors

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Yuzhnodonetsk direction: worsening operational crisis...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Yuzhnodonetsk direction: worsening operational crisis of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and the assault on Ugledar situation as of 21.00 September 24, 2024 Over the past week, Russian troops were able to achieve significant successes in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, advancing in several sectors. And while today Ukrainian media resources were trying to somehow justify the depressing situation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Ugledar area, footage of Russian attack aircraft entering the city from the dachas appeared on the Internet. â–ªï¸On the northern flank, Russian units established full control over the territory of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 3 mine, on the roof of the administrative building of which the flags of several units were fixed. The area adjacent to the mine was also cleared. â–ªï¸To the south, the situation in the vicinity of the waste heap at the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 1 mine remains unclear. At the moment, the hill itself, as well as the area to the east of it, is in the gray zone. However, judging by the current situation in the direction, in the near future we can expect a quick transition to the control of the Russian Armed Forces of both the waste heap itself and the territory nearby. â–ªï¸In Ugledar, Russian attack aircraft are present at least on the eastern outskirts of the settlement: according to footage that appeared on the Internet, military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces occupied the buildings of a former bakery and pumping station. And in the future we can expect an offensive towards both the city center and the garage cooperative, which is located in the northeastern part of Ugledar. It is noteworthy that the enemyâ€™s media resources depict a much more depressing situation for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, increasingly hinting at the imminent fall of the Ukrainian garrison in the city. In particular, the description of the situation often comes down to one thought: itâ€™s too late to talk about holding positions; the lives of members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are more important. Although no matter how much I would like to see the Ugledar epic end as soon as possible, without the appropriate personnel it is extremely premature to talk about the occupation of the city - the Ukrainian formations turned the settlement into one continuous fortified area and its loss would be quite a strong media blow for the enemy. â–ªï¸The dachas located south of Ugledar are also highly likely to have come under the control of Russian troops. In their eastern part, servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces gained a foothold a few days ago, however, given the start of the fighting for the city, it is virtually pointless for the Ukrainian Armed Forces units to hold the western half. â–ªï¸In neighboring Pavlovka, Russian troops were able not only to level the control zone along the Kashlagach River, but also to occupy the territory of farms in the northern part of the village. Advancement in this area has already allowed the Russian Armed Forces to establish fire control over the C051134 highway towards Bogoyavlenka, significantly complicating the supply of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Russia #Ugledar #Ukraine@rybar together with @voin_dvSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: IDF announcement of an air operation in Lebanon situation at the end of September 24, 2024 The Israeli Air Force continues to launch massive attacks on the territory of the neighboring Republic of Lebanon. Against the backdrop of what is happening in the Israel Defense Forces, they announced the start of Operation Hetzei HaTzaphon (Arrows of the North). Due to the peculiarities of translation from Hebrew into English and then into Russian, as well as in attempts to catch the wave, some resources reported already about the beginning of the offensive of Israeli units in southern Lebanon. In fact, the actions of the Israelis are so far limited to air strikes.â–ªï¸Today's Israeli air strikes occurred not only in the border areas of Lebanon: settlements located more than 100 kilometers from the border with Israel, including Ain Al, were also attacked. â–ªï¸In addition, the Ad-Dahiya district, Hezbollahâ€™s patrimony in Beirut, was once again struck. The IDF press service announced the liquidation of the commander of the missile unit of the Shiite group, Ibrahim Muhammad al-Kubaisi. At the same time, Arabic-language media have not yet commented on this message. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, 558 people have been killed and 1,853 injured since yesterday. The mass exodus of Lebanese from the southern part of the country also continues: they are fleeing to the cities of Tripoli and Beirut, as well as to the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic. Hezbollah fighters also do not stop shelling Israeli territory in response: more than 100 rockets have been fired since the morning. Most were either intercepted by Israeli missile defense systems or fell in open areas. Only a small number of shells managed to land within populated areas, causing minor damage. Based on the reported hits, the Lebanese groupâ€™s forces also expanded the shelling zone by more than 100 kilometers. This is confirmed, among other things, by yesterdayâ€™s arrivals of missiles fired by Hezbollah into the territory of the Palestinian Authority in the West Bank.ğŸ”»Despite the rather tense situation, so far the parties are limited to only massive strikes on each otherâ€™s positions. At the same time, the current ultra-Orthodox authorities in Israel do not stop their attempts to provoke the Lebanese to a more serious response. Until then, Hezbollah is trying not to give the far-right government of Benjamin Netanyahu a reason to unleash a full-fledged Third Lebanon War. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ There are few absolutely clear heroes in world history; ever...
Description: Forwarded From Tina Kandelaki There are few absolutely unambiguous heroes in world history; if you dig around, you can find some kind of black spot in each of them. But there are characters who, through their crimes, have completely undone everything good that they have ever done. It is sad that not everyone in Abkhazia understands this basic truth. Otherwise, there would not have been an exhibition dedicated to Shamil Basayev in the State Museum in Sukhum, restored with Russian money. Well, we will have to remind those who have forgotten that the Hero of Abkhazia Basayev in Russia most willingly fought with the unarmed, women and children. The terrorist attack at a Beslan school in September 2004 killed 333 people, including 186 children. The terrorist attack at the Dubrovka theater center in Moscow in October 2002 killed 130 people, including 10 children. The terrorist attack in Budennovsk in June 1995, when 129 people died in a hospital seized by terrorists. Basayev publicly and willingly took responsibility for all these terrible crimes, and personally led the raid on Budennovsk. I will not make generalizations and ask what kind of country is this if it has such heroes? Iâ€™ll just note that the State Museum of Abkhazia still has the opportunity to make an official apology to Russian representatives. Just apologize, there is no need to explain anything, everything is clear. The answer to the question of how it happened that a terrorist still bears the title of -Hero- in a country whose very existence is possible only thanks to Russia should not be given by museum employees, but by completely different people. UPD: The museum in Abkhazia quickly closed access to exhibition. That's what popular outrage does.

Title: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡© About the demographic catastrophe in Moldova and why it is b...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡© About the demographic catastrophe in Moldova and why it is beneficial to the West Moldova took first place in Europe in the outflow of citizens abroad. This was stated by the presidential candidate of the republic, Alexander Stoianoglo, promising, if elected, to ensure stimulation of the birth rate and conditions for a dignified return of fellow citizens home. â–ªï¸Everyone admits that Moldova is moving towards a demographic catastrophe. Although in late Soviet times Moldova was in second place in the USSR in terms of population growth dynamics, and now its population has dropped to the level of 1956.â–ªï¸The mass outflow from the country has intensified in recent years due to the socio-economic crisis. More than 40% of Moldovans aged 15 to 34 chose to leave the country amid fears of becoming unemployed. For example, in 2023 the birth rate fell by 11% compared to 2022. â–ªï¸However, President Maia Sandu, in the spirit of populism, assures that the outflow of young people is caused by the rule of her predecessors, who undermined -faith in democracy-. â–ªï¸True, the demographic situation became critical during Sanduâ€™s reign. Instead of concrete steps in social policy, the president prefers to intimidate the population by announcing the Russian threat and increasing the military budget by 70% at the expense of other areas, which certainly does not contribute to the birth rate. However, Sanduâ€™s officeâ€™s recipe for solving the problem is a gradual merger with Romania , for which Moldovans are encouraged to identify themselves as Romanians. â–ªï¸However, even a possible unification of the countries will not solve the problem, given that the Romanian authorities are extremely dismissive of the Moldovans who live even in eastern Romania, historical Moldova. The region is deliberately not being developed, and there are also colossal problems with demography and economics. ğŸ”»From all this, it is clear that neither Sandu nor her curators simply need to solve the demographic problem. After all, Moldova is already considered as a gray zone between the Russian Federation and NATO and a convenient military training ground next to the so-called. Ukraine. As a last resort, the West will propose to populate Moldova with illegal migrants. New controlled countries on the periphery of Europe will do just that. At least such negotiations are already underway with Armenia. #Moldova #Russia #Romania #EU @rybarSupport usRIA NovostiMoldova has become a leader in Europe in the departure of citizens, Stoianoglo saidMoldova has lost about a third of its citizens due to the mass exodus of the population, the ex-Prosecutor General and presidential candidate said at a briefing on Monday... Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ On guarantees of security of the southern borders of...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ On guarantees for the security of Armeniaâ€™s southern borders Anna Grigoryan, a member of the parliamentary faction of the opposition bloc -Armenia, said that the government of Nikol Pashinyan will soon put on the agenda the issue of the withdrawal of Russian border guards from the Armenian-Iranian and Armenian-Turkish border. ğŸ“Œ Let us remind you that border control of the borders of Armenia is carried out by the FSB of the Russian Federation, since Armenians do not have enough personnel and resources to protect them. At the same time, Russian border guards have already been withdrawn from Yerevan airport - Zvartnots -.â–ªï¸The border with Iran in the south of Armenia is directly related to the issue of the status of the Syunik region, through which it is planned to open the Zangezur corridor connecting Turkey and Azerbaijan. â–ªï¸According to Grigoryan, all statements by the Armenian side demanding respect for the sovereignty of Armenia have no relation to reality: in fact, they are aimed at ousting Russia from the region. â–ªï¸The opening of the corridor is a matter of time and now a struggle is unfolding between global players for control over it. Pashinyan contradicts himself when he talks about protecting the sovereignty of Armenia in Syunik, since at the same time he declares that control over the road will be transferred to a third party - - private security organization - or troops of other countries. â–ªï¸In Syunik, despite the deployment of the Russian garrison since 2020, there is an EU monitoring mission that is engaged in active PR on social networks, mastering the role of a guarantor of regional security (not always successfully). â–ªï¸In recent months, Syunik has been actively visited by American and European officials. At the same time, it is known that the Armenian authorities are deliberately delaying the opening of the Russian consulate in Syunik Kapan, which should have opened at the beginning of this year. Obviously, the issue of ousting Russia from the region is key on the agenda for Pashinyan and his curators. It is not without reason that the Armenian prime minister recently decided to declare that the CSTO allegedly threatens the national security of Armenia, which foreshadows concrete steps in the future. Washington is openly talking about its ambitions to oust Russia from the region. However, such a castling will lead to much more unpredictable consequences, given the complex configuration of interests of other regional players larger than Armenia. However, the Americans themselves do not hide this, directly calling on Armenians to prepare for difficult times. #Armenia #Russia #USA @rybarSupport usVerelq NewsThe issue of ousting Russian border guards from the border with Iran will soon be put on the agenda. Grigoryan noted that the matter will not be limited to ousting the Russian side from this project.

Title: ğŸ–¼ âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ–#Comic from Fisherman No. 30: Once upon a time at ...
Description: âš¡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ–#Comic from Rybar No. 30: Once Upon a Time Since sea and air drones have become almost the main threat to Russian infrastructure, the Russian Armed Forces and volunteers are constantly looking for solutions on how to effectively counter them. But sometimes the solution becomes not the most obvious, but at the same time simple ideas. Shooting down BECs from helicopters is just one of those things. And our new episode is about how this idea was born and why pilots like it so much. Synopsis: The Ukrainian Armed Forces are trying by all means to inflict damage on military - and, indeed, civilian - targets in Russia. Instead of effective long-range weapons, the Armed Forces of Ukraine use a large number of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and unmanned boats (UBC). Single BECs can damage port infrastructure or a sea vessel. They became a real headache, which turned out to be quite difficult to deal with. And so, helicopters proved to be an effective means in the fight against this type of weapon. They patrol the sea in search of targets and, hovering in the air, practice targeting BECs using onboard weapons. But not everything is so simple: the enemy does not sit idly by, he changes and improves both attack tactics and the devices themselves. In addition to the usual custom kamikaze boats, BECs armed with missiles, and BECs equipped with guides for MLRS projectiles, and BECs with reinforced hulls, whose task is to divert fire onto themselves while the rest of the flock of drones is trying to break through to the target...ğŸ“Œ You can download the comic using the links: RU | EN | AR | CN#Russia #Ukraine @rybarWe hope you liked the comic from our artists. We will be glad to receive any support (here is a convenient link to payment via SBP).

Title: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Presidential elections in Moldova: about the problems of...
Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Presidential elections in Moldova: about the problems of political representation of the diaspora in the Russian Federation Representatives of the Moldovan diaspora in Russia recently expressed outrage at the decision of the Central Election Commission of Moldova to open only five polling stations in the Russian Federation. â–ªï¸The Central Election Commission of Moldova will send only five thousand ballots to each polling station, that is, only 25 thousand out of almost 100 thousand representatives of the diaspora will be able to cast their votes. â–ªï¸The Cultural and Educational Center of Moldova in Stavropol said that the authorities know that we are against it, that there are many of us, thatâ€™s why they do such dirty tricks. â—ï¸The foreign diaspora plays a colossal role in the Moldovan elections, given the large-scale labor migration of Moldovans. â–ªï¸In 2019, 13,995 people voted in the second round of the presidential elections in Moldova in the Russian Federation.â–ªï¸In France, Germany and the UK, Moldovan citizens cast at least 20 thousand votes. For example, in Italy alone, the candidacy of incumbent President Maia Sandu received 80,140 votes.â–ªï¸In the parliamentary elections in the summer of 2021, Sanduâ€™s now ruling PAS party won a crushing victory based on the results of foreign voting, receiving 182,654 votes - 85.98%.â–ªï¸Experience previous elections demonstrates the critical importance of foreign voting for Sandu's office. That is why the current president, throughout her entire term, met with representatives of the diaspora during any business trip to the West.â–ªï¸The election fraud of Sanduâ€™s office is also voting by mail only for selected countries: the USA, Canada, Iceland, Norway, Finland and Sweden. Obviously, voting by mail was not provided for Moldovans in Russia, since Sanduâ€™s office is unlikely to get the desired result from them than from countries of friendly democracy.â–ªï¸Letâ€™s not forget that the Central Election Commission of Moldova is under the direct control of the American USAID and the British UK Aid, so there is no way to say that there is any transparency in the electoral process. ğŸ”»However, along with such trends, it is necessary to note the passivity of the Moldovan diaspora in the Russian Federation, with which, unlike Western diasporas, no one is working systematically so far. Even despite the fact that pro-Romanian and anti-Russian forces have long come to power in Moldova. In this context, statements by Sandu and Western representatives about Russian interference in the Moldovan elections look especially ridiculous. #Moldova #Russia   @rybarSupport usSputnik MoldovaDiaspora - about the CECâ€™s decision to open only 5 polling stations in Russia: we were deprived of the right to voteCitizens of Moldova living in Russia are outraged by the CECâ€™s decision to open only five polling stations in the Russian Federation.

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 24, 2024 â–ªï¸ Activity con...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 24, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, enemy activity continues to the south of the settlement. In the future, this will allow us to reach the line along the river. Oskol, and also forms a semi-encirclement of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on our bank of the river.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Army, moving west from Ukrainsk, reached the northern outskirts of Tsukurino. To the south there are battles on the approaches to Gornyak, the Russian Armed Forces also fought in the neighboring Zhelanny Vtoroy, closing the pincers to Krasnogorovka. â–ªï¸ Ukrainian Armed Forces forces in Ugledar are under threat of encirclement. The only road from the city to Epiphany is under our fire. They reported about our advanced units within the city.â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye Front, a significant element of the situation was the use by the Russian Armed Forces of new aerial bombs with UMPC and UPMB on targets in the regional capital. â–ªï¸ Mutual strikes across the Dnieper River continue in the Kherson direction. On our shore in Kakhovka, a 38-year-old local resident received multiple shrapnel wounds, the wife of the head doctor of the front-line Aleshkinsky district hospital, Doctor, was killed, and the head doctor himself was wounded.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, as a result of an attack by the Armed Forces of Ukraine, three civilians, including a child, died in the village of Arkhangelskoye, Shebekinsky city district, four (including two children) were injured. Cheremoshnoye, Belgorod district, was shelled; in Shebekino, a kamikaze drone attacked a parked car. In the evening, in the Belgorod region, near the village of Yasnye Zori, a drone struck a moving car. In the Grayvoronsky municipal district, a drone attacked a combine harvester working in a field. In the village of Vyazovoe, Krasnoyaruzhsky district, as a result of an FPV drone attack, the glazing was knocked out and the faÃ§ade of a social facility was cut. In the city of Shebekino, a drone attacked an apartment building.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in Donetsk, the Armed Forces of Ukraine used cluster artillery munitions, a man born in 1961 was injured. In Gorlovka, a man born in 1950 was injured as a result of a cannon artillery strike from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk regionIn the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. Tolsty Lug, the enemy is holding the defense, our troops are pushing back the Ukrainian Armed Forces from the west. The footage shows the use of FAB today on enemy positions. Two majors and a detachment of Smuglyanka

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: a massi...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: a massive raid by the IDF Air Force on Lebanon and arrivals in the West Bank, the situation towards the end September 23, 2024 The situation on the border of Lebanon and Israel continues to deteriorate. Today, the Israeli Air Force launched strikes on the territory of the neighboring republic: not only border areas were under fire, but also cities located at a great distance from the border, including Baalbek.â–ªï¸According to statements by the IDF press service, the strikes were preemptive in nature and were carried out in order to to undermine Hezbollah's ability to bombard northern Israel. The target of the bombing was ammunition depots - there are many videos on the Internet of secondary detonations after the arrivals.â–ªï¸As â€‹â€‹of the evening, there were at least 300 launches from fighters. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, 274 people were killed and 1,024 were injured of varying degrees of severity. At the same time, it is not specified exactly how many casualties were among the civilian population and members of Hezbollah.â—Amid the raid, a mass exodus of residents of the southern part of Lebanon began - it occurred after peopleâ€™s phones began receiving calls from Israel calling for an urgent evacuation. The IDF limited itself to asking them to stay away from Lebanese Hezbollah targets in order to avoid casualties.â–ªï¸In response to the strikes by Israeli troops, the Lebanese group fired several salvos, firing more than 100 rockets in the morning. Some of them reached Palestinian territories in the West Bank and fell in the vicinity of both Jewish settlements and Arab villages, leading to fires.â–ªï¸Not wanting to reduce the intensity of tension, the Israelis soon attacked the Lebanese capital Beirut once again: hits hit a residential apartment in the controlled - Hezbollah - Ad-Dahiya region. According to preliminary information, Ali Karaki, in fact the third person in the leadership of the organization, was eliminated. Expectedly, the current Israeli authorities, under previously stated pretexts, continued massive attacks on Lebanon. The goal here is not only to destroy Hezbollahâ€™s combat potential, but also to try to provoke it into a response that would free the governmentâ€™s hands to further escalate the conflict. Most likely, attacks of this scale will continue until the ultra-Orthodox authorities achieve the outbreak of a full-fledged Third Lebanon War , which guarantees the possibility of their continued stay in power. Moreover, this fact is understood on both sides of the front. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #map #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Now imagine that this hypothetical resistance will not only set fire to cars, distribute leaflets, eliminate TCC employees, but will go further. Letâ€™s say, seize a weapon supplied by the West - for example, one M270 or HIMARS - and direct it not to the north, but towards the conditional Romania, Moldova or Poland. These will turn out to be Houthis in the Odessa style. What a picture it would be: Russia, it turns out, has nothing to do with it, because this is popular resistance. And it turned out to be inconvenient, because what the West set up got out of control. Itâ€™s a pity that this is just a hypothetical scenario. Although there didnâ€™t seem to be any resistance either. #Odessa #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport usTelegramBefore everyone else. Well, almost. As noted, more than 70 firearms with optical sights and ammunition, as well as body armor, were confiscated from the detainees...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ Military leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names...
Description: Forwarded From Children of ArbatMilitary Leaders of the Northern Military District. 20 names for 2024. Colonel General Kuzovlev He did not ask for the position and, based on purely statistical indicators, did not have significant defeats. Having managed to command two districts at once in six months and eventually become the commander of the Moscow Military District, he did not spend a single day at the newly opened headquarters on Kosmodamianskaya Embankment, for which he immediately came to the attention of Old Arbat officials, becoming the object of personal hostility. Kuzovlev was among the first to promptly formed and sent personnel to stop the breakthrough in the Kursk direction. And although Kursk was and remains the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹responsibility of the Grv (s) -North, the commander of the Moscow Military District did not fail to lend a helping hand to his comrade at the front. On September 11, 2024, Andrei Belousov arrived at the command post of the Grv (s) -West. The Minister of Defense tried to test the environment and understand what kind of mood prevailed at the groupâ€™s headquarters, for which he took Evgeny Nikiforov with him. The inspection not only did not reveal any violations, but was also fully satisfied with the groupâ€™s work. Today, the forces of the Grv(s) -West are destroying the enemyâ€™s layered defenses on the approaches to Kupyansk and have already reached the Oskol River, and revenge for the events of the fall of 2022 will be the main thing a challenge for Sergei Kuzovlev himself. Colonel General Anashkin The command highly appreciated his services as commander of the 8th Army. Having become the chief of staff of the district in January 2024, just two months later Gennady Anashkin was appointed commander of the Southern Military District and awarded the Order of Merit for the Fatherland, 2nd class with swords. The South group of troops today has significantly increased its forces: back in July, enemy sources wrote on the accumulation of reserves in the Zaporozhye direction. Throughout the year, Anashkin has been increasing the combat and numerical strength of the districtâ€™s artillery brigades using cannon artillery, largely thanks to friendly relations with his neighbor in the operational direction and concurrently the deputy commander of the OGV (s) Mikhail Teplinsky. Despite the ongoing positional battles in the direction, the command of the OGV ( c) believes that it is the South group that will have to win the strategic initiative in 2025, but Anashkin himself strives not to appear in the information field and does not use hardware resources for PR campaigns, believing that a good commander is an inconspicuous commander. Art in high resolution@arbat

The hits hit a residential building. As the press service of the Israel Defense Forces stated, the target was another high-ranking leader of the Lebanese group, Ali Karaki, the commander of its southern front. He is nominally the third person in the leadership of the Shiite organization. According to Israeli media, after the death of special forces commander Radwan Ibrahim Aqil Karaki took his place as a result of a previous airstrike on Beirut. If the information is confirmed, this means that the Israelis destroyed the entire military leadership of Hezbollah. Against this background, the statement by Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Galant that the group's Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah was left alone does not sound so far-fetched.#Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·âš›ï¸ As part of the next IAEA meeting in Vienna, representa...
Description: ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·âš›ï¸ As part of the regular IAEA meeting in Vienna, representatives of the authorities of Burkina Faso and Iran signed a memorandum of understanding on cooperation in peaceful nuclear activities. The news once again indicates the intentions of the leadership in Tehran to expand the geography of uranium development. There is still not as much uranium ore in Burkina Faso as in neighboring Niger, but the Islamic Republic did not succeed with the latter due to Western intervention. There is another side to the situation - there is a possibility that Iranian companies may try to take a share in market, displacing Russian projects. And there is interest in the country in Moscow - Rosatom recently entered the final stage of agreeing on the construction of a nuclear power plant in Burkina Faso. Of course, the conclusion by the authorities in Ouagadougou of an agreement with a country close to Russia is much better than similar agreements with the West. And yet, a holy place is never empty; there are enough people willing to take advantage of our bureaucratic problems even among friendly states.#Africa #BurkinaFaso #Iran #energy@rybarSupport usenglish.news.cnIran, Burkina Faso sign MoU for peaceful nuclear cooperationTEHRAN, Sept. 19 (Xinhua) -- Iran and Burkina Faso have signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) for cooperation in peaceful nuclear activities, Iran's official news agency IRNA reported Thursday.

That is, the leadership in N'Djamena, although it delayed negotiations on the renewal of agreements with the United States, was unable to cope with external pressure.ğŸ“Œ When in the spring of 2024 it became known about the intention of the Chadian authorities to end the American military presence, it resembled an electoral move to gain additional votes in anticipation of local presidential elections. When they took place, and the necessary results were obtained, then in N'Djamena they simply decided to play back. Judging by the footage on the Internet, Russian attack aircraft in an armored personnel carrier dropped into a forest belt not far from the Berestovaya gully, which runs parallel to the Kashlagach River. ğŸ”»At the Prechistovka-Novodonetskoe line, the front also began to move: some time ago, Russian troops began to advance in the area of â€‹â€‹the Shaitanka Grave mound 167.7, and by the middle of the week they had captured several forest belts towards Zolotaya Niva. â–ªï¸The offensive was preceded by artillery preparation, including shelling from TOS-1A heavy flamethrower systems, and UAV operators hit the Caesar self-propelled gun. However, it was not possible to break through the defenses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces here, and some of the assault groups retreated to their original positions. Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ On the prospects of a shutdown in the US on the eve of the U...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ On the prospects of a shutdown in the US ahead of the elections, the US Congress is once again faced with the possibility of temporarily suspending the work of the federal government on September 30. The main disagreements between the parties, as before, relate to budget priorities, especially regarding funding for defense and social programs. Republicans, especially in the House of Representatives, are pushing for spending cuts and want to keep funding at 2024 levels. Democrats, in turn, support increasing them through 2025 to fulfill promises to improve social and defense programs. House Speaker Mike Johnson until recently pushed for a GOP-friendly stopgap spending bill that would fund the federal government for another six months. The bill meant maintaining spending at 2024 levels without increasing funding for some programs. ğŸ”»In addition, it contained one very important point proposed by Donald Trump - a bill (SAVE Act) requiring proof of citizenship for voter registration in elections. In this way, the former president hoped to thwart the Democrats' plan to win the election by attracting thousands of illegal migrants to vote for Kamala Harris. However, on September 19, Johnson suffered a major setback: 14 Republicans, joining almost all Democrats, voted against the proposed bill. Conservatives felt that the act did not include sufficient measures to cut costs, hawks were concerned about the possibility of undermining the US defense potential, and moderates were worried about the threat of a shutdown too close to the elections. As a result, on September 23, Mike Johnson broke down under the pressure of his fellow party members and Democrats and agreed to the so-called -Plan B-. It provides for the approval of a spending bill that extends the government until December 20 of this year, and also excludes the SAVE Act promoted by Trump. Despite the fact that Johnson, during negotiations with Trump, managed to convince him that the shutdown would have a much worse impact on the president's position in the election rather than repealing the SAVE Act, the consequences of the failure of Johnson's original plan are obvious. The absence of a law requiring citizenship to register voters in elections will allow Kamala Harris and Co. to attract hundreds of thousands of illegal migrants to vote for themselves.#USA@rybar in collaboration with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican numberâš«ï¸ Yes, yes: Speaker of the House of Representatives, Republican Mike Johnson, broke under the pressure his fellow party members and Democrats and agreed to the so-called Plan B. It provides for the approval of a spending bill that extends the work  government...

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ About the project of the International Organization for ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ About the project of the International Organization for the Russian Language Against the background of Turkeyâ€™s active actions to promote a single Turkic alphabet in Central Asia, many wondered: is there really no alternative on our part? Well, formally there is, and Maria Zakharova reminded about it during the briefing on the sidelines of the 15th Eurasian Women's Forum in St. Petersburg on September 20. ğŸ“ŒWe are talking about the creation of an International Organization for the Russian Language, a decision about which was made about a year ago by the leaders of the CIS at a meeting in Bishkek. Zakharova was quite optimistic about the prospects for this organization to quickly formalize and begin work, and became in fact the first major Russian official to remember the project this year. According to the plan voiced by the President of Kazakhstan Tokayev, the organization was supposed to become almost the second Fracophonie or at least the Commonwealth Portuguese-speaking countries, but in fact it has become an opportunity for Kazakhstan to reject accusations of de-Russification of the country and so far serves only this thesis. At the same time, we will not agree with the optimism of our Foreign Ministry regarding the prospects of the organization. According to our information, the procedure for the official ratification of this agreement by at least three CIS states that signed it has not been completed, which is necessary to launch organizational procedures and hold the long-awaited ministerial conference, which should launch the process of actually creating the organization. Moreover, the only activity of responsible structures in this direction is the internal struggle for the post of formal leader (secretary, coordinator, etc.) of this organization, as well as the determination of Sochi (and not St. Petersburg, as Tokayev proposed) as the location of the Secretariat. If the promotion of the Russian language will be carried out at the same pace and with the same enthusiasm, then indeed Central Asia will soon speak Turkish. #Kazakhstan #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTACCIt was decided to establish an international organization for the Russian language following the results of the CIS summit; the initiative to establish such a structure was taken by the President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 23, 2024 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 23, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine are not abandoning attempts to break through in the Glushkovsky direction, introducing more and more NATO equipment into battle. So, near the settlement Merry is destroyed by another -Leopard-. In the Zeleny Shlyakh - Lyubimovka direction, the Ukrainian Armed Forces made an unsuccessful attempt at a counterattack, although they had previously been on the defensive here, holding back our onslaught from the west. There are battles in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the border Nikolaevo-Daryino and Darino, which, in addition to narrowing the zone of control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces of the border, will open the approaches to Sverdlikovo, which the enemy has turned into a logistics hub in our region.â–ªï¸ In the Kupyansky direction, the Russian Armed Forces are expanding the zone, making their way from Peschany to Kruglyakovka (3 km left from LBS). In the Krasnolimansky direction, our troops, having broken into Nevskoye (south of Makeyevka, LPR), formed a front ledge up to 5 km deep.â–ªï¸ In the Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky) direction, the Russian Army rushed into Leonidovka with a swift landing, despite the damaged equipment, the infantry managed to gain a foothold. The offensive in Toretsk continues, the zone of control around the village is expanding. Friendship.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, Krutoy Yar (the road to Mirnograd) has been liberated. The Washington Post quotes the commander of a tank unit of the 68th brigade of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: -Despite the fact that Pokrovsk remains under the control of Ukraine, it can already be called lost as a logistics hub.- â–ªï¸ In the Kurakhovsky direction, the liberation of the settlement became important. Thus, the Armed Forces of Ukraine have a corridor up to 7 km wide to withdraw from the city with only one road to Bogoyavlenka, to which our troops are making their way from the east (4.5 km left)â–ªï¸ At night in the Rostov region around midnight in the area of â€‹â€‹the Kamensk-Shakhtinsky division Air defense worked against air targets.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, the city of Gubkin was attacked by the Ukrainian Armed Forces using a drone. In the Belgorod region, on the section of the Chaiki - Krasny Oktyabr highway, a drone attacked a moving car, the driver was injured. â–ªï¸In the DPR in Gorlovka, a civilian was killed and five were wounded by a Ukrainian Armed Forces artillery strike. Title: ğŸ” Additional information has appeared on the topic of British sp...
Description: Forwarded From Balkan Gossip Girl On the topic of British spies expelled from Russia, additional information has appeared about dubious contacts of MI6 with local Muslims. In fact, the technology has been developed by British specialists, and work on a similar front is not limited to the CIS and has been going on for a long time. True, it is not always successful. For example, one of the grandiose failures of Foggy Albion is associated with Macedonia. There, back in 1995, with funds from humanitarian - educational - funds from Great Britain, they tried to launch the first - independent - university in the Albanian language. It is from here that the resistance movement, dreaming of a Greater Albania, will subsequently spread across the Balkans. At the opening ceremony in Tetovo, riots broke out and passions grew more intense. And then the applicants, together with the self-proclaimed rector, demanded from the state a quota for Albanian graduates to occupy government positions. Doesn't remind you of anything? Human rights activists were sent to Tetovo, and to everyoneâ€™s surprise, it suddenly turned out that the applicants did not have documents confirming their identity. Because they were not presented as citizens of Macedonia or, at worst, Albania, but as infiltrators from Great Britain and the USA. From the first day, the university itself became a base camp for Albanian militants: about one and a half thousand armed students ended up in Tetovo through the efforts of the Mi-6. James Bisset, who served as the Canadian ambassador, later spoke about this. Journalist Scott Taylor then added fuel to the fire, who managed to take the lion's share of the footage out of the country and publish it. Under the cover of Britain, networks for disseminating democratic Islam were already operating at that time, and one of them was gathering Muslim spiritual leaders, preachers, imams and heads of large religious communities. Can you imagine how they have improved their skills over the years? @balkanossiper - we have been setting global trends since June 28, 1914

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on September 21-22, 2024. Russian troops hit enemy targets in the Khmelnitsky, Vinnitsa, Dnepropetrovsk and Kharkov regions. Ukrainian formations attacked the Crimean peninsula for two days, and also hit ammunition depots in the Krasnodar Territory and Tver Region. In the Kursk region, fierce fighting continues in the Glushkovsky district, where the Russian Armed Forces are stopping the enemyâ€™s attempts to advance forward. In the Korenevsky and Sudzhansky districts, attacks are carried out on Ukrainian Armed Forces equipment and strongholds in forest belts. In the Limansky direction, Russian troops liberated Nevskoye, advancing to the west almost four kilometers and breaking the enemyâ€™s defenses in the Zhuravka gully area. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated Nelepovka and They landed troops in the center of Leonidovka. In addition, there are successes on the approaches to the central part of the urban development of Dzerzhinsk. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops liberated Krutoy Yar, advancing in the direction of Krasny Yar and Nikolaevka. In the Donetsk direction, the Russian Armed Forces liberated Ostroye, advancing towards the Selidovskaya correctional colony, starting battles for it . In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, Russian troops are advancing northwest of Ugledar in the Prechistovka area and in the direction of Zolotaya Niva. In the Vremevsky direction, the configuration of the front in the Makarovka area has been clarified, where Russian sappers blew up the southern bridge at the entrance to the village. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ âš¡ï¸There are signs of preparation for an escalation in Transn...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majorsâš¡ï¸There are signs of preparation for an escalation in TransnistriağŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸The United States has approved the sale to Romania of 44 AAV-7 tracked amphibious landing vehicles for $210 million, which will be supplied from the reserves of the US Marine Corps. The vehicle is the primary vehicle of the 4th Assault Amphibious Battalion (4th AABn) of the US Marine Corps Reserve, highlighting the sensitivity of amphibious sales. The AAV-7 is designed to conduct amphibious operations in the coastal zone. One vehicle can accommodate up to 25 military personnel and 3 crew members. Still, 44 vehicles will make it possible to move 1,100 military personnel (in fact, two full-blooded battalions) across water obstacles at a distance of up to 37 km. This water reserve is not enough to sail to the Crimean coast (and Romania will not be able to deliver amphibians by landing ship due to their lack of service), but it will be enough to quickly transfer forward detachments to Transnistria across the Dniester River. Romania, surrounded by its NATO âš¡ï¸ neighbors and Ukraine, is unlikely to need to cross rivers with its allies. At the same time, under the leadership of NATO, the increased militarization ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡© of Moldova continues. Most Moldovan military exercises this year took place with the participation of Romanian and American troops. Specialists from these countries have developed a project and are supervising the construction of a new military base, training ground and ammunition depot in the village of Bachoi, 25 km from the PMR. Alliance standards are being implemented everywhere in the Moldavian Armed Forces, officers, especially young ones, are being trained according to NATO programs. ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·France, ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªGermany and ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸The United States have increased military-technical assistance in hopes of strengthening the potential of the Moldavian army.âœ¨Such actions in the future will create a serious threat to the Operational Group of Russian troops in the Transnistrian region of the Republic of Moldova. On the other hand, the PMR will be squeezed by Ukraine, which is ready to carry out any commands of its Western masters and is already involved in the Transnistrian direction. Two majors

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the exercises - Bruno-Takamori 2024 - European ...
Description: ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the exercises - Bruno-Takamori 2024 - European countries continue to systematically increase defense cooperation with the states of the Asia-Pacific region. On September 21, the Brunet-Takamori 2024 exercise ended - the first military training of the ground forces of France and Japan, conducted on the territory of the island state. 100 military personnel of the Japanese Self-Defense Forces and about 50 soldiers of the French army took part in the exercise. The main focus during training was on counter-guerrilla operations. ğŸ”»The main purpose of the exercise, in addition to practicing the fight against rebels, was to demonstrate cooperation between the two states against the backdrop of instability in the Asia-Pacific region. By the way, other steps are being taken in this direction. The French and Japanese are planning to soon conclude an agreement on mutual access - it will allow troops to be stationed on each other's territory for joint military exercises. And although, as can be seen, bilateral training is already taking place, the agreement removes some bureaucratic barriers, which could lead to even more exercises. In general, recently there has been an intensification of French foreign policy in the Asia-Pacific region - the French are also interested in interaction with the Philippines, where the authorities are creating a network of partnerships in order to contain China. However, at the same time, it is noticeable that Paris is trying not to damage relations with the PRC. For example, last year France was among the first echelon of countries that spoke out against the location of a NATO liaison office in Japan. It is likely that this approach - abandoning very radical measures and gradually building up ties with countries in the Asia-Pacific region through exercises - will continue to prevail. High-resolution mapEnglish version#France #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Of course, this caused discontent in Mogadishu, whose authorities condemned such daring actions of both the Ethiopians and the autonomists. Autonomous regions loyal to the Somalis are conducting successful operations against militants, and also repelling a large number of attacks. At the same time, the Somali armed forces are stabilizing the situation in the country, restoring order after tribal clashes that occur in various regions of the country.ğŸ”»If the Ethiopian authorities continue to commit such daring actions , then we should probably expect retaliatory actions from the Egyptians, who are actively settling in the country. We should not forget that the Americans also side with Cairo in the Ethiopian-Egyptian conflict, which also creates serious obstacles for the leadership of Addis Ababa. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction: liberation of Nelepovka and breakthrough to Leonidovkasituation as of 15:00 on September 22, 2024 The offensive of the Russian Armed Forces in the occupied part of the DPR continues, where Russian troops have made significant progress over the past ten days within the borders of Dzerzhinsk and adjacent territories .â–ªï¸North of Druzhba, Russian military personnel have cleared the enemy stronghold on the territory of the dried-up Seversky Donets-Donbass canal and are digging in on the achieved lines.â–ªï¸In Dzerzhinsk, fighting is currently taking place on the western outskirts of the Novaya mine and at the waste heap of the same name, the capture of which will open the way to attack the Zabalka microdistrict from the east. In addition, there are clashes in the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the Dzerzhinsk city hospital, as well as to the west of the bakery, where the Russian Armed Forces have significantly advanced in the direction of Dzerzhinsky Street. Yesterday evening, footage of the explosion of a building, allegedly where Russian soldiers were located, was published on the Internet: a sabotage group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine penetrated into the room and placed a charge. The event itself took place not far from the former administration of Dzerzhinsk, however, more accurate data on the presence of Russian troops in this area has not yet been received, and the breakthrough itself without support from flank attacks and the occupation of the Dzerzhinsky mine, taking into account the severity of the fighting taking place in the urban area, looks risky. At the same time, the control zone The RF Armed Forces in reality differ from the one for which there is information: firstly, not all successful actions of Russian troops are captured on camera, and secondly, in urban battles the situation is dynamically changing due to the peculiarities of battles in the city, combined with constant attacks on each otherâ€™s positions.â–ªï¸At the same time, Russian troops are advancing on Dzerzhinsk from the south in the Zabalka microdistrict. According to available information, Russian troops, after gaining a foothold on the territory of school No. 2, expanded the zone of control in the direction of Gaidar, Rimsky-Korsakov streets and Shakhterov Avenue.â–ªï¸ At the same time, Russian attack aircraft finally liberated Nelepovka and cleared out the pocket between the village and Dzerzhinsky, advancing in the direction of Shcherbinovka.ğŸ”»In addition, a significant event for the site occurred the other day. After several unsuccessful enemy counterattacks in the direction of Nelepovka, the landing force of the Russian Armed Forces - on the shoulders of the retreating troops - under heavy artillery fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, advanced several kilometers north towards Leonidovka, successfully gaining a foothold in the center of the village on Klimenko Street. Thus, the defense of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, built for years in this area, was broken through.â—ï¸Further establishment of control over the settlement, subject to a successful attack on Shcherbinovka on the opposite bank of the Krivoi Torets River, will allow the Dzerzhinsk garrison to be semi-encircled from the west. Considering the simultaneous offensive in the east from Kirovo, in the future the city may be surrounded from two directions at once. Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the QUAD summit in the USA on August 21, t...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the past QUAD summit in the USA On August 21, the leaders of QUAD, which includes the USA, Australia, India and Japan, held a summit, the main theme of which was cooperation in the field of maritime security. Thus, all the previous insights that we wrote about recently were confirmed. One of the first points of QUADâ€™s statement was cooperation in the healthcare sector. Thus, the authorities of the participating countries want to show that the bloc focuses specifically on the development of humanitarian ties, and not on containing one or another country - China, by the way, is not mentioned at all in the document. ğŸ”»However, the most interesting part begins next. In the security sphere, the parties agreed to conduct patrols in the Indo-Pacific region - the first will take place in 2025. The patrol locations were not disclosed. But it can be assumed that QUAD coast guard services will be in the South China Sea, parts of the Indian Ocean where Chinese research vessels sail, and Oceania - countries located in this region, the statement pays much attention. â–ªï¸Australia, USA, Japan and India will continue to work to provide information to countries in the region about what is happening in their coastal waters. This is done under the pretext of fighting crime, but in this case no one forgets about tracking Chinese ships. In general, the summit was full of various types of agreements, the results of which we should see in the near future, despite a possible change of administration in the United States. Even if Donald Trump wins the election, QUAD will likely continue to exist - it was under the former president that new life was breathed into the four-way dialogue with the goal of containing China and countering its influence in the region. #Australia #India #USA #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Just last week we wrote about the upcoming summit of QUAD - an organization that includes the USA, Japan, India and Australia. And now the Japanese media are publishing the first details of the joint statement that will be adopted following the meeting. Inâ€¦

Title: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡º Lately we have been talking a lot about cooperation in t...
Description: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡º Lately we have been talking a lot about defense cooperation between the Philippines on the one hand and the US or Japan on the other. Australia, which is also part of the new informal association SQUAD, remained a not very noticeable player against the backdrop of Tokyo and Washington. And now Canberra has finally -woke up-. The Australian ambassador to the Philippines recently said that the country's authorities plan to increase their presence in the waters through cooperation with Manila. The parties are discussing conducting even more patrols in the South China Sea. ğŸ”»However, it is still unclear what patrol format we are talking about - bilateral with the Philippines or multilateral with the participation of the United States or Japan. In the latter case, the activity is aimed more at demonstrating the unified position of several states on the South China Sea issue, rather than at demonstrating the ambitions of an individual country. Bilateral patrols make clear the degree of support for the Philippines' claims in the waters. And Australia cannot boast of anything special here - the first and last event of this format took place in November 2023. After this, Australians only participated in multilateral patrols. â–ªï¸And this is most likely the result of Canberraâ€™s deliberate policy, which is based on maintaining a conditional balance in relations with China, Australiaâ€™s main economic partner. Perhaps this is why Philippine-Australian cooperation in general has never been aimed at external security challenges to Manila.  The ambassador's recent statements may indicate a change in Australia's position. However, given the warming in relations between Beijing and Canberra, it is too early to talk about this. Therefore, the Australians are likely to increase their presence in the South China Sea through multilateral patrols, so as not to reverse the progress made in developing ties with China. #Australia #Philippines @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Despite recent negotiations between China and the Philippines to reduce tensions in the South China Sea, the situation in the region continues to escalate. Thus, on August 2, the Philippine Navy conducted bilateral naval exercises for the first time in troubled waters...

Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· What Rybar commented in the context of the results of the...
Description: Forwarded From Global StudiesğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· What Rybar commented in the context of the results of the Turkish operation in Syria and Iraq clearly demonstrates the prospects of the Turks in this direction. In the current version, they are simply not visible. And if we talk about the reasons for the current situation in the Turkish operation against the Kurds, then we should return to the roots in 2014-2015. Do you remember what preceded the invasion of Iraq in December 2015?â™¦ï¸In Turkey, by 2014, the economic situation had seriously worsened, which was expressed by increased inflation and the beginning of the depreciation of the lira. The situation inside the country was deteriorating, as was the growing discontent of citizens. In addition, in 2015, more active attacks by militants - the Kurdistan Workers' Party - began in the Turkish provinces bordering Iraq, which ultimately became a pretext for the invasion of Iraq. Then Erdogan hoped to carry out a small victorious war and regain the favor of the citizens, but the plan was unsuccessful, and the internal political turmoil continued. All this ultimately led to the well-known attempt by supporters of the preacher Fethullah GÃ¼len to carry out a coup in July 2016. But the Turkish authorities were able to hold out and struck a blow at the GÃ¼lenists themselves. And already in August, in order to distract the population and supposedly protect Turkeyâ€™s interests in the fight against IS and Kurdish forces, the Turks began a ground operation in northern Syria, occupying part of the territories.â™¦ï¸I, of course, omit the part details, but after reading this post, one can conclude that one of the main drivers of the Turkish operation was the intention to distract the population from the deepening crisis through an imaginary fight against terrorism and the government of Bashar al-Assad. In the short term, Erdogan achieved the desired approval and support from the Turkish population. But subsequently, as life worsened, people began to have more and more questions: why was all this necessary if we began to live worse? And now the Turkish economy is moving in one direction and it cannot be called positive. The Kurdish problem has not gone away, there are still a lot of migrants and almost the only way to demonstrate the activity of the state remains military activity in Syria and Turkey. #TurkeyGlobalistics - subscribe to the channelTelegramRybarğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡·ğŸ´ Turkish President Recep Erdogan summed up the operations of the armed forces and security forces from the beginning year, announcing the conduct of 35 thousand special events, the elimination of 825 terrorists and the prevention of 70 terrorist attacks. Title: ğŸ” #Review #Summary for September 22, 2024 â–ªï¸ Last week demonstra...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Review #Summary for September 22, 2024â–ªï¸ The past week has again demonstrated the enemyâ€™s ability to carry out UAV strikes on critical rear targets in our regions, this time on large ammunition depots. The governors, like robots, are clearly carrying out someoneâ€™s not very competent tem about -falling debris onto explosive objects-, which causes irritation on social networks, where videos of such falling debris are shared. At the same time, the effectiveness of combating air targets in our regions varies. Thus, yesterdayâ€™s missile attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on Crimea was thwarted by the forces of the 31st air defense division, which indicates the feasibility of a widespread increase in the effectiveness of air defense. By the way, just yesterday signals began to be received about the inclusion of air defense units in the list of -fighting-, payments are expected for -days with shooting-, which will still be a step in motivating military personnel.â–ªï¸ Heavy fighting in the Kursk region remains high in intensity. The enemy withdraws elite airborne units and throws prisoners under the influence of methamphetamine, trained for three months by NATO instructors, into battle. In those directions where it was possible to push back the enemy (the area of â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹the settlements of Borki, Lyubimovka, Daryevka), they report that the enemy has completely mined the area. The enemy does not intend to withdraw from the region: footage of the destruction of artillery and equipment of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the region indicates that Kyiv is drawing both artillery and equipment into the occupation zone. In addition, in the south of the Glushkovsky district, the Armed Forces of Ukraine threw columns of foreign equipment with -Leopards- into battle. It is significant that the expensive equipment was not equipped with either adequate anti-cumulative shields or dynamic protection. This approach may indicate an emergency transfer to the Leopardov direction in order to please Zelenskyâ€™s hysterical political goals. â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky and Yuzhnodonetsk directions, the Russian Armed Forces maintain their offensive potential, tighten up their rear and align their flanks. Ukrainsk has been taken, our troops are fighting in the suburbs of Gornyak, information has appeared about the capture of Ostroy, which indicates the ongoing closure of the cauldron north of Krasnohorivka. The zone of control to the north and west of Ugledar is expanding, one cannot but rejoice at the visible development of the tactics of the Russian Army in cutting off the fortified areas of the Armed Forces of Ukraine from supplies and skillfully enveloping enemy defense centers.â–ªï¸ Showdowns regarding the case of Ernest and Goodwin (-landing party- from the Ministry of Defense and Far Eastern Territories of the Russian Federation, the FSB of Russia landed and started work) a complex of problems again stirred up in the public sphere. In particular, there is a shortage of prepared and trained attack aircraft, which leads to the use of the same regular artillerymen as infantry, whose training takes a long time. The problem also remains with UAV operators and specialists from front-line laboratories for the manufacture and repair of drones. These military personnel occupy the positions of shooters, snipers, and so on, and due to the slowness of the military department in matters of changing the staffing structures of units in accordance with the technological structure of war, there are critically few positions - UAV operator - at the level of tactical units. This gives the commander every right to use such troops as assault infantry, even if the self-taught UAV operator is able to bring more combat value in a different capacity. The problem of using specialists (including those with recorded relatively rare VUS), as they write to us from all over the front, is typical for many areas. Continued belowTelegramTwo majorsStart above â–ªï¸ The second anniversary of mobilization in Russia took place to the accompaniment of articles in the enemy Western press with -insiders- about Moscowâ€™s alleged decision not to conduct new waves of mobilization. Considering the increased intelligence work of the West on our territory...

Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ Situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border: escalation of strikes and fires on both sides; situation towards outcome on September 21, 2024 As tensions in the Gaza Strip relatively subside, the main vector of hostilities is gradually shifting to northern Israel. And although it has not yet reached a full-fledged war, resonant events occur almost every day that threaten to move the conflict to a new stage. ğŸ”»If earlier launches of missiles and drones by Hezbollah, as well as massive air raids by the Israeli Defense Forces were not such a frequent occurrence, the situation has changed somewhat after the Israelis blew up Lebanese pagers, as well as an attack on the capital of the republic. According to the Lebanese Ministry of Health, victims of a recent cyber attack Israel and the subsequent explosions left 4,000 people injured alone. And during the flights to the Ad-Dahiya area in Beirut, 37 Lebanese were killed, including Ibrahim Aqil, a senior leader of Hezbollah.â–ªï¸Meanwhile, according to Arabic-language media, during this day alone the Israeli Air Force carried out about 100 strikes on various areas in south of Lebanon. At the same time, the main hits occurred on targets in the area of â€‹â€‹the Litani River, which is 30 kilometers north of the border with Israel. Hezbollah fighters are also not far behind and fired rockets at the northern part of Israel: more than 80 rockets were fired in the morning. Traditionally, hits on IDF targets have been announced, while the Israeli media reported about ammunition falling in open areas and near civilian infrastructure.ğŸ”»In general, no significant changes have occurred over the past 24 hours. Against this background, the press service of the Israel Defense Forces announced the completion of a series of attacks on Lebanon: at least 180 targets were allegedly hit, which were used for attacks in the Upper Galilee, Golan Heights and Safed. Despite promises of retaliation and loud threats, most likely Hezbollah will limit itself to continuing massive strikes. This is quite enough to artificially escalate tension and create the desired picture, which will be handed over to its population against the backdrop of the tragic events of recent days. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Yuzhnodonetsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in several sectors situation as of 15:00 September 21, 2024 Over the past weeks, units of the Russian Armed Forces have been developing an offensive in the Ugledar area: earlier on this section of the front, Russian troops successfully expanded the zone of control near the Yuzhnodonobasskaya mine No. 3-, and last night footage appeared confirming the advance of attack aircraft towards Novoukrainka.â–ªï¸On the northern flank, the clearing of the remaining part of Konstantinovka, where before that there had been a focal enemy presence, was completed. At the same time, the work of Russian fighters is complicated by the active use of drones by Ukrainian formations. â–ªï¸Significant successes have been achieved in recent days in the Vodyanoye area, where sections of the area north of the settlement came under the control of Russian troops, as well as in the vicinity of the Yuzhnodonobasskaya No. 1 mine. Meanwhile, at the facility of the same name number 3, fighting is taking place on the western outskirts. â–ªï¸On the southern flank, evidence appeared of the advance of the Russian Armed Forces north of Prechistovka: there, the Russian armored group advanced across the fields towards Novoukrainka, without actually encountering any significant resistance from the Armed Forces of Ukraine on its way. Also, footage was published on the Internet showing the capture of members of Ukrainian formations in this area. Nevertheless, the subsequent assault on Novoukrainka may be complicated by the geographical features of the area - the settlement and its surroundings are located on a hill, which somewhat facilitates its defense from those attacking from the lowlands. ğŸ”»Against the background of the latest advances of the Russian Armed Forces in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, the enemy is in a very depressing situation. After the loss of control over the buildings of the crushing and screening department of the Yuzhnodonbasskaya No. 1- and No. 3 mines, the Ukrainian formations lost the ability to monitor the situation for tens of kilometers around. Apparently, the Russian command abandoned a frontal assault on the positions of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Ugledar, which, although already heavily destroyed, but remains a convenient settlement for defense. Instead, the units are attacking in neighboring areas from Vodyanoy and Prechistovka, while simultaneously cutting off supply routes for the Ukrainian garrison in Ugledar. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Russia #Ugledar #Ukraine@rybar together with @voin_dvSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The Hezbollah press service officially recognized the death of the commander of the special forces - Radwan - Ibrahim Muhammad Aqeel, also known as - Haj Abdel Qadir-. His body was found late yesterday, several hours after the airstrike on Beirut. At the moment, the death of Ibrahim Aqeel is one of the largest losses in the ranks of the Lebanese group. This is taking into account the fact that after the murder of Fuad Shukri, he took his place as Deputy Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah and actually became the No. border to a full-fledged war, they are preparing to evacuate their citizens from Lebanon.ğŸ”»Now, in the hope of provoking Hezbollah into decisive action, the current Israeli authorities are consistently raising the stakes, as evidenced by both the recent massive bombings of pagers and the liquidation of high-ranking commanders and leaders of the Shiite group. And this if you donâ€™t take into account the murder of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran, for which the Axis of Resistance placed responsibility on the Israeli intelligence services and promised a tough response (however, so far nothing of such resonance has happened in relation to the Zionist state). And no matter how the Lebanese donâ€™t wanted to succumb to obvious provocations from the ultra-Orthodox government, sooner or later they will have to give a response.
