Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡©The situation in the east of DR Congo: activity of terrori...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡©The situation in the east of the Democratic Republic of Congo: activity of terrorist groups Situation for August 1 - September 20, 2024 In the resource-rich east of the Democratic Republic of Congo, fighting continues between government troops and a conglomerate of groups. If previously the Rwandan-backed March 23 Movement (M23) was the one most often in the news, now other factions are showing themselves more strongly. â–ªï¸Against the background of the M23 offensive, cultists from CODECO have become more active: during the latest raids in the province of Jigu, they stole more than 10 people, killing about 30 more. The organization is fragmented groups of bandits attacking mainly civilians. They do not agree to a truce with the authorities because if they surrender, they will face the death penalty.â–ªï¸The Alliance of Democratic Forces, affiliated with the Islamic State, operates in a similar way. The attacks target Christian settlements, not army posts. They take property from villages, burn houses, execute one part of the population and try to recruit another. Such tactics do not bring any noticeable operational success - Islam in the DRC is widespread quite locally, and the religious factor in local wars does not play the first role. However, with such attacks, militants continue to wreak havoc in the Ituri region. The growing activity of several groups at once forces government troops to stretch their already limited forces to fight terrorism, which worsens the level of security in the east of the country and brings great economic costs. In these conditions, - Western partners - new levers of pressure are emerging on the authorities in Kinshasa, especially in matters of the exploitation of large deposits of natural resources. High resolution mapEnglish version#Africa #DRC@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the raid of Ukrainian drones Last night, Ukrain...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the raid of Ukrainian drones Last night, Ukrainian formations carried out another massive launch of drones in the rear regions of the Russian Federation. According to the Russian Ministry of Defense, over 100 drones were intercepted by air defense systems. â–ªï¸One of the targets of the enemy attack was an ammunition warehouse on the territory of a military unit north of the village of Kamenny in the Krasnodar Territory. As in the case of Toropets, regional authorities again announced the fall of fragments of ammunition, as well as the resulting fire and detonation of explosive objects. Nevertheless, the entire media space has already circulated footage showing a powerful explosion with the characteristic sounds of secondary detonation. Due to the incident, a nearby village was evacuated. However, the results of the attack will be clear after the publication of satellite images. â–ªï¸In the Tver region, Ukrainian drones attacked the 23rd GRAU arsenal in the area of â€‹â€‹the village of Oktyabrsky, which is located less than 20 km south of Toropets. According to heat signatures from the satellite, a fire broke out in the facility. Against the backdrop of the incident, it was reported that the Staraya Toropa railway station, located further south, was evacuated: several passenger trains were canceled, others were sent along an alternative route. â–ªï¸In other regions there were no significant damages or casualties. Most of the drones were shot down in the Bryansk region, as well as over the Azov Sea. In total, air defense systems worked in eight regions of Russia. The latest raids by Ukrainian formations clearly demonstrate that one of the targets of the attacks, in addition to the already familiar fuel and energy infrastructure facilities and airfields, were large ammunition depots. And given the high volumes of production of enemy drones, whose production of new UAVs completely covers the consumption of vehicles during previous attacks, we can expect that such raids will only intensify. High resolution mapEnglish version#Bryansk #Krasnodar #Russia #Tver #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·/ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ From March to September, the first 10 Ukrainian f...
Description: Forwarded From the Fifth RepublicğŸ‡«ğŸ‡·/ ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ From March to September, the first 10 Ukrainian future F16 pilots underwent accelerated training at a secret base in southwest France, which - as can be seen from the June 17 video - is the air force base in Cazeaux where they are based Alphajets. Although the Ukrainians in the photo from the French Ministry of Defense were blurred, RFI handed over everyone and everything - firstly, in June there were 11 Ukrainians being trained. One got lost somewhere, since only ten were issued certificates. Six of them had previously spent 6 months learning English and terminology at the English Armed Forces base. All pilots were between 21 and 23 years old. The crash course teaches them Western combat techniques, flying at extremely low altitudes at high speed, various missions, including striking warehouses with enemy shells, reacting in case of breakdown, etc. They flew 80 hours on Alphajets and 50 on F16 simulators from THALÃˆS. Then they will continue their training at the bases of the Romanian and NATO Armed Forces, where they will train for another 6 months on local F16s with instructors (probably from the Armed Forces of Belgium, Denmark, and Holland). France will train a total of 26 F16 pilots at the same Cazeaux base. #Ukraine #F16 #army #NATO #France @fifthrepublic : freedom, equality, drunkenness

Title: ğŸ¬ â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ğŸ Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: ev...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ğŸ Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week of September 14 â€“ 20, 2024â–ªï¸In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops attacked the capital of the enclave and satellite cities. At the same time, the number of deaths in the region has already exceeded 41 thousand people, and the number of victims has reached 95 thousand. â–ªï¸North of Gaza, after another Hamas strike on Ashkelon, the IDF announced the evacuation of several areas of Beit Lahia. At the same time, at the moment, the deployment of Israeli troops has not been recorded.â–ªï¸There were periodic firefights in the vicinity of the University College in southwest Gaza. Despite this, the line of combat contact has not changed significantly over the past period of time.â–ªï¸In the central part of the enclave, the Israelis periodically carried out air and artillery strikes on various targets. Nuseirat again remained under the most concentrated fire, where there were no casualties among the civilian population. â–ªï¸There were also several hits on residential buildings in various areas of Al-Breij. In just one day, Israeli airstrikes on the settlement killed at least 50 people.â–ªï¸Meanwhile, Palestinian forces fired at IDF positions in the Netzarim corridor. Judging by the lack of reports of evacuation helicopters flying over, such attacks did not lead to any tangible results.â–ªï¸In the south of the enclave, Israeli units carried out engineering work on the territory of the Philadelphia Corridor. At the same time, the IDF was preparing for the likely end of the main phase of hostilities in Rafah. A suburb of the Lebanese capital, the Ad-Dahiya district, where several Hezbollah-owned buildings are located, was also attacked. The hit was in the building where a meeting of one of the prominent representatives of the group with the Palestinian delegation was taking place.#video #digest #map #Israel #Palestine@rybarSupport us Video is too big

The Israeli operation -Summer Camps- continues in the West Bank. The most violent clashes broke out in Qabatiya, where the Israelis eliminated up to seven militants. The Israeli Air Force launched strikes on the Lebanese capital, resulting in the death of Hezbollah deputy leader Ibrahim Aqil and the senior command staff of the Radwan forces. Title: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the supply of Indian shells to the so-called. Ukra...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the supply of Indian shells to the so-called. Ukraine Reuters released an article about supplies to the so-called. Ukraine 155-mm Indian-made rounds, evidence of the use of which by the Ukrainian Armed Forces has appeared on the Internet from time to time over the past six months. According to the material, they reach the Kyiv regime through EU countries. Thus, the Yantra India company entered into an agreement with the Italian Meccanica per l'Elettronica e Servomeccanismi (MES) for the supply of shell casings. Their equipment with explosives is produced by Western companies, which formally allows us to consider this not a sale of ammunition, but only components. Similar schemes have been implemented with contractors from Spain, Portugal, the Czech Republic and Slovenia - exports to these countries of large Indian ammunition manufacturers have grown to 135 million euros from 2022. The government in Delhi is aware of such episodes, but has not imposed any restrictions on exports to Europe.ğŸ“Œ When in March it became known about the Czech initiative to transfer 800 thousand rounds to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, we assumed that India could be one of the suppliers through sales through third parties countries. The facts that have come to light confirm these guesses. In this case, Delhi is taking advantage of the current situation to expand its already growing military exports. At the same time, the country positions itself as friendly to Russia and acts as an important buyer of Russian weapons and sanctioned oil. In the current realities, one can consider steps that would look like a limited response to gestures and would not become a significant reason for the deterioration of relations. For example, in the form of mirror schemes with the supply of individual components to Pakistan.#India #Ukraine@rybarSupport us ReutersExclusive: Ammunition from India enters Ukraine, raising Russian ireNew Delhi sees the lengthy war in Europe as an opportunity to develop its nascent arms export sector.

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ Evidence for the British Foreign Office Observing a...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ Evidence for the British Foreign Office Observing an avalanche of outraged articles in Western publications about groundless accusations and Moscowâ€™s aggressive campaign, we decided to add visual details on the situation with the expulsion of British spies. â–ªï¸Claims that accusations regarding the actions of the British in Russia are disinformation do not stand up to criticism. First of all, because in addition to the already published documents, the Russian special services have a large number of photo and video materials proving Londonâ€™s coordination of subversive policies in the Russian direction. â–ªï¸The footage presented by the FSB of the Russian Federation and already published on Russian television shows how they met with representatives of the media and foreign agent organizations, and also directly supervised anti-government protests. â–ªï¸For example, spy Jessica Davenport personally worked with a former member of the Council under the President of the Russian Federation for promoting the development of civil society institutions and human rights, a member of the Yabloko party Svetlana Ganushkina and oppositionist Alexei Minyailo, and had connections with Andrei Lipsky from Novaya Gazeta. It is also known that Davenport conducted negotiations with activists of the banned LGBT and the foreign agency center -SOVA-, which specialized in the problems of xenophobia, but in fact conducted Russophobic propaganda. â–ªï¸Two other spies - Blake Pattel and Thomas Stevenett - worked with Russian Muslims. The FSB recorded Pattelâ€™s contacts with Middle East specialist Kirill Semenov, as well as with the representative of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims Ilyas Sadulin.â–ªï¸In contacts with Mi6 curator in Georgia Christopher Joyce, Elena Chernenko from Kommersant and foreign agent Maxim Kats managed to appear. And this is only part of that , what lies on the surface specifically for this case. ğŸ”»Well, the thesis about the groundlessness of accusations from the mouth of the British Foreign Office is the best characterization of the mood in the British intelligence leadership, where it is extremely rare to encounter such failures in attempts to hide from foreign counterintelligence. Not to mention the precedent of the mass expulsion of spies who were driven away as guilty teenagers in edification to the remaining employees of the British Foreign Office. Itâ€™s hardly worth saying how painfully this hurts the reputation and self-esteem of Mi6. #Great Britain #video #Russia@rybar Support us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: clashes in the Glushkovsky region an...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: clashes in the Glushkovsky region and successes in Sudzhansky situation as of 20:00 on September 20, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian troops are consistently expanding the zone of control in several sectors of the front, while simultaneously repelling enemy attacks.ğŸ”»Foundations of battles continue to appear in the Glushkovsky region for the village of Vesyoloye, fighting on the outskirts of which has been going on for the last few days. Confirmation of the clashes in the village area are the footage published today by the Russian Ministry of Defense, which demonstrates the movement of an armored group of the Armed Forces of Ukraine towards the village. The Swedish CV9040 and the German Leopard 2A6 took part in the attack: the outcome of the battle is unknown, although the enemy managed to land troops in one of the areas adjacent to the village forest belts In Vesyoly itself, due to constant shelling and fighting, many houses were damaged. Also in the area, the use of robotic platforms by the enemy was noted: one of these installations with a machine gun was hit on the outskirts of Volfino by FPV drones, and then finished off by a shot from an RPG.ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district they continue clashes near Kremyany. Enemy activity compared to the attacks of previous days has decreased significantly after the activation of Russian troops on the left flank from Korenevo.ğŸ”»In the Sudzhansky district, Russian troops are building on the successes of the past days - today information about the liberation of Darino was confirmed. Currently, fighting is taking place in the Nikolaevo-Daryino area, and the Russian Armed Forces managed to enter and gain a foothold in Uspenovka. In addition, four conscripts who occupied positions in the forest for almost 40 days, transmitting data on the enemyâ€™s movements and carrying out other activities, were removed from encirclement .ğŸ”»In the Bolshesoldatsky district, the Ukrainian Armed Forces fired at a gas distribution station in the administrative center and other civilian infrastructure in adjacent villages. In total, over ten residential buildings were damaged, and in Rzhava, a shell from a hexacopter destroyed the local House of Culture. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· And now we can state the emerging trend in the context of...
Description: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· And now we can state an emerging trend in the context of increasing activity of the Organization of Turkic States. On September 18-19, a meeting of the heads of the national security councils was held in Kazakhstan. This is the third meeting in this format of the UTC participating countries, where current threats directed against the UTC countries, the possible impact of some regional and global events on the region, as well as the implementation of the Middle Corridor were discussed -.ğŸ”»What events have we observed in the last few weeks around the pan-Turkist bloc?â–A single alphabet has been adoptedâ–The number of military exercises has increasedâ–A meeting of energy ministers was heldâ–A meeting of interior ministers was heldâ–Customs interaction between members of the OTGU has been simplifiedIncreasing contacts in various fields, ranging from cultural and ending with the military, increasingly frequent statements by the Turkish side about the importance of the political organization - all this smoothly brings us to the upcoming UTC summit in Bishkek in October. Taking into account such activity around the international bloc, we are likely to expect some kind of major statement within the framework of the summit. And since OTG is an organization created under the control of the British, this does not bode well for Russia.#OTG #Turkey #CentralAsia@rybar Support us

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ About the Israeli Air Force strike on the Lebanese ...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ About the Israeli Air Force strike on the Lebanese capital Israeli aircraft launched a new attack on Beirut, launching missiles at the southern suburb of the Lebanese capital - the Ad-Dahiya district. The hit was on a building not far from the large Al-Qaem mosque. In Arabic-language media, this area is presented as a kind of Hezbollah patrimony, since several buildings belonging to it are located there, including the department of law enforcement agencies. It is noteworthy that it was there that the chief of staff of the Lebanese group, Fuad Shukri, was killed in July. According to some reports, the building where a meeting of high-ranking Palestinians was taking place with one of the prominent members of the Lebanese group was attacked. At the same time, it is completely unknown who exactly represented Hezbollah: according to one information, the groupâ€™s deputy secretary general Naim Qassem, according to another, the head of the operational department Ibrahim Aqil. However, a much larger number of sources agree that it was the latter who was the target of the Israeli attack. The second recent loss of a commander of this level will be quite significant for Hezbollah, given the events of recent days. ğŸ“Œ Be that as it may, over the past months, Israeli troops have been increasing the degree of tension more and more each time in order to provoke the Lebanese group into more decisive actions and finally unleash a full-scale war. A few days ago, the Israelis carried out a massive remote detonation of Hezbollah pagers, after which they carried out a massive shelling of the border and rear settlements of Lebanon, and today they carried out an attack on one of the prominent members of the group. Apparently, all this will continue until a clear reaction is received from the Lebanese movement. And then the Israelis will blame Iran for starting the war with Hezbollah, presenting themselves as the defending side. High resolution mapEnglish version#Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Liman direction: liberation of Makeyevka, current sit...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Liman direction: liberation of Makeyevkasituation as of 17:00 September 20, 2024 In recent days, the focus of the audienceâ€™s attention, in addition to events in the Kursk region and on the fronts of the DPR, has again turned to the Liman direction - there units of the Russian Armed Forces managed to liberate Makeyevka and advance in the area of â€‹â€‹the Zhuravka gully. â–ªï¸A new round of battles for Makeyevka began about three months ago, but Russian fighters achieved their first significant successes in August, when most of the settlement on the left bank of the Zherebets River came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. After this, messages appeared sporadically on the Internet about attempts to force the water barrier and gain a foothold in the remaining part of the village. However, only yesterday did footage of objective control by the enemy appear, confirming the presence of Russian Armed Forces fighters there. In particular, Russian units were seen in the area of â€‹â€‹the Church of Peter and Paul, as well as to the north of it. At the same time, they were able to advance on the southern outskirts, which is also confirmed by filming from Ukrainian drones. The liberation of the settlement is important for the subsequent liquidation of the bridgehead of Ukrainian formations on the right bank of the Zherebets River, which has existed since the fall of 2022. From here it will be possible to increase pressure on the defensive lines of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the Nevskoye-Yampolovka line. â–ªï¸The advancement of units of the Russian Armed Forces was also recorded to the south - in the area of â€‹â€‹\u200b\u200bthe Zhuravka gully. Last year, the enemy erected fortifications in this area: they helped to hold back the onslaught towards the villages of Nevskoye and Terny from the east, however, against the backdrop of the liberation of Makeyevka, Russian troops will be able to attack from the north. In other sections of the Liman direction, the configuration of the front has not undergone significant changes - Positional battles are taking place on the ledge near Torskoye and in Serebryansky forestry. Russian troops are striking at identified targets in the front-line and rear zones - one of the targets hit in recent days has been the temporary deployment point of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Liman. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit - you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #Kremennaya #map #Liman #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ Military ties between the United States and Taiwan c...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ Military ties between the United States and Taiwan continue to actively develop. â–ªï¸This week it became known that the US State Department approved the sale of various spare parts, including for aviation, to Taiwan for $228 million. Such actions do not mean that the deal has already taken place - now Congress must make its decision. However, all sales are usually approved by this body without any problems. â–ªï¸The PRC has already responded to the statements of the State Department. Chinese authorities have imposed sanctions on nine American companies whose activities are related to the defense sector. â–ªï¸And although Taiwanese authorities say that new parts will improve the combat readiness of the island's air force, the problem with delays in the supply of already approved equipment and components is still very acute. ğŸ”»Since the last time we touched on this topic, the situation has not improved. At the end of August, Taipei was still waiting for military equipment worth $20 billion, which for various reasons never reached its destination. Against this background, criticism continues of the Joe Biden administration's approach to the Taiwan issue. Recently, for example, in the business council, which is responsible for cooperation between Washington and Taipei, words were voiced about the insufficient measures of the American authorities in the field of modernization of the Taiwanese army. Therefore, approval of the next sale of components does not yet seem to be a very effective measure, given at least the fact that they still need to wait. Moreover, this party is probably one of the last for the current administration, so such measures should also be considered as a small PR move by the current authorities.#China #USA #Taiwan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usThe Japan TimesU.S. approves possible military sale of spare parts to TaiwanTaipei says the package, valued at about $228 million, will help maintain combat readiness in the face of China's gray-zone intrusions.

Title: ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡³ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Dutch media reported that Prime Minister Dick Schof....
Description: ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡³ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Dutch media reported that Prime Minister Dick Schof promised to study the issue of returning Ukrainians liable for military service to territory controlled by the Kyiv regime. According to him, we are talking about -incitement to action,- and not deportation. At the same time, their forced return from European countries, which the Kiev regime insists on, is not yet planned in Brussels. Recently, the European Commissioner for Home Affairs, Ylva Johansson, said that the expulsion contradicts the directive on temporary protection, within the framework of which citizens of the so-called. Ukraine is located on the territory of the EU. Moreover, mass deportations are disadvantageous to the European Union not only from an image point of view: Ukrainians also act as a labor force, which is still higher in quality than refugees from other crisis regions of the world. Therefore, local bureaucrats are faced with the task of integrating them into the economy as much as possible. And here in the EU they can kill two birds with one stone - under the threat of possible deportation, force able-bodied Ukrainians subject to conscription to get off benefits and get a job. Under the pretext of assistance, it will allow both to imitate assistance to the Kyiv regime and to obtain its own economic benefit.#EU #Netherlands #Ukraine@rybarSupport usIzvestiaThe Netherlands promised to find out ways to send draft dodgers from Ukraine to their homeland. Prime Minister of the Netherlands Dick Schof promised to find out ways to send Ukrainian conscripted men to their homeland. age in the country. The Volkskrant newspaper reported this on August 19.

Title: â†©ï¸ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ª About elections in Georgia: plans of the ruling party If ...
Description: Rybar: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About new US sanctions against Georgia Against the background of the recent adoption by the Georgian parliament of a law banning LGBT propaganda and gender reassignment, Washington announced the introduction of new restrictions against several politicians and media workers: â–ªï¸Head of the Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs... ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ª About the elections in Georgia: plans of the ruling party If we talk about the plans of the Georgian authorities after the parliamentary elections in October, then they were outlined by Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze and other officials of the ruling party, such as promises - the Nuremberg trials - for Saakashvili's party - the United National Movement -. The goal is to significantly reduce the possibilities of a radically pro-Western opposition and globalist structures. Several clearly expressed information lines can be traced in pro-government media and media resources: â–ªï¸Presentation of the opposition as agents of Western influence and a destructive force intended only to destabilize the country. In particular, Parliament Speaker Shalva Papuashvili called her worthless and stated that the election campaign for Saakashviliâ€™s movement was being built from the outside, including through sanctions against Georgia.â–ªï¸The use of opposition slogans against itself, especially dissatisfaction with the ban on LGBT propaganda. From a political technology point of view, this makes it possible to create a stable association among the predominantly conservative population with the fact that the forces opposing the ruling party consist entirely of grant eaters and supporters of -rainbow madness-.â–ªï¸Use of narrative -correction of Saakashviliâ€™s mistakes- and preventing forces affiliated with him from returning to power . As part of this, loud and sometimes populist statements follow, such as words about the readiness to apologize to the Ossetians for the war of 08.08.08. As mentioned earlier, the actions of the ruling party in Georgia are determined by the desire to avoid getting the country involved in a new war against Russia. This is exactly what the radically pro-Western opposition is openly striving for, making it almost an element of its election program. In this case, Tbilisi is guided by pragmatic considerations - the country has greatly benefited from trade and economic ties with Russia. At the same time, they also do not seek to sever relations with the collective West for the same reasons. Therefore, the ruling Georgian authorities are striving to eliminate the internal reasons that prevent them from pursuing a balanced policy. Especially against the backdrop of gradually increasing external pressure.#Georgia @rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Ahead of the parliamentary elections in Georgia scheduled for October, Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze said that they would be held against the backdrop of unprecedented external interference. However, not from Russia, but from other forces, how diplomatically...

thousand 15 tons of trucks (2024), 100 SUVs (until 2027);â–ªï¸Navy forces remain the focus of attention of German military leaders: 9 medium-range boats (3.88 million each, 2024-2025), 8 P-8A Poseidon Title: ğŸ–‡ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º In Ufa, on September 18, the first court hearing took plac...
Description: ğŸ–‡ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º In Ufa, on September 18, the first court hearing took place in the case of discrediting the RF Armed Forces by the niece of the first president of Bashkortostan, Raufa Rakhimova. Law enforcement officers came to the conclusion that on social networks she forms a negative perception of the SVO and the position that residents of the republic refuse to participate in it. Previously, its publication -Prufy.rf- had already published fakes about Russian military personnel. However, the hearing was eventually postponed to October 4, as the defense attorney filed a motion to postpone it. It is logical: everyone knows that Rakhimova cannot take part in the trial, since on the eve of the trial she fled to Turkey. True, if she does not appear at the trial even then, the judge may well force her to attend - by issuing a ruling on the forced delivery of the defendant.â–ªï¸By the way, Rakhimova has already deleted her pages on social networks, on which negative materials regarding the Russian army were published. â–ªï¸She is defended by lawyer Sergei Makarenko, who was also previously convicted under an article on discrediting the RF Armed Forces. Immediately after the start of the SVO, he publicly demonstrated anti-war paraphernalia and expressed a negative attitude towards the special operation, including to law enforcement officers. Before this, Makarenko represented the interests of another oppositionist from Bashkiria, Liliya Chanysheva (foreign agent). She was the head of Navalnyâ€™s extremist headquarters in Ufa, the director of the NGO FZPG -Headquarters, through which FBK (an extremist organization) carried out money laundering. Even earlier, Makarenko acted as a lawyer for the son of the first president of Bashkortostan, Ural Rakhimov, accused of economic crimes. All three of Makarenkoâ€™s clients are united by the fact that as a result they are abroad. Ural Rakhimov fled to Austria, after which he was put on the international wanted list. Liliya Chanysheva, who was serving a sentence for creating an extremist community in Russia, was traded by the West during a large prisoner exchange. And now the owner of the publication -Prufa.rf - Raufa Rakhimova, who promised the imminent collapse of -Russian authoritarianism-, has fled abroad. #Russia #extremists@rybar together with @arslan_nigaSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ–‡ How does the niece of the first president of Bashkortostan, Rauf Rakhimov, support local separatists? Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About Western missiles in the Ukrainian Armed Force...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About Western missiles in the Ukrainian Armed Forces and possible permission to use them For several weeks now, there have been discussions in the Western and Ukrainian information field about the need to allow the Ukrainian Armed Forces to use Western long-range weapons on old Russian territories. So far, only the British authorities have given approval to Ukrainian formations to use cruise missiles Storm Shadow. The rest of the states are still silent. However, as experience in the matter of other supplies has proven more than once, publicity is not an indicator. In the West they can pretend that they doubt it, but in fact there is already a behind-the-scenes decision. And the gradual preparation of society for future events has already begun, since all news agencies controlled by Western countries are trumpeting about it.ğŸ”»The range of missile weapons of the Ukrainian Armed Forces has expanded, especially after the official start of the use of F-16 fighters, which are carriers of the latest JASSM missiles.â–ªï¸This type of weapon has a wide range of action: from 370 km in the most minimal modification and over 1500 km in the maximum, which, when launched from near Poltava, will allow you to reach to remote regions. Of course, it is extremely doubtful that the White House will immediately release the newest version of JASSM. First of all, they will get rid of obsolete missiles that need disposal, so we are considering the JASSM-XR option in theory.â–ªï¸In addition to them, there are several dozen ATACMS ballistic missiles in different modifications, which also pose a threat due to their speed and flight along a ballistic trajectory. â–ªï¸At the moment, there are not many Storm Shadow/SCALP cruise missiles left in Ukrainian warehouses - just over a dozen. This is probably due to the absence of strikes on Russia, despite permission from London.â—ï¸Judging by the absence of strikes by the same -Storms- or -Atakms-, in addition to permission to use, the Ukrainian side is waiting for the supply of new batches of these missiles. According to our data, there are very few reserves left, so they are being protected. And this already brings us to the idea voiced by Elder Edda: the West can delay for quite a long time with official permission from the Armed Forces of Ukraine, but at the same time provide assistance in modernizing the enemyâ€™s own missiles. production. That's why in recent weeks we could hear about the Neptunes or S-200s, which the enemy is increasingly using. This scenario is also possible given the latest strikes by the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In this regard, it is not so important whether the Ukrainian authorities receive approval or not. The enemy already has means for long-range strikes, ranging from drones to its own missiles. For this reason, you need to prepare not only for JASSM or ATACMS, but also for unobvious weapons, which in terms of range can cause problems. High resolution mapEnglish version#Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ” ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Who and how is promoting the transgender agenda...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticideğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ³ï¸â€ğŸŒˆğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Who and how is promoting the transgender agenda in Armenia A real media bomb exploded in Armenia: the republic will be represented for the first time in the Miss Star International beauty contest for transgender people in Sao Paulo, Brazil. ğŸ”»LGBT support for Pashinyan Armenia will be represented by transgender Diana Gzroyan. The media paid attention to the trans divaâ€™s social networks: on Facebook* and Instagram* Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan is featured on the screensavers, which adds piquancy to the situation with obvious political overtones. Gzroyan already appeared in the media in 2019 in connection with the first precedent in Armenia on issuing a passport with a changed name from male to female. Then a new document addressed to Diana Gzroyan was posted online by the Armenian NGO for transgender people, Right Side. However, the Ministry of Internal Affairs noticed that the organization posted a fake passport photo online, in which the female gender was indicated using Photoshop, while in the database Gzroyan was marked as a man. However, the Ministry of Internal Affairs confirmed that the man had indeed received a passport in a womanâ€™s name. ğŸ“ŒAs we wrote, after the 2018 revolution in Armenia, Western NGOs actively started working for the rights of the LGBT community**, which actively supported Pashinyan in rallies for a change of government. Among such NGOs are Pink Armenia (an association of gays and lesbians) and Right Side ( association of transgender people and sex workers).ğŸ”»Who heads the NGO Right Side The head of Right Side is Lilit Martirosyan, known as the first transgender person to speak in the Armenian parliament in 2019. According to Martirosyan, before her speech, Armenians did not understand who trans people were. It is significant that the activist criticizes the role of the Church in the societies of Armenia and neighboring Georgia. ğŸ”»Who sponsors the Right Side NGO â–ªï¸The Right Side NGO appeared in 2016, having received a grant from the European Endowment for Democracy***, which at one time also supported LGBT propaganda in Russia. â–ªï¸Right Side in 2019, announcing the receipt of a new passport by Diana Gzroyan, thanked for the financial support of the EU NGO European Foundation for Democracy.â–ªï¸In 2020, a Right Side office was opened in Yerevan with the financial support of the Swedish Embassy in Armenia.â–ªï¸Among the sponsors The Right Side NGO is indicated by the UK International Development. â–ªï¸Right Side also works with the most influential Western association ILGA-Europe, which distributes grants for LGBT propaganda outside the EU. ğŸ”»What does Turkey have to do with it? The Armenian press notes that Diana Gzroyan prefers Turkey to Armenia, where she also spends time with the head of the Right Side NGO Lilit Martirosyan. The press believes that Armenian transgender people are somehow financed by TÃ¼rkiye. By the way, the list of numerous partners of the Right Side NGO includes the Turkish LGBT organizations 17 MayÄ±s DerneÄŸi (part of the largest ILGA-Europe network) and SPoD Turkey.â—ï¸The NGO SPoD Turkey is especially noteworthy, which was created in 2011 and has a clear list of sponsors: â–Turkish branch of the Soros Foundation - Open Society - *** - 50% of the budget, â– US Embassy - 25%, â– The largest German Friedrich Ebert Foundation *** - 10%. Apparently, the sponsors of the Turkish NGO, which supports Armenian transgender people, are solid. . Itâ€™s no wonder why activists from Armenia prefer hostile Turkey.ğŸ”»Against the backdrop of a systemic crisis of the state, protests, loss in the war and concessions to Turkey and Azerbaijan, such news only irritates the Armenian public more. The fact that Gzroyan has a photo of Pashinyan on the main page on social networks, in addition to facts about ties with Turkey, only aggravates the publicâ€™s distrust of the government. But participation in the competition will have a positive effect on Armeniaâ€™s rating in the perception of LGBT people: the positions of Armenians there are low, while in the EU some are very I want.*belong to Meta, recognized as an extremist organization in the Russian Federation **recognized as an extremist organization ***undesirable organization#Armenia #LGBT #Turkey @pezdicide no chemicals - just factspanorama.amFirst transgender passport - photoshop instead of documentation of sex reassignment surgeryFirst transgender passport - photoshop instead of documentation of sex reassignment surgery

Description: Forwarded From Two majors #Summary for the morning of September 20, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, heavy fighting was reported in the Glushkovsky direction, the enemy launched an attack on a column (two Leopard tanks and 7 bbm) in the Vesely area, the Russian Armed Forces and border guards pinned down the Armed Forces of Ukraine in battle, in Footage of destroyed enemy equipment began to appear online. Also noteworthy was the fact that a Leopard 2A5 was destroyed near Sheptukhovka, Korenevsky district, more than 25 minutes from the border (the area of â€‹â€‹the old Ukrainian Armed Forces breakthrough), which indicates that the enemy used rather rare NATO equipment in the Kursk operation. Yesterday morning they reported the liberation of Nikolaevo-Daryino and Darino by the Russian Army.â–ªï¸ In the Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky) direction they report ongoing battles for the city in the development. Enemy resources recognize the advance of our troops in Toretsk and in the New York (Novgorod) area.â–ªï¸ In the Ugledar direction, our aviation bombards the rear positions of the enemy FAB with UMPC in Dobrovolye and Bogoyavlenka. The latter is reached by a road from the Yuzhnodonbasskaya mine (near Vodyanoy), for which there are battles. â–ªï¸ The Zaporozhye Front reports the intensification of actions by the Russian Armed Forces north of Marfopol, Pologovsky district.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine do not stop terrorist attacks on civilians. In Shebekino, a kamikaze drone attacked a car near an agricultural enterprise. In the village of Murom, a car was damaged as a result of a UAV attack. In the village of Kazinka, Valuysky urban district, the faÃ§ade of a social facility was damaged as a result of a kamikaze drone attack. In the village of Murom, Shebekinsky urban district, drones attacked parked cars. The village of Petrovka, Belgorod district, came under artillery fire. In the Shebekinsky urban district in the village of Terezovka, two private houses were destroyed by fire as a result of the arrival of a shell.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in Gorlovka, a man born in 1972 was injured during enemy shelling from cannon artillery. and a woman born in 1945; when an explosive object was dropped from an Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, a woman born in 1987 was injured, and a man born in 1967 was injured. In Georgievka, Volnovakha municipal district, a man born in 1975 was injured when an explosive object was dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Title: ğŸ¬ â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events o...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week of September 13 - 19, 2024â–ªï¸After a short break, Iranian proxies from Iraq again reported attacks on Israel. Kamikaze drones were allegedly launched in the direction of Haifa and the Jordan Valley, but not a single one of them reached its target.â–ªï¸At the same time, fighters of the Ansarallah movement launched a Palestine-2 missile on Israeli territory. The ammunition flew to the center of the country and fell in an open area near the settlement of Kfar Daniel.â–ªï¸A day later, in the Yemeni province of Damar, the Houthis destroyed another MQ-9A Reaper UAV. This is the tenth American drone shot down in Yemen since the beginning of the escalation in Palestine and Israel.â–ªï¸At the same time, a MegaTug-class ocean tug, under the protection of the French Navy, managed to tow the Greek tanker MV SOUNION. The ship was attacked and burned by Ansarally fighters in the southern Red Sea more than two weeks ago. Against this backdrop, the US Navy intercepted several munitions in the Red Sea region. Over the course of a week, Western naval forces shot down only three Houthi UAVs.â–ªï¸Simultaneously with the Israeli hacker attack, explosions occurred in Damascus in Beirut, Lebanon. During the detonation of the pagers, up to 18 Hezbollah fighters located in Syria were injured.â–ªï¸A month later, pro-Iranian groups attacked the US Air Force base Kharab al-Jair in the northeast of the Syrian Arab Republic. All three launched kamikaze drones were intercepted by American air defense systems.â–ªï¸The Russian Aerospace Forces and the Syrian Air Force continue to strike ISIS terrorists in the Syrian desert. The next raids followed after militants left the American At-Tanf base in the direction of Deir ez-Zor.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Under the noise of massive strikes by the Israel ...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah spoke to the noise of massive strikes by the Israel Defense Forces in southern Lebanon. Despite what was happening in those minutes in the border areas, the broadcast continued. â–ªï¸One of the main topics of the speech was the Israeli hacker attack on Hezbollahâ€™s communication channels, and then the bombing of pagers used by members of the group. According to Nasrallah, in this case the Israelis crossed all red lines. According to the Secretary General of Hezbollah, with these actions Israel wanted to force them to stop shelling the north of the country. However, Hassan Nasrallah directly stated that the only way to achieve this is to stop attacks on the Gaza Strip. At the same time, he tried to devalue the results of the Israeli sabotage from a military point of view. According to him, Hezbollah's infrastructure is so extensive that what happened did not harm the organization's capabilities, its control over the state of affairs and the morale of the group's members.â–ªï¸On the issue of escalating the conflict, Nasrallah said that by deepening the war, Israel will not be able to achieve its goals. If the ultra-Orthodox government goes further, they will evict even more Israelis from their homes. â–ªï¸In this context, he promised - fair retribution and heavy retribution - to Israel for past events without mentioning place and time. At the same time, one can draw some parallel with the promise of revenge from the Iranians, who have been promising to answer for the murder of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran for more than a month. What was to be expected, the head of the Lebanese group called the Zionist enemy the main instigator of the current war, while Hezbollah was traditionally presented as the defender of the Palestinian people in the face of -aggression-. It is worth noting that in his speech, Hassan Nasrallah did not mention the ongoing bombing of Lebanon: he was talking about the attacks that took place on Tuesday and Wednesday, as a result of which thousands of Lebanese were injured - both combatants and civilians alike. Considering the response to the death of one of the founders of Hezbollah, Fuad Shukri, the Lebanese are unlikely to risk a full-fledged war, which, however, is what is expected in the ultra-Orthodox government. It is much more likely that on Hezbollahâ€™s side everything will be limited to UAV and missile strikes, with the difference that this time the launches will be much more massive.#Israel #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About new US sanctions against Georgia Against the backd...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About new US sanctions against Georgia Against the backdrop of the recent adoption by the Georgian parliament of a law banning LGBT propaganda and gender reassignment, Washington announced the introduction of new restrictions against several politicians and media workers: â–ªï¸The head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs Department for Special Assignments, Zviad Kharazeshvili, was convicted of -supervising brutal repression against young activists and opposition leaders - during opposition rallies against the local law on foreign agents.â–ªï¸The Americans accused the leaders of the media platform and conservative movement -Alt-Info- Konstantin Morgoshia and Zurab Makharadze - of - obstructing the holding of minority rallies - and calling for attacks on offices NGOs in 2021-2023.â–ªï¸Also, the US State Department stated that they are taking additional steps to introduce visa restrictions against more than 60 Georgian citizens and members of their families responsible for undermining democracy in the country or involved in it. Sanctions in Tbilisi expectedly associated with the upcoming parliamentary elections in October and an attempt to spur the opposition to protest. And Prime Minister Irakli Kobakhidze even stated that in the event of another such step, relations with the United States could be reconsidered. However, the parties are in no hurry to break the dishes. It is not the top officials in Georgia who are subject to American sanctions, and in Tbilisi, in turn, the United States does not yet plan to physically prohibit the activities of all globalist funds and structures - we are only talking about limiting their work. Therefore, real discord in relations between countries with heated public rhetoric is still very far away. Which, however, does not prevent the ruling party of Georgia, within the framework of a balanced policy, from gradually drifting towards Russia purely for practical reasons.#Georgia #USA@rybarSupport usTACCGeorgia may reconsider its attitude towards the United States if the American side accepts sanctionsEvents in Russia and the world. Analytical publications. Materials of press conferences. Video and photo reports

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border ha...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ The situation on the Lebanese-Israeli border has become even more tense: the press service of the Defense Army announced the start of massive strikes on Lebanon. At the same time, the Israeli General Staff approved plans for the continuation of the war on the northern front. What is interesting here is that the bombing of the southern part of the Arab Republic began just minutes before the announced speech of Hezbollah Secretary General Hassan Nasrallah, where he raised the topic of the recent Israeli hacker attack and the subsequent explosions of pagers. Despite the fact that so far the IDF is using only aviation and artillery, some media, citing Israeli media, hastened to announce the beginning of the Third Lebanese War. Some even reported the start of a ground offensive, but the movements of Israeli units have not yet been recorded. Be that as it may, in recent days, Israeli troops have dealt several significant blows to the Lebanese group. And even at the moment when Hezbollah sympathizers were expecting a speech by its secretary general, the territory of Lebanon was subjected to one of the most massive bombings. Nevertheless, Hezbollah fighters are also not sitting idly by and are launching rockets at populated areas in northern Israel. Today alone, ten IDF soldiers were injured in the region, which was one of the highest numbers for this month. And what will be the final development of events is a question that is being asked by both Arabic-language and Israeli media. But it is obvious that the degree of conflict between the IDF and Hezbollah is one of the highest in recent times. #Israel #Lebanon #Palestine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· This morning the Israeli security service Shabak re...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡· This morning, the Israeli security service Shabak reported the detention of 73-year-old Ashkelon resident Moti Meman, who was allegedly recruited by Iran to assassinate prominent representatives of the Israeli authorities, including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and Israeli Defense Minister Yoav Galant. Meman himself was arrested back in August, but the investigation lasted all this time. It is noted that the accused provided all possible assistance to the special services and even thanked them for his detention, because he was afraid of further developments. According to the investigation, Meman was recruited in April 2024, while he was in Turkey. He held several meetings with Iranian businessmen and intelligence agents, after which he carried out various assignments: from photographing IDF facilities to transferring finances to anti-Israeli groups. At the last meeting, he was asked to organize assassination attempts on various individuals, allegedly as revenge for the murder of former Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh. At the same time, according to Meman, the Iranians presented this as the only way to avoid war. However, they were unable to agree on the amount of the reward, so the issue was postponed, and Meman himself went to Israel, where he was detained. ğŸ”»Itâ€™s interesting that the Israeli media actively praise the actions of their own intelligence services, which in recent days have not only organized explosions of various devices in Lebanon and Syria, but also stopped a possible attempt at terrorist attacks. In turn, Arabic-language media perceived this news through the prism of the impending response from Iran, which has been expected since the end of July in response to the Israeli murder of the Hamas leader in Tehran. #Israel #Iran@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Recently, many Western countries have been trying to get...
Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Recently, many Western countries have been trying to get rid of any Chinese equipment installed at sensitive facilities, and in South Korea they are trying to keep up with this trend. It recently became known that surveillance cameras at some military bases in the Republic of Korea were made in China - they are now being removed en masse and replaced with others. We are talking about 1,300 cameras, the supplier of which, as the media write, initially claimed that they were not from China. According to intelligence information, the equipment could transmit video recordings abroad when connected to some Chinese server. South Korea claims that the cameras were not installed at the most sensitive military installations, located, for example, near the demilitarized zone separating the South from the North. Observation using this equipment was carried out mainly at training grounds. ğŸ”»There may indeed be a grain of truth in this story, especially given the situation in the region. However, it is South Korean intelligence that is in charge of solving the problem, and it has recently become the epicenter of several major scandals related, for example, to the leak of data about agents. So even if the cameras weren't actually made in China, South Korea's intelligence agencies may be trying to improve their reputation and demonstrate their usefulness to the country's population through these types of news outlets. over 1,300 Chinese-made surveillance cameras at unitsSEOUL, Sept. 13 (Yonhap) -- The military has recently taken down more than 1,300 surveilla...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡² About the military expenditures of Armenia and Azerba...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡² About military spending in Armenia and Azerbaijan The news about reducing defense spending in Azerbaijan for the coming 2025 remained unnoticed in the Russian segment. Compared to 2024, the decrease was about 6.6%.ğŸ“Œ In the Armenian media, this was presented as an important step that the neighbors really strive for peace. And it really seems like this: the budget is actually being reduced. But for some reason everyone forgets about the numbers. For 2024, expenses ranged from 3.5 to 3.9 billion dollars, that is, the reduction will be up to 3.1 to 3.4 billion dollars. And this is the level of expenses for 2022-2023. Now the Azerbaijanis do not need to set very high standards, because Karabakh was taken without resistance. Therefore, cutting defense spending and focusing on the social needs of the country is natural. But the amounts are still high, considering how little the Armenians have spent on their army in recent years. And itâ€™s curious whether this minor budget cut in Azerbaijan will be presented as a demonstration of peace?â—ï¸Logically, Baku will probably expect a similar step from the Armenians, whose military budget already looks ridiculous. But if expenses suddenly increase in Yerevan, then the neighbors will have a new reason to accuse them of militarization and disruption of all agreements. By the way, the Azerbaijanis themselves train their units with enviable regularity. Recently, training took place for two border units in the north and south of the country, and AkÄ±ncÄ± drones operate near the Armenian borders almost without interruption. High resolution mapEnglish version#Azerbaijan #Armenia@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ About American missiles around China As soon as the American military announced the imminent deployment of the Typhon medium-range missile system in Japan, new details emerged about the missile installation already in the Philippines. â–ªï¸According to Reuters sources, the Americans do not plan to return equipment to the United States in the near future. â–ªï¸In addition, Manila stated that Philippine and American troops continue to work with the missile system. They also do not know plans for its withdrawal, although the joint exercises in which Typhon arrived in the Philippines are ending this month.ğŸ”»Yes, such plans may suddenly appear. However, so far everything indicates that the scenario of deploying two American missile systems at once in the Asia-Pacific region is becoming more and more likely. In this case, we should expect a response not only from China, but also from Russia - Vladimir Putin, for example, spoke about the appearance of medium-range missiles in the Philippines back in June of this year. In general, the actions of both the Americans and the Chinese could lead to the start of a new arms race in the region, for which, it seems, the preconditions are now being actively created. Title: ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ About Olaf Scholzâ€™s visit to Uzbekistan and Kazakhst...
Description: ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ About Olaf Scholz's visit to Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan An atmosphere of excitement was initially felt around the visit of the German Chancellor to Central Asia, with a visit to the two diplomatic capitals of the region, Samarkand and Astana. It is not surprising, given that this is the first visit of the head of the German government to the region in eight years - the last time was Angela Merkel, who visited Kyrgyzstan in 2016. Also, on October 17, a summit - Central Asia - Germany - was held, as a result of which the six leaders adopted a very framework declaration, and the real result was support for Kyrgyzstanâ€™s candidacy for the post of non-permanent member of the UN Security Council for 2027-2028.ğŸ“ŒSeparate anti-Russian media are parallel to savoring the details , who would meet the important guest at the plane's ramp, assumed that agreements would be reached on investments in energy, labor exports, and even the joining of the leaders of Central Asian states to Western peace initiatives under the so-called. Ukraine.â–ªï¸But the reality turned out to be more prosaic. The first failure occurred in Samarkand, where the German leader first arrived. Despite reaching an agreement on simplified entry for highly qualified Uzbek specialists, Scholz apparently failed to reach a compromise on the return of Afghan refugees through Uzbekistan, although this was one of the conditions of the visit. Just as it was not possible to clearly answer the question of what Germany can offer to the region.â–ªï¸The meeting of the Chancellor with the President of Kazakhstan was frankly unsuccessful, at which Kassym-Jomart Tokayev dumbfounded his German counterpart with statements that Russia could not be defeated on the battlefield, that the Istanbul Agreements were a good chance for peace, and in the end canceling the joint press conference altogether.ğŸ”»After Vladimir Putinâ€™s statements about the consequences of attacks on Russia with long-range weapons, Central Asia clearly became nervous. The escalation will inevitably affect them too, forcing them to abandon the policy of two chairs and profits from the transit of Russian gray imports. Therefore, a kind of cold shower for the chancellor with a reminder of possible irreparable consequences turned out to be the easiest way to signal his concern.#Germany #Kazakhstan #Uzbekistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ How the Americans are trying to sell the non-existent pr...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ How the Americans are trying to sell the non-existent project of a new nuclear power plant to the Armenians. Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan, speaking at the Pan-Armenian Forum in Yerevan, raised the issue of building a new nuclear power plant. Let us recall that the Armenian authorities intend to close the existing Metsamor nuclear power plant, which is maintained by Rosatom. Now its service life has been extended until 2036. According to some information, it is the West that is demanding the liquidation of the station, which generates about 40% of the electricity in the republic and provides the lowest tariffs for the population.â–ªï¸Now the key issue has become the choice of the contractor country, using the technology of which a new nuclear power plant will be built, similar to innovative small modular reactors ( MMR), which are considered safer. â–ªï¸It is significant that Pashinyan stated that it was the Americans who made the greatest progress in the development of SMRs. However, this is clearly disingenuous, since the leaders in the field are precisely Russia and China, where stations of this type are already operating or are being built. â—ï¸At the same time, the Americans failed several of these projects for economic reasons. For example, last year the SMR project of NuScale Power Corp., which the United States promoted around the world, was loudly closed: its cost turned out to be 53% higher than planned. And this despite the fact that the project was actively advertised in Poland and Romania, but the Americans refused to build it even at home. â–ªï¸It is critically important for the United States to stop the expansion of Russia and China in the export of nuclear technologies, but so far potential partners can only be lured with promises, not specific actions.  â–ªï¸As we wrote, recently the Americans have been too active in the nuclear sector of Armenia and even announced that the Armenian authorities have applied to join the 123rd agreement, which gives access to US civilian nuclear technologies that do not yet exist.ğŸ”»However , despite the recent failure of a similar project, the Americans are promoting the same non-existent SMR project for Armenia, and Pashinyan is only happy to voice Washingtonâ€™s marketing and political promises, which cannot be supported by anything. Needless to say, almost the entire energy and economy of the republic is at stake. #Armenia #Russia #USA  @rybarSupport usfinport.amPashinyan announced a strategic decision on a new nuclear power plant | Finport.am

Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 19, 2024 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 19, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the Russian Armed Forces are advancing near Vnezapny, Byakhovo and Obukhovka, Korenevsky district. There are battles going on northeast of Lyubimovka. In the Glushkovsky direction, the Ukrainian Armed Forces are attacking in the Medvezhiy area, are present in the Novy Put area, and reported battles in the Volfino and Krasnooktyabrsky areas. There were reports of the enemy using German Leopards and Swedish infantry fighting vehicles, which did not help him achieve success. â–ªï¸ In the Kupyansky direction, our troops attack north and west of Peschany and south at Stelmakhovka. â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces expanded the zone of control in Grodovka; on enemy maps it is almost completely occupied by our troops. The territory liberated from the Ukrainian Armed Forces around the recently captured Ukrainsk is expanding. To the south, battles are reported on the outskirts of Gornyak and in the Zhelanny First area. â–ªï¸ North of Ugledar there are battles in the area of â€‹â€‹Vodyanoy and the Yuzhnodonbasskaya mine.â–ªï¸ In the Kherson direction, the Russian Armed Forces are purposefully destroying the enemy in the area of â€‹â€‹the southern suburbs of Kherson, depriving him of transport and field warehouses. The enemy is shelling Aleshki, Kakhovka, Novaya Kakhovka, Velikaya Lepetikha, Dnepryany, Cossack Camps, Prince-Grigorievka, Malaya Lepetikha. â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, a woman was killed as a result of daytime shelling by the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the village of Bezlyudovka, Shebekinsky urban district. In the city of Shebekino, a drone flew into the window of a social building. During work near Shebekino, a drone attacked a truck, the driver received multiple shrapnel wounds. In the Belgorod region, near the village of Nikolskoye, a kamikaze drone attacked a passenger car moving along the road. The village of Murom, Shebekinsky urban district, came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces, two civilians were wounded. Yesterday morning in Shebekino, a service bus was attacked by a Ukrainian Armed Forces drone, four civilians were injured. â–ªï¸ In the DPR, in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, a man born in 1964 was injured when an explosive object was dropped from a UAV of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. In Vladimirovka of the Volnovakha municipal district, a man born in 2001 was injured as a result of the detonation of an explosive object. Summary compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk region, district of the settlement. Cellarsâœ¨The role of our aviation in the Kursk region is difficult to overestimate. I am glad that it is often possible to minimize the time between the transfer of coordinates and a combat mission. Two majors and Smuglyankaâ€™s detachment

Now from Syria itself. From the point of view of the tactics of Ukrainian formations, this is not at all surprising. Whether in Africa or the Middle East, the only goal of the Ukrainian authorities, apparently, is to -annoy- Russia. And training militants to use UAVs is really something that the Ukrainian Armed Forces can teach terrorists, given how often Ukrainian units attack Russia with various drones at different distances. Moreover, the Syrian armed forces are not nearly equipped with the air defense systems that we have, which, under certain circumstances, can create a problem for our contingent throughout Syria. At the same time, if it became known about the arrival of Ukrainian formations in Idlib, then the recent airstrikes of the Russian Aerospace Forces in this area could well have been timed to coincide with this event. Apparently, the Israeli ultra-Orthodox in power consider the plan for undermining pagers and multimedia devices is brilliant. It would seem: now Lebanese society should demand revenge, pushing both Hezbollah and the Iranians to hoist the next red flags of revenge and loud words about the inevitability of retribution. If the pro-Iranian formations start something, well, the Israelis will have a reason for self-defense, freeing their hands and demonstrating to the entire world community that they are the victims of insidious adversaries. Thatâ€™s just the fact that almost ordinary multimedia devices provoked justified fears among buyers of such products: how will an iPhone or Samsung fly up into thin air, which by tragic accident turned out to be from another batch, over which the Mossad conjured? To be fair, we were still talking about radio stations and pagers of certain models, but the chaos that reigned added a huge number of other devices to this row - and the popular rumor no longer began to understand.â—ï¸And these questions hit the business reputation of companies producing high-tech devices and microelectronics. It so happens that the ultra-Orthodox, in an attempt to provoke the Lebanese, have now gained close attention from the owners of the most influential companies in the world. Well, the traditional gesheft can turn into quite a Ukrainian zrada - so you have to be able to sit in a puddle (however, no one has canceled the folk wisdom of whoever you mess with - thatâ€™s how youâ€™ll gain).#Israel #Lebanon @rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The day after remote detonation of pagers, new explosions were heard in Beirut. Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The day after the remote detonation of pagers in Be...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ The day after the remote detonation of pagers, new explosions were heard in Beirut. This time, other devices are being reported to detonate, including cell phones, solar panels, electronic locks, car stereos, and even kitchen appliances. Videos of fires in residential buildings also appeared on social networks. Apparently, external interference was carried out in equipment with multimedia capabilities. The cyberattack affected portable radios used by the Shiite organization Hezbollah. Explosions were also heard at the funeral of the son of one of its senior members, who died yesterday in a similar attack. The media are disseminating information that all the radios were recently supplied devices from the Japanese concern ICOM. Israeli intelligence could have equipped them with explosives, just like the pagers that exploded yesterday. According to preliminary data, nine people have already died today and more than 300 were injured in the Lebanese capital, the Bekaa Valley, Nabatiyeh and other settlements in the south of the country. Speaker of the Lebanese Parliament Nabih Berri was injured. It is not yet known whether the operation to massively detonate communication devices in Lebanon is a preparation for active hostilities on the Lebanese-Israeli border. Against the backdrop of the events of the last 24 hours, the President of neighboring Syria, Bashar al-Assad, has already ordered Syrian commanders and intelligence officers to abandon two-way radios and portable communication devices. which can significantly impact the ability to communicate between departments. #Israel #Lebanon #Syria @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ We are surprised to read that todayâ€™s attack on the arse...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ We are surprised to read that todayâ€™s attack on the arsenal in the Tver region was the fruit of some top-secret Western super-developments in the field of UAVs and artificial intelligence, satellite reconnaissance, radar stations and other things related to NATO. The reality is, that the attack was fundamentally no different from similar drone attacks on oil refineries, airfields and other facilities. The enemyâ€™s tactics and even types of weapons were approximately the same as during massive attacks on Russian territory with a six-month range. And the reasons for what happened are the same - a lot has been said about the problems of countering drone attacks over the past six months. There is progress in resolving these issues, but, as you can understand, there is still a lot of work to be done. And I would like to hope that it will not come down to following unfounded slogans and looking for easy ways. It is worth adding separately that the Russian Armed Forces have already faced large losses of ammunition depots in the North Military District zone - this was the case after the appearance of HIMARS and Storm Shadow in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. However, the problem was partly solved with the help, for example, of dispersing large storage facilities. Perhaps someone simply still naively believes that the combat zone is limited to new regions, the Ukrainian Armed Forces do not have their own long-range weapons, and drones were launched at oil refineries in the rear regions from the Baltic states and Kazakhstan. Oddly enough, after six months of regular raids, such beliefs are not so rare.#Tver #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· First we saw a meeting of the ministers of internal affai...
Description: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· First, we saw a meeting of the ministers of internal affairs of the participating countries - the Organization of Turkic States -, then a sharp increase in the number of military activities between the states of the bloc, and the other day a meeting of energy ministers took place. Of course, the meetings themselves are not new. By the way, this is already the fourth event of this kind, at which the interaction of members of the UTG in the energy sector was discussed, from standard oil and gas issues to green energy. But attention to the UTG is really increasing. If previously we heard about such a couple of times a year and all this was limited to words about the need to strengthen the union without specifics, now we are seeing the opposite - the role of the pan-Turkic bloc is growing. This time the main attention was drawn to projects affecting new routes on which they have now converged interests in the West, in particular, the Middle Corridor and the importance of infrastructure in the Caspian Sea for the development of UTG energy. We should not expect any sudden changes or a surge in activity in the implementation of global projects, given the mentality of the countries included in the bloc. But the very fact that such events are becoming more frequent speaks for itself, and you should pay attention to them.#OTG #TÃ¼rkiye@rybar Support us

When you are waging an information war against your own citizens, this cannot be allowed. But I have bad news: a person who once learned that beyond the horizon it is not the Dog Heads, but the same people, will never forget this and will strive to learn more about the other side. #media technologies # Russia@pl_syrenka - Poland is not a foreign countryTelegramAndrey MedvedevThe story about the struggle of Americans with RT, this, oddly enough, is not entirely about RT. Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ And again, an important event took place in Kyrgyzstan in th...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬ And again, an important event took place in Kyrgyzstan in the context of Russian soft power - geological classes at the Karpinsky Institute opened in Bishkek. This is already the fifth geoclass within the framework of an international program aimed at promoting the Russian geological school abroad. We previously reported on similar classes in Ghana, Ethiopia, Mozambique and Cuba. Their common goal is to make common approaches to the study of subsoil and mineral resources in different countries, which will simplify the exploration and production of minerals in the future. Considering the amount of data on the state of subsoil in the post-Soviet space that has been lost since the 90s, the importance of this work cannot be overestimated. Especially given the increased attention of the West to rare earth metals in Central Asia (and other developing countries) and Russiaâ€™s attempts to break into new markets bypassing sanctions. Therefore, the foundation that is now being formed by Russian geologists is critically important for ensuring Russiaâ€™s national interests. And when the fight for natural resources gets hotter, we will appreciate it. #Kyrgyzstan #softpower #Russia #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usTelegramKarpinsky InstituteğŸ“Œ The opening of the Karpinsky Geological Class took place in the Kyrgyz Republic!ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¬At the Institute of Geology named after. M. M. Adyshev National Academy of Sciences of the Kyrgyz Republic in Bishkek held the grand opening of the Karpinsky Geological Class. Thisâ€¦

Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· The Turks have begun a new season of the series around the so-called Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus, or simply the part of Cyprus occupied by the Turks. And now the Turks are allegedly helping the TRNC maintain combat capability, while straining the authorities of Cyprus. Title: ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the attack of the Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the Ukrainian Armed Forces UAV attack on military warehouses in Toropets. At night, Ukrainian formations launched a massive UAV attack on various targets in Russia. Air defense operated in the Bryansk, Kursk, Oryol and Smolensk regions. One of the targets was the arsenal in the city of Toropets in the Tver region. Despite official statements about the fire being the result of -falling debris-, this is obviously not the case. A partial evacuation has been announced in the district, the population is being taken to the Western Dvina. Explosions in warehouses were so powerful that they were recorded by earthquake monitoring systems. The first tremors with a magnitude of 2.8 points were recorded at 3:56, the next seven were weaker, from 2 to 2.8 points. It is curious that the warehouse struck by the enemy was at one time opened by the then deputy head of the Russian Ministry of Defense Bulgakov, who is now under investigation. According to the officialâ€™s assurances, voiced in 2018, the implementation of the complex will build a storage system for missiles, ammunition and explosive materials that meets the highest world standards. And the arsenal - allows you to shelter reserves of missiles and ammunition from external influences and ensure their safety and fire and explosion safety - and on the territory, according to the report, there was even a sauna. Perhaps, if everything that happened was caused by - falling debris - the investigation would have more work to do. #Kursk # Tver #Orel #Bryansk #Smolensk@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Title: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ About the corruption scandal involving the Prime Minister of...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ About the corruption scandal involving the Prime Minister of Great Britain British Prime Minister Keir Starmer found himself at the center of a scandal over gifts from the largest donor of the Labor Party to his wife. Starmer faces an investigation due to a violation of parliamentary rules, since he did not declare the fact that his donor party paid for expensive clothes for his wife Victoria. Waheed Alli, a famous media mogul and former head of the online retailer Asos, gave money for clothes and stylist services for Mrs. Starmer. He did this both before and after the prime minister took office in July 2024. The businessman is also the largest financial donor to Starmer himself. In 2024, he bought the prime minister more than Â£18,000 worth of clothes, glasses and watches. He also spent 20,000 pounds on the Prime Minister's accommodation during the parliamentary elections and the same on the expenses of his personal office. It can hardly be called an accident that not so long ago Wahid Alli received a pass giving him unlimited access to 10 Downing Street. Formally, only close political advisers and ministers can have such a right. It is enough to add up a few numbers to understand where such privileges came from. Alli donated Â£500,000 to Labour. Now, as it turns out, Wahid is also paying for the personal expenses of the Starmer family from his own pocket. Quite convenient.#UK @rybar with @oldGBRSupport usThetimesKeir Starmer breached rules over wifeâ€™s clothes bought by Lord AlliDavid Lammy insists PMs need donations to â€˜look their bestâ€™ after leader breached Commons rules by failing to declare donor paid for Lady Starmerâ€™s clothing
