Title: ğŸ” Yesterday, some commentators wrote with obvious surprise about...
Description: Forwarded From Andrei Medvedev Yesterday, some commentators wrote with obvious surprise about another scandal involving British spies who, as it were, were still diplomats. -How can that be, but this is a violation of all principles of international relations-. However, in the case of the British, the case may be considered more surprising if suddenly, for some reason, the diplomat is not also an employee of the intelligence services. This has always been the case in Britain. There is often no difference between a spy and a diplomat/traveler/culturologist/journalist. One of the most famous orientalists in Britain is Arminius Vambery. He worked in the 19th century, lived in Istanbul, taught history and English to the children of the local elite, and traveled to Central Asia. in 2005, London admitted that Vambery was a spy (by the way, he was also the prototype of Van Helsing). Daniel Defoe, Alan Milne (yup, Winnie the Pooh), Somerset Maugham, Graham Greene, John Le CarrÃ©, and probably Kipling worked for intelligence. For the English, his main work is not -The Jungle Book,- but -Kim- and war poems. And judging by the content of Kim, the author was very well acquainted with the activities of the pandits and the working methods of the Indian Service and the Scout Corps. The two intelligence officers who were the first Europeans to cross Afghanistan from east to west - Charles Christie and Henry Pottinger - disguised as Tatar merchants are an example of how British diplomacy worked even then. Christie became a PMC instructor and military adviser and trained the Ukrainian Persian army in the war against Russia; he was killed as a Marine of the 810th brigade by a Russian Cossack in 2024 in the battle of Malaya Lokni in 1812, in the battle of Aslanduz. And Pottinger just became a diplomat, knight and governor of Hong Kong. All British diplomacy of the 18th and 19th centuries consisted entirely of diplomats with officer ranks, officers in the role of ambassadors (Arthur Connolly, the author of the term -Great Game-, is the clearest example of this), and all together intelligence officers. And then the tradition flowed into the 20th and 21st centuries. This is normal for an island empire, where expansion and diplomatic intrigue were the key to the survival of the state. The skill to play one against another and remain on good terms with everyone. And after all, the East India Company was the driver of diplomacy, intelligence and economic development for almost two centuries. The corporate state long predates the age of globalization. Without the Company, Britain would never have become an empire. And precisely in the Company the concept of -ambassador- was very vague. The British ambassador is not about maintaining etiquette or international relations. Only and exclusively about obtaining benefits for the Company and the Empire, and by any means. Anything at all. Here's an example for you. China and the Opium Wars. It's a long story to tell. But just read what role the British diplomats played, what their task was (spoiler: to keep all the Chinese on opium), where the Company was and what does HSBC bank have to do with it, which is still, by the way, the main bank from Gibraltar to Tokyo. It is worth remembering the role the British Embassy played in the February Revolution of 1917. Or remember where Herzen cleaned himself off, and then the Bolsheviks drank beer and held congresses. And just think, what a sensation. The British spoiled the Russians. What a miracle. PS The funniest story about English writers and intelligence agencies goes like this. George Orwell, who -1984- wrote, worked closely with the Information Research Department (IRD). This is a Foreign Office structure that fought against the influence of communist propaganda. So the author of a novel about the horrors of totalitarianism snitched there on actors, writers, scientists and politicians whom he suspected of sympathizing with the USSR. Orwell also kept a personal list of unreliable people. There is an opinion that he was actually an MI5 agent. Such are the things. And when adult children of our forty-year-old liberals start commemorating -1984- it always looks very funny. https://t.me/rybar/63471TelegramRybarğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ–‡ About British spies in Russia and the intelligence activities of the British Foreign Office Todayâ€™s announcement by the Russian FSB to stop accreditation of six diplomats from the British Embassy in Moscow is another illustration of the rule, which almost never happens...

Title: ğŸ” They died in the assaults... IT specialists died in the assaul...
Description: Forwarded From Kotsnews People died in the assaults... IT specialists died in the assaults... An excellent specialist from Moscow proposed to the commander his ideas for forming a stable closed connection on a front line of a couple of tens of kilometers (the unit's area of â€‹â€‹responsibility). But the commander needed a grenade launcher in the assault group. And the choice fell on the IT specialist. However, there was little choice. Artillerymen died in the assaults... Remember '22? For three months, new artillery divisions were trained at the training grounds. Specialists worked and spent time, money, and equipment on training. The output is ready-made calculations. Which upon arrival in the NWO zone turned out to be unnecessary. Because stormtroopers were needed. Only artillerymen were not trained in this. Engineers died in the assaults... A bespectacled graduate of Baumanka, who dreamed of his own workshop for the production of ground-based drones. He even assembled prototypes from a known substance and sticks. And I did not find understanding from the authorities. The authorities needed stormtroopers. I know different stories. And as the commander said: -Iâ€™m going, whoâ€™s with me?- And the volunteer stormtroopers broke ranks. And how the soldiers agreed to the position of cook and driver, just to get into the assault squad, in which there were no free places on staff. They went for the assault consciously. In 1922, everyone was sent to the assault out of despair, patching up holes in the front line. But at what point did the most difficult and dangerous work suddenly turn into punishment? I donâ€™t know how fair the accusations against the command of the 87th Regiment are - the relevant services are now looking into this. But the very fact of repurposing an effective UAV reconnaissance crew into assault infantry in the current conditions is, to put it mildly, sabotage. -It is impossible to disband something that did not exist,- the regiment commanderâ€™s defenders write today. - They were snipers by state. If so, then I have bad news for you. This only means that in some formations they live in the last century and are very far from modern combat realities, if the regimentâ€™s staff does not at least provide for a UAV department. And aerial reconnaissance is carried out by snipers, who have probably never even held a Dragunov rifle in their hands. But they were unmanned, without which it is simply impossible to fight today. @sashakots

The money will go to various areas, including disaster risk management , cybersecurity, food and energy security, regional cooperation and trade.ğŸ“Œ An increase in funding of this amount looks more impressive when compared to the summer handouts. In general, his statements at this event were more related to cooperation with Russia and other related topics. However, they did not avoid mentioning the problem of the South China Sea. In one of his interviews, the Malaysian prime minister said that Kuala Lumpur will not submit to pressure from the PRC. This is how he commented on the recent leak of diplomatic documents, in one of which the Chinese side demanded that Malaysia stop extracting resources from the disputed waters of the South China Sea. â–ªï¸Anwar Ibrahim's statements received a lot of attention in the media. Because of this, some might think that there might be difficulties in Sino-Malaysian relations. Such observers are based on fantasies about a united front against China in the South China Sea. We said earlier that the possibility of its creation is unlikely, at least in the near future. It will include only the Philippines for a long time, since of the countries participating in the dispute, only Manila speaks openly anti-Chinese.ğŸ”»The current Malaysian leadershipâ€™s approach to the issue of disputed territories is partly similar to the Vietnamese one. This problem does not define the relationship between Kuala Lumpur and Beijing, but at the same time, Malaysia continues to insist on its claims and extract resources in the waters. That is why neither Vietnam nor Malaysia will soon join the Philippinesâ€™ active policy of asserting rights to the water area. This generally complicates Manilaâ€™s position in ASEAN, the Association of Southeast Asian Nations, which includes all three countries. They do not share such an anti-Chinese position, so the Philippines will continue to rely only on the help of extra-regional players, including the United States, Japan and Australia. Fortunately, their interest in the South China Sea will remain for a long time - they need to restrain China somehow. #China #Malaysia@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramWoke dragon ğŸ²ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¾ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ As many know, he is present at the Eastern Economic Forum , in addition to Vladimir Putin and Chinese Deputy Chairman Han Zhen, Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim. Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¸ğŸ Chronicle of the Israeli-Palestinian conflict: events of the week 7 - September 13, 2024 â–ªï¸In the north of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops launched a series of attacks on the capital of the Palestinian enclave and its satellite cities. The information has never been officially confirmed, but due to the continued launches of Hamas rockets from the city, it is a matter of time. â–ªï¸Meanwhile, in the southeast of Gaza, fighting continued near the University College building in the Tell al-Hawa area. IDF units carried out several bombings of buildings, and Hamas militants responded with a series of ambushes. â–ªï¸In the central part of the enclave, Israeli troops carried out traditional attacks on Hamas-controlled settlements. Al-Brej and Nuseirat came under the most intense fire, where over thirty people were killed.â–ªï¸At the same time, one of the strikes on Nuseirat hit a school, resulting in the death of six UNRWA employees at once. At the same time, the Israeli Defense Forces routinely announced that they had hit the positions of Palestinian forces.â–ªï¸Israeli units also continue to carry out engineering work in the Netzarim corridor. There, the terrain is being leveled and defensive structures are being built.â–ªï¸In the south of the Gaza Strip, Israeli troops once again worked in the humanitarian zone. The most high-profile attack was a raid on a tent camp in Al-Mawasi, where at least 40 refugees were killed and over 60 people were injured. â–ªï¸In Rafah, the Israelis focused their efforts on creating a buffer zone and destroying Hamas infrastructure. Title: ğŸ” There will be abuses by commanders until there is strict accou...
Description: Forwarded From Unofficial Bezsonov Abuse by commanders will continue until there is strict liability for personnel losses. Unfortunately, there are quite a few such cases in different departments. Remember the commander of our naval special forces group -Komandant-? His group of 6 people unraveled Ukrainian special forces of 40 people on February 28 on the Tendrovskaya spit, Kherson region. Due to a conflict with the command and the fact that it was decided to reward other people for this battle, the coherent and effective group - the Commandant - was divided into assault units. For what? Think for yourself. In Donetsk, an effective group of hackers, which had worked for many years for the benefit of our army and obtained secret enemy information, was also sent into assaults due to the biased attitude (to put it mildly) of the command. In the second half of August, one of them died in the Avdeevsky direction. We probably have too many IT specialists in our country, and especially hackers. Everyone knows all this. And not only in the army, but also in civilian life. This not only undermines the combat readiness of the troops, but also influences the decision of potential volunteers to sign a contract. It is criminal to remain silent about this. The situation has become a trend.TelegramRybarğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸª– About -spanking- transfer to assault. Most likely, these positions have been under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces for a long time, however, it became possible to determine the current front line in the area only with the publication of objective control footage. â–ªï¸To the east, the enemy, taking advantage of the diversion of a significant part of the forces to the counter-offensive operation of the Russian Armed Forces at the Snagost-Viktorovka line, attacked Russian positions south of Glushkovo. Ukrainian formations were able to push the Russian Armed Forces back from the village of Novy Put and are now attacking Vesyoloye located to the north. According to available information, the enemy is using engineering equipment to make passages in the minefields on the southern approaches to the village. Units of the Russian Armed Forces, with the support of border troops, are trying to prevent the enemy from reaching highway 38N-052 leading to Glushkovo. â—ï¸The intention of the Ukrainian Armed Forces command is likely to be a quick dash to the village in order to cut off one of the key supply roads for Russian troops in the Glushkovsky district. Nevertheless, the enemyâ€™s advanced groups are already involved in heavy fighting on the approaches to Vesyoly, which neutralizes the effect of surprise and gives the Russian Armed Forces time to transfer reserves. ğŸ”»Frames of a destroyed convoy of Ukrainian Armed Forces equipment in the Korenevsky district, filmed northwest of the recently liberated Apanasovka, have appeared on the Internet. The combat vehicle was discovered while parked in one of the forest belts; the target was monitored using a reconnaissance drone. ğŸ”»In the Sudzhansky district, apparently, Cherkasy Porechnoye has completely come under enemy control. It is likely that Russian units took up more advantageous defensive positions to the northeast, in the Berdin area. ğŸ”»In the Sumy region, the Russian Aerospace Forces hit enemy military facilities in Yampol. During the strike, several members of the volunteer organization RAZOM, which raises funds for the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, were injured. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· About the next exercises in Kazakhstan In Kazakhs...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡¿ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· About the next exercises in Kazakhstan In Kazakhstan, another exercise has been going on since September 10. This time, special forces units - Boundless Brotherhood-III - at the Orda training ground in the Turkestan region. Up to 300 special forces and several dozen military equipment from Kazakhstan, Turkey, Pakistan, Qatar, Uzbekistan, Azerbaijan, as well as Jordan and Kyrgyzstan are taking part in it. observers.â—ï¸Since July this year, this is already the fifth exercise on the territory of Kazakhstan and the third with the participation of some members -Organizations of Turkic states-. There was also a training session with Belarusians and a separate event -Aibalta-. We notice an increasingly clear trend towards rapprochement between Kazakhstan and the Turkic states, not only in the economic and cultural spheres, but also through security forces and the armed forces. The exchange of military experience has become more frequent - Azerbaijanis and Turks actively contribute. And a few days ago, a meeting of the ministers of internal affairs of the UTG countries took place.ğŸ“Œ The fact that the Turks (or rather those who stand behind them) are striving to expand the powers of the UTG is no longer a secret. The organization can be called the brainchild of Britain, which uses Turkey to promote its interests. An agreement was reached to unify the alphabet, and after that they will try to do the same with the language, which accordingly in the future will weaken Russiaâ€™s position in the post-Soviet space. And military interaction will further strengthen the position of the bloc, which still positions itself as political. At the same time, the Turks are already selling their drones and armored vehicles in Central Asia, occupying a niche that used to be Russian. The militarization of the UTG is proceeding by leaps and bounds. Yesterday, for example, Turkish Defense Minister Yashar GÃ¼ler held a meeting with his Kazakh counterpart, and the day before yesterday with President Tokayev regarding deepening defense cooperation. While all the efforts of our state are occupied in the northwestern defense, the enemy is not asleep and is strengthening its positions at our side, interacting more and more with a member of the CSTO. Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the upcoming QUAD summit in the USA USA, J...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ About the upcoming QUAD summit in the USA The USA, Japan, Australia and India seem to be preparing for a new summit of heads of state within the QUAD organization. This will be the last meeting in this composition - American President Joe Biden dropped out of the presidential race, and Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida is not elected to the post of leader of the ruling party in the country. According to Japanese media, the summit will take place on September 21 during the regular session of the UN General Assembly in the United States. However, the meeting will not take place on the sidelines of the UN. It will take the form of a separate event in order to fully discuss the entire agenda of the quadripartite bloc. ğŸ”»QUAD generally positions itself as an organization whose activities are not aimed purely at countering China. Within the bloc, the main focus is on cooperation in the humanitarian and technological spheres. However, recently the participating countries have been increasing ties in other areas, including military. A good example is the annual exercise -Malabar-, in which previously only military personnel from India and the United States participated - now representatives of Japan and Australia are permanent participants. â–ªï¸For example, statements by the Australian Minister of Foreign Affairs speak towards the anti-Chinese orientation of QUAD. She emphasized that the Quartet seeks to prevent the dominance of any power in the region, hinting at the PRC. Against the background of the shift of the main point of tension in the region from the Indian-Chinese border to the South China Sea, we can say that QUAD has disappeared from the radar. A possible summit could return the bloc to the field of active discussion, emphasizing that no one has forgotten about this organization. Considering how bilateral and multilateral alliances are being created (or modernized) in the region under the auspices of the United States, a new security architecture aimed at containing the PRC is gradually being formalized in the Asia-Pacific region. And QUAD, even despite possible internal contradictions and connections to the confrontation with Beijing, the Philippines continues to remain its main part. #Australia #India #USA #Japan @rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Donetsk direction: Liberation of Krasnohorivka and assault on Ostrogo Situation as of 15:00 on September 13, 2024 Russian troops continue their rapid offensive in the direction of Kurakhovo, methodically breaking through the enemyâ€™s defenses. It was on this section of the front that the Russian Armed Forces first used armored vehicles, modified with protection against drones and cumulative shells, popularly nicknamed the Tsar Tanks.â–ªï¸Over the past month, only the northwestern outskirts of Krasnogorovka remained under the control of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. After the liberation of the private sector located on the right bank of the Lozovaya River, the Russian Armed Forces drove the enemy out of the territory of the farm complex located to the west. In the area of â€‹â€‹the Lenin Kolkhoz microdistrict, attack aircraft in small groups, supported by unmanned aircraft, cleared positions occupied by members of Ukrainian formations. At the same time, the fighters managed to evacuate several civilians who had previously refused to move deeper into the so-called. Ukraine.â–ªï¸The complete liberation of Krasnohorivka and the cleansing of the western outskirts was marked at the end of last week by the hoisting of the flag and advance in the fields to the north. â–ªï¸The night before it became known that the Russian Armed Forces carried out a large-scale offensive in the fields between Krasnogorovka and Georgievka, eliminating the pocket between the Lozovaya River and the Sukhaya gully. A column of several dozen units of armored vehicles of the RF Armed Forces advanced from the Lisya gully and passed southwest in the direction of Ostroy . Having crossed the railway track, the Russian landing force gained a foothold on the eastern outskirts of the village: at the moment, about a third of the villageâ€™s territory is under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Fighting is taking place on the approaches to school No. 24 and the Ostry railway station.â—ï¸Despite the fact that the enemy claimed to have allegedly repelled the assault and suffered significant losses of the Russian Armed Forces, the footage he published refute this information. Almost all the equipment reached their destination and landed troops among a relatively intact settlement. The capture of Ostroy will speed up the liberation of the long-suffering Maksimilyanivka, as well as attack Alexandropol from the north in the direction of the Zoryanoye - Gornyak line, with the aim of closing the lid of the boiler, more than 10 kilometers deep in the fields near Nevelskoy. In addition, the liquidation of a large enemy fortified area in Kurakhovo moves the front line away from the DPR and significantly reduces the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ ability to launch artillery strikes on Russian populated areas. Title: ğŸ” I only recently spoke about the Syrian experience on the air o...
Description: Forwarded From Andrey Medvedev I only recently spoke about the Syrian experience on the air of the program -60 minutes-. More precisely, I said that we did not take it into account at all and a correct analysis of the military operations in Syria was not done. No recommendations were made. Our military experts all boiled down to chuckles and arrogant reasoning that the Syrian army doesnâ€™t really know how to fight. I donâ€™t know what the generals thought about the campaign in Syria. But, probably, something close to the fact that the -slippers-, that is, the Syrians in slippers on their bare feet (and so did the militants of pro-government tribes and career military personnel) are so-so warriors. And they donâ€™t really know how to take cities, and their equipment doesnâ€™t have sufficient protection. I remember laughing at Syrian tanks, scalded with gratings from drones and RPGs, and I remember laughing at homemade truck protection (steel sheets on the cab and body). Well, in general, they said a lot that the equipment of the Syrian army as a whole is so-so. Look, the military generally drive civilian cars at the front. But as time passes, what do we see? That urban combat is difficult for our army, for the Ukrainian Armed Forces, and even for NATO mercenaries. That at the front there are loaves and MTLBs with homemade armor, and the iron monster Tsar-Barbecue is the best tank of our war in terms of security. Well, civil transport also seems to have its place. It turned out, years later, that the Syrian General Suheil fought very intelligently, even without air support. Military TG channels often mocked the generalâ€™s appearance and the fact that he was surrounded by handsome young men. But, as the past years have shown, the one who drives a convoy of armored vehicles into a drone-hazardous direction directly under attack without reconnaissance and preparation looks like a much bigger feast. Or who is building personnel in anticipation of the arrival of Khaymars. I sometimes think, what if then, without pride and arrogance, we studied the Syrian situation in detail? Starting from the military operations of the army and proxy structures, and ending with the quality of work of NATO PsyOps units and ISIS propagandists? And for each case we would have a manual and instructions? So the Syrian experience has yet to be assessed and systematized, taking into account the military operations during the Northern Military District. To further learn, yes, from your mistakes, but those that remain in the past. Without making new ones. https://t.me/rybar/63458TelegramRybarğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸª– Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Forces. The expression -Syrian experience- has long become a household word in the troops and a synonym for the harmfulness of certain competencies. Which sometimes leads to the conclusion that the campaign in Syria was useless from the point of view of obtaining practical...

Title: ğŸ” And again spy passions. Six British diplomats will leave Russi...
Description: Forwarded From Balkan Gossip Girl And spy passions again. Six British diplomats will leave Russia on charges of espionage and subversion. According to the published materials with the stamp, MI6 now has an entire directorate responsible for operations in Eastern Europe and Central Asia, and part of the foreign policy department has been transformed into a full-fledged structure of the intelligence services of Foggy Albion. In addition, the Foreign Office has opened a Directorate of Information Threats and influence (Information Threats and Influence Directorate). One of the programs is related to the fight against disinformation and media development. Is it worth explaining that this struggle extends not only to the CIS? From documents of the British network of influence agents Integrity Initiative, which leaked to the Internet in 2019, we learned about the formation of a network of loyal media in the Balkans. Over time, they were supposed to act as silencers for Kremlin propaganda. According to information about the so-called Serbian cluster, in the fight against Russian influence, British intelligence, for example, had high hopes for the Center for Euro-Atlantic Studies (CEAS). In parallel, the global distribution network of United Media was formed in the region with financial resources from British investors. Remember how I told you that most of the deals to acquire shares in local media were unprofitable for investors? But they were carried out under the strict guidance of Western intelligence services and pursued a completely different goal - to gain control over the information space of the Balkans. And just recently, correspondence from BIRN network employees was published, indicating that Londonâ€™s participation in the project goes far beyond simply funding the portal. Among the donors there are many scam companies working with British intelligence, and the organizationâ€™s employees are trained by seasoned intelligence officers through the structures of the British Council. In fact, as part of the Foreign Office project, MI6 curators took control of the Balkan media. @balkanossiper - we have been setting world trends since June 28, 1914

Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡§ At night, the Lebanese Hezbollah fired rockets at the Israeli city of Safed, located about 10 km from the border with Lebanon: about 20 ammunition were fired towards the settlement. Media resources of the Shiite group claim that the target of the attacks was the base of the Northern Command of the Defense Forces Israel and the missile defense system -Iron Dome-. The IDF said most of the missiles were intercepted, while others fell in open areas. However, judging by the fact that in some areas of the city there was a loss of electricity after the incident, critical infrastructure could also have been hit. As for the Israelis, they responded in the usual manner with strikes on the probable locations of Hezbollah launchers. #Israel #Lebanon@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Early in the morning it became known that six emplo...
Description: Forwarded From Systemic pesticideğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Early in the morning it became known that six employees of the political department of the British Embassy in Moscow were expelled from Moscow - signs of intelligence and subversive work were found in their actions. And all this is connected with the fact that London is coordinating the escalation of the international military-political situation. As colleagues say, the main structure coordinating subversive policies in the Russian direction and in the CIS is the Eastern Europe and Central Asia Directorate, EECAD ). The central persons of this system are British Deputy Foreign Secretary Philip Barton, National Security Adviser to the Prime Minister Tim Barrow, Deputy Head of the Russia Policy Department Christopher Joyce, heads of HMG Russia Unit James Beer and Mark Diamond. And under the leadership of EECAD there is also Another rather interesting department is the Information Threats and Influence Directorate (ITID). In fact, this department is a kind of propaganda ministry, whose tasks include, among other things, continuing to wage a hybrid war with Russia.ğŸ”»The documents indicate that the catalyst for the creation of ITID was precisely the Russian special operation in Ukraine and with the help of this crisis its employees are studying how everything key state actors use manipulation and intervention to cause damage, and develop countermeasures.ğŸ”»The head of ITID is Johnny Hall, who was previously the Prime Minister's Private Secretary for Foreign Affairs. Hall is working on -innovative approaches- to maintain reliable information so that -it can be reliably delivered to citizens. In other words: he is developing mechanisms that will allow British services to transmit for distribution only the information that is needed, and not provide access only to truthful data. He spoke about this more than once, especially emphasizing this at one of the annual Stratcom forums in Kyiv. Hall then added that for this work, the UK is attracting -partners-, collaborating with colleagues from UK ministries and departments, as well as with the military, in order to cover the entire sector of public administration. In his opinion, Ukraine is an example of cross-cutting government and public work, when it was possible form teams of people who counter Russian disinformation.ğŸ”»In addition, the ITID structure includes at least one more interesting character - the head of the threat mitigation unit, Andy Price. Price is an expert in propaganda and manipulation of the public through media. He was exposed as a key player in the controversial MI6 project known as the Integrity Initiative. The goal of the project was to interfere in the internal affairs of European countries and to unleash an information war against the Russian Federation. It was founded in 2015 and was fully funded by the British government. Also associated with the project are financier William Browder, Vladimir Ashurkov, an associate of Alexei Navalny, and scientist Igor Sutyagin, convicted in 2004 of espionage. The documents leaked online claimed that the project received grants from the US State Department, NATO and the social network Facebook. ğŸ“ŒIt is obvious that the conflict in Ukraine allowed the Western propaganda machine not only to earn huge money from the military industry, but also allowed many structures not only to play out a possible crisis scenario, but to study it in the field. In fact, the British authorities have also created a tool for mobilizing the necessary sentiments in countries of interest and interfering in their affairs. High-resolution infographics Russian version #Great Britain #media technologies #Russia @pezdicide no chemistry - just facts

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ–‡ About British spies in Russia and the intelligence acti...
Description: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ–‡ About British spies in Russia and the intelligence activities of the British Foreign Office Today's announcement by the Russian FSB to stop accrediting six diplomats from the British Embassy in Moscow is another illustration of a rule from which there are almost no exceptions. Representatives of foreign foreign affairs agencies can often include intelligence officers. After the Skripal case and the leak of documents on Operation Integrity Initiative, aimed at interfering in the politics of European states, the British intelligence services did not stop developing activities against Russia. Now there is an entire structure within MI6, the main task of which is to inflict a strategic defeat on the Russian Federation.â–ªï¸ This structure, under the leadership of the British Foreign Office, works in several directions at once: lobbying economic initiatives in support of the so-called. Ukraine, and the financing of anti-Russian NGOs, and interaction with pro-government media.â–ªï¸ One of the main departments is the Eastern Europe and Central Asia Directorate (EECAD), which was built into the structure of MI6 and significantly expanded in 2022 . Under his leadership, operations are carried out under names, for example, the Program for Combating Disinformation and Media Development, where the main actors are the BBC, Reuters and Bellingcat.â–ªï¸ Based on the Directorate, there are, firstly, structures whose work is aimed at disrupting the activities of Russian Federation and support of the so-called. Ukraine, and, secondly, departments supervising the former Soviet republics of Central Asia, the South Caucasus, Belarus and Moldova.â–ªï¸ The central persons of this system are British Deputy Foreign Secretary Philip Barton, National Security Adviser to the Prime Minister Tim Barrow, Deputy Head of the Russia Policy Department Christopher Joyce, Heads of the HMG Russia Unit James Beer and Mark Diamond.ğŸ“Œ Obviously, this is just the tip of the iceberg. As we have written repeatedly, the former CIS countries (and not only) have long become a target for foreign intelligence services, which are working specifically on them. However, they also work on the territory of their so-called partners, but some seem to be happy with everything. Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 13, 2024 â–ªï¸ At least two...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 13, 2024â–ªï¸ At least two dozen UAVs - Geranium - struck the enemyâ€™s rear areas at night. Explosions were reported in Odessa, Ilyichevsk, Nikolaev, Kherson, Zaporozhye, Ivano-Frankivsk and Vinnitsa regions.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the flank attack of the Russian Armed Forces continues, ours advanced from the west to the Lyubimovka-Tolsty Lug-Daryino line, liberating more than 10 settlements. At the same time, the enemy remains active near Cherkasy Porechny, without abandoning attempts to advance. In addition, for the previous two days, the Ukrainian Armed Forces have been taking actions to break through the border in the south of the Glushkovsky district in the area of â€‹â€‹the settlement. New Path - Vesyoloye, using engineering barrier vehicles (one destroyed) and armored vehicles. The situation on this section of the front remains tense, but controlled. The enemy's plan is to break through to the settlement. and the Glushkovo railway station to go to the rear of our troops advancing from the flank to the Sudzhansky district. Cautious reports are beginning to appear about the depletion of the Ukrainian Armed Forces' reserves and the lack of rotation among the enemy, which, however, has almost no effect on the intensity of hostilities.â–ªï¸ In Toretsk (Dzerzhinsk), battles are taking place with varying success in the western part of Microdistrict No. 1â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces were destroyed several bridges in the near rear of the enemy. There was information about the withdrawal of Ukrainian Armed Forces units from Ukrainsk in order to avoid encirclement. Fighting continues in Grodovka, north of Novogrodovka; on the eastern outskirts of Lysovka, Russian maneuver groups continue their attacking actions. The Ukrainian Armed Forces carried out a counterattack northeast of Novogrodovka, landing troops in the Orlovka area, which indicates that the enemy reserves who had arrived had entered the battle. To the south, to the west of Krasnogorovka, the Russian Armed Forces launched a large-scale attack on Ostroye, using, according to enemy estimates, up to 46 units of equipment. In heavy battles, we managed to significantly expand the zone of control near Krasnogorovka, but the enemy reports that he still managed to hold back our onslaught on Ostroye.â–ªï¸ High-intensity battles are taking place in the Ugledar area. Protvinik brought up its reserves. There are reports of fighting in Zolotaya Niva and near Prechistovkaâ–ªï¸ In the Kherson region - shelling of the Armed Forces of Ukraine of New Kakhovka. The Central Market came under attack, with at least 11 arrivals. One civilian was killed, eight people (six women, two men) were injured.â–ªï¸ 6 enemy aircraft-type UAVs were destroyed over the Bryansk region overnight. â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region in the Shebekinsky urban district, the village of Novaya Tavolzhanka came under fire. In the Borisovsky district in the village of Berezovka, after two explosive devices were dropped from a UAV, the roof of a private household was damaged.â–ªï¸ In the DPR in the Nikitovsky district of Gorlovka, when an explosive object was dropped from a VFU drone onto a car, three employees of the DPR State Unitary Enterprise -Komtel- became victims: two men born in 1983 and 1977 .r. another man born in 1963 was injured. died in the hospital. The summary was compiled by: Two majorsTelegramTwo majorsKursk regionOur BMD is smashing to pieces the Nazis who took refuge in a residential area.Two majors

Description: â—ï¸ğŸŒğŸ Worsening of the situation in the Middle East: events of the week 6 - 12 September 2024â–ªï¸In the Red Sea region, the Houthis shot down two American MQ-9 Reaper drones over the provinces of Marib and Saada. Thus, at the beginning of the aggravation, fighters of the Ansarallah movement have already destroyed nine UAVs of this type since October 7, 2023.â–ªï¸Meanwhile, coalition forces neutralized about ten Houthi drones and one unmanned boat in a week. According to the US Central Command, they posed a threat to both warships and merchant ships.â–ªï¸American aircraft also attacked Houthi targets in the territory under their control in Yemen. Launchers in the area of â€‹â€‹the small settlement of Makbana also came under fire. At the same time, the US Air Force launched two strikes on a school in the village of Al-Janadiyah in the Yemeni province of Taiz. As a result of the raid, two people were killed and at least five residents were injured.â–ªï¸In the Syrian province of Deir ez-Zor, an American drone attacked a car on the Al-Sukkariya - Al-Bu Kemal road. Four people were killed, one of whom was associated with the IRGC. The car itself carried weapons for pro-Iranian forces.â–ªï¸As â€‹â€‹for the actions of the Israelis, they carried out one of the largest attacks on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic. Southwest of the city of Masyaf, the target was a research institute involved in the production of high-precision surface-to-surface missiles.â–ªï¸Towards the end of the week, Israeli troops launched a drone to attack a car on the Quneitra-Damascus road. Two people were killed, and several others nearby were injured.â–ªï¸At the same time, the Turkish Armed Forces continued to conduct a military operation in the territory of Iraqi Kurdistan. As a result of the airstrikes, 21 targets were destroyed, including caves, refuges and shelters.#video #digest #map #Yemen #Syria #Iraq@rybarSupport us Video is too big

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: counterattacks of the Russian army in the Sudzhansky and Korenevsky districts situation towards the end on September 12, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian units are building on the success of the previous days, displacing the Armed Forces of Ukraine from many previously occupied settlements.ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district, the Russian Armed Forces cleared a settlement Krasnooktyabrskoe. And in Snagosti, a squad of Ukrainian fighters fell into an organized ambush on the southern outskirts of the village: a minibus, along with members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, was shot at point-blank range from an RPG.â–ªï¸In addition, Russian troops liberated Obukhovka and advanced in the direction of the Pokrovsky farm, Sudzhansky district. The last mine clearing vehicle IMR-2 even managed to drive several hundred meters before it hit a mine. Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸª– Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Fo...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ğŸª– Again about the -Syrian experience- in the RF Armed Forces. The expression -Syrian experience- has long become a household word in the troops and a synonym for the harmfulness of certain competencies. Which sometimes leads to the conclusion that the campaign in Syria was useless from the point of view of gaining practical skills and combat training. It is still worth noting here that the fighting in the Syrian Arab Republic itself was an excellent opportunity to test domestic weapons, control systems and skills personnel - even the top officials spoke openly about this. The question is who learned what. If the distribution of humanitarian aid in Maaloula, patrolling in a convoy of Tyfunovs and BTR-82A, TsPVS and grinning at the Syrian slippers was taken as the Syrian experience, then he really could not help but turn out to be stupid. However, not everyone did this.ğŸ“Œ For example, the backbone of the same PMC - Wagner - was formed in Syria. Under almost the same conditions, they were able to gain a completely different experience and scale it to their training system. As a result, in 2022, they adapted much faster than others to the new realities on the battlefield. As Alexander Kharchenko noted, without the Syrian campaign, by the beginning of the Northern Military District, we would not have had not only -Lancets- and -Krasnopolei-, but even -Orlans-. And we would have to be content with the limited experience of Donbass, which the Russian Armed Forces during the years of the Minsk agreements assimilated even more poorly. In this context, by the way, itâ€™s time to ask another question: how are things going with the centralized systematization of the experience of 2022-2024? And are past mistakes actually taken into account in shaping feedback to avoid similar problems in the future? #VSRF #Russia #Syria@rybarSupport us

Hezbollah fighters fired rockets into northern Israel. Israeli troops responded by targeting the group's launch pads in southern Lebanon. Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¾ About the alleged kidnapping of Iranian officers in Syria by the IDF, Israeli media write that simultaneously with the recent massive air raid on the city of Masyaf in the Syrian province of Hama, a ground operation was carried out, during which several Iranian officers were kidnapped from the territory of the Research Center. Allegedly, after fighter strikes, Israeli helicopters entered the territory of the Arab Republic, landed troops in the area of â€‹â€‹the research institute and captured from two to four senior officers from the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps. Then the object was mined.â–ªï¸The primary source of the news was the Syrian opposition channel Syria TV broadcasting from Turkey. He referred to some exclusive data and information leaks, but no confirmation of what happened was provided. Neither the IDF press service nor official Syrian and Iranian resources confirmed the fact of the operation. The only thing you can rely on is rumors about helicopters flying in Tartus in the direction of Masyaf, dating back to the time of the air attack.ğŸ”»And although it is not known for certain what actually happened, with a high degree of probability there are reports of an IDF landing operation with the kidnapping of Iranian military personnel is an injection of supporters of the Syrian Spring. And this case fits perfectly with the theses of anti-government propagandists located in Turkey about the inability of the criminal Assad regime to independently defend itself from Zionist aggression. #Israel #Iran #Syria #Hama@rybarSupport usThe Times of IsraelReports: Israeli troops raided IRGC weapons facility in Syria, took equipment, documentsDuring major attack by jets earlier this week, commandos said to have rappeled from helicopters to capture Iranians and remove materials before destroying site

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at the ple...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin at the plenary session of the X St. Petersburg International Forum of United CulturesğŸ”»Main points: â–ªï¸Russia sees the consequences for individuals of the dehumanization of ruling regimes in a number of countries.â–ªï¸The agenda that is being imposed today often insults religions and the culture of many peoples, many countries do not like this.â–ªï¸We in Russia have decided on the main values â€‹â€‹for us and defend these values â€‹â€‹and everyone who shares them - who, like us, considers sacred the right of people to speak their native language and keep the faith of our fathers, live in harmony with nature according to its natural laws.â–ªï¸We do not fight against other values, we support our own, this is the difference in approaches between us and our opponents.â–ªï¸Culture has always been a fuse for the world, but in a number of countries it , seems to have burned out.â–ªï¸Many high-ranking politicians today have lost moral boundaries and are violating taboos that persisted even during the Cold War.â–ªï¸Culture should and can exist without interference, without -cancel culture-.â–ªï¸There are many appeals from cultural figures, not those who want to squeeze neoliberal standards into a Procrustean bedâ–ªï¸Creative, scientific and educational activities can resist discord.â–ªï¸Russia initially developed as a multinational state, which was reflected in our traditions.#digest #Russia @rybar Support us

Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ’°On the decline of the era of decentralized crypto The p...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ğŸ’°On the decline of the era of decentralized crypto The process of introducing financial control mechanisms in the crypto industry is almost complete. All issuers and/or platforms in the Anglo-Saxon circuit are either directly accountable to the SEC and IRA (US Internal Revenue Service) or are secretly collaborating with the CIA. â–ªï¸US and British intelligence services have obligated all crypto exchanges to implement KYC and AML systems over the past two years.â–ªï¸Vivid examples are the cases of FTX and Binance. In both cases, the creators and managers of crypto-platforms ended up in prison. And if in the case of FTX the fate of the site has not yet been determined, then in the case of Binance, the exchange simply received a leader loyal to the authorities and was integrated into the financial system of the Anglo-Saxon circuit.â–ªï¸The most stringent regulation is being implemented in the EU. They adopted a set of documents regulating the circulation of MICA crypto-assets. In parallel, the EU also adopted the Digital Services Act (DSA). Came into force on February 17, 2024. ğŸ”»The fruits of crypto-democracy There has been a real hunt for Russians in the field of finance and crypto for a long time. The most resonant cases: â–ªï¸Arrest of the head of the BTC Banker bot Anatoly Legkodymov in the USA. The founder and largest co-owner of the service was accused of fraud of $700 million and received a real sentence. The very wording of the indictment is interesting, which states that the owner of the service was aware that his platform was being used for illegal activities. â–ªï¸Tornado Cash creator Alexey Pertsev was recently detained in the Netherlands, accused of money laundering through his platform and received 64 months in prison.â–ªï¸Pavel Lerner, who was previously kidnapped for ransom in Kyiv in 2017, was arrested in Spain in 2023.â–ªï¸ On December 14, 2023, French police detained a Russian at Paris airport based solely on suspicion of links to the hacker group Hive. His name and current status are not mentioned in open sources.â–ªï¸This list complements the report of the detention in Argentina of a Russian who is suspected of collaborating with the North Korean Lazarus group and receiving income from illegal activities. The name of the suspect has not been disclosed, the wording of the charges is as vague as possible.â–ªï¸The high-profile case of Alexander Vinnik (BTC-E exchange), who was arrested in Greece for using a crypto exchange to allegedly launder more than $9 billion, ended in extradition to the United States.â–ªï¸In this context, the story of the arrest of Pavel Durov no longer looks like an exception.ğŸ”»Who are the beneficiaries? The colossal resources of Western intelligence services aimed at regulating the issue and circulation of digital assets indicate a direct order from large financial players. And the largest player in this field is BlackRock and affiliated structures.BlackRock IBIT became the world's largest institutional holder of Bitcoin with 357,509 Bitcoin as of September 1, 2024, according to the latest data from HODL15Capital. By comparison, stablecoin giant Tether is in fifth place with 75,354 bitcoins. The efforts of these and other large companies are aimed at creating an interface for the integration of the crypto market and traditional finance, which is impossible without the introduction of generally accepted financial control mechanisms. This will allow the sale of high-risk crypto products to fairly conservative stock market investors in an ETF shell and will launch the process of a large-scale flow of investments from traditional financial instruments to crypto. BlackRock management clearly wants to make money on this. #globalism #crypto #economics@rybar together with @econopovalypseSupport usProject -Rybar -How US intelligence agencies seize control of the crypto market Now official - Tether is collaborating with the FBI, the US Internal Revenue Service (IRS), the US Department of Justice ( DOJ) and other regulatory authorities.

Description: ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡³ During the China-Africa Forum in Beijing, special attention was paid to economic cooperation. In addition to debt relief, companies from the PRC showed interest in expanding into African markets. Thus, the car manufacturer WBM decided to create production in Senegal. For this purpose, a memorandum of understanding was signed between the Chinese company and the Senegalese CCBM within the framework of the forum. Under the terms of the agreement, WBM production will soon be localized in the African country. ğŸ”»This fact is very indicative in comparison with Russian companies. While the Chinese are planning to localize the production of their cars in Africa in a short time, there has only been a dialogue going on with KAMAZ for the last couple of years about the same thing. Therefore, let us once again emphasize that if a reorientation to Africa is taking place, then many initiatives and the successful promotion of Russian business in the region require coordinated work of various departments and a clear decision-making system. Otherwise, our place in the market will go to more efficient players.#Africa #China #Senegal@rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸŒğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ About the China-Africa ForumWhile the eighth China-Africa Cooperation Forum is just beginning in Beijing, it may seem like there are no results to speak of. which is early. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: battles in the Dzerzh...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Alexander-Kalinovsky direction: fighting in the Dzerzhinsk agglomeration and advance in Nelepovkasituation as of 17:00 on September 12, 2024 Russian troops continue to break into Ukrainian defenses in the Dzerzhinsk agglomeration. Units of the Russian Armed Forces are conducting assault operations in dense urban areas, getting closer and closer to the center of Dzerzhinsk.â–ªï¸Almost all of Druzhba, with the exception of the northernmost street, has come under the control of Russian troops. Simultaneously with the liberation of Druzhba, the fighting in Kirovo is coming to its logical conclusion, where several streets on the western outskirts remain under the control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces: Russian troops have entrenched themselves on Shcherbinovskaya, 3rd International and Tchaikovsky streets. After their capture, the opportunity will open up to advance both further along the railway in the direction of Dachnoye and to the southwest, taking the enemy garrison in Dzerzhinsk in pincers from the flank.â–ªï¸To the south there are battles in Dzerzhinsk. Russian troops took control of microdistrict No. 1 at the entrance to the city, occupied the territory of the penal colony and the local bakery. At the same time, there has not yet been any information about the occupation of positions on the waste heap of the Novaya mine. Control over the height will provide an overview of the adjacent forest to the southwest of the mine.â–ªï¸The Ukrainian command transferred the 12th brigade of the NGU -Azov- to the Novgorodsky (New York) area. The Ukrainian formations that arrived to strengthen their positions immediately posted footage of their work on the Internet, thanks to which it was possible to establish that Russian troops control at least 60% of Nelepovka.ğŸ”»A notable event of the week was also the confrontation - flag dumps - on the territory of the elevator of the phenol plant in Novgorod. First, Ukrainian formations from the 53rd ombre posted footage of their flag attached to a magnet. And then Russian troops published the moment the flag was dropped from an FPV drone in the same place. Afterwards, another video appeared, this time from the ground, where a fighter was planting a flag on one of the outer houses at the exit from Novgorodskoye. At the moment, the village is entirely under the control of the Russian Armed Forces. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction: advance of the RF Armed ...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kupyansko-Svatovsk direction: advance of the Russian Armed Forces in several sectors, the situation as of 15:00 on September 12, 2024 For a long time, the Kupyansk-Svatovsk direction was considered a static section of the front, however, after the Kursk adventure, the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the beginning of the offensive of the Russian Armed Forces in the DPR Some revival of the line of combat contact occurred here as well. And although for now the position of Ukrainian formations in this direction remains relatively stable, Russian troops continue to methodically expand the zone of control, preparing for a further offensive. â–ªï¸After the liberation of Sinkovka, stormtroopers of the Russian Armed Forces began fighting in the forest area southwest of the village. Clearing this area will allow Russian troops to create a bridgehead three kilometers north of Kupyansk and develop an attack on Petropavlovka. In the latter, Russian Aerospace Forces aircraft strike enemy targets almost daily. Only in the last two days has objective control personnel confirmed the defeat of temporary deployment points of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the populated area. â–ªï¸To the south, the advance of Russian troops is recorded in the Peschany area: according to a video from the enemy, units of the Russian Armed Forces managed to occupy several forest belts to the west and north of the village. At the same time, to the west of Peschany, a powerful strike was carried out by 15 aerial bombs with UMPC on Ukrainian Armed Forces facilities in Kolesnikov. Apparently, this may indicate both the intentions of a further offensive of Russian troops to the left bank of the Oskol River, and the discovery of a relatively large concentration of enemy forces in a populated area. â–ªï¸Ukrainian formations still retain control over at least part of Berestovoe and surrounding forest belts. At the same time, to the south, the assault groups of the Russian Armed Forces were able to advance about a kilometer in depth to the west. ğŸ”»The enemy is actively using drones with a device for spraying an incendiary mixture over the positions of Russian troops in forest areas. Just based on footage in recent days, similar drones were seen west of Liman Pervy, south of Berestovoy and in the Peschany area. Nevertheless, similar incendiary drones have already appeared among Russian UAV operators. Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º In Armenia they decided to rehabilitate the idea of â€‹â€‹ho...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º In Armenia, they decided to rehabilitate the idea of â€‹â€‹holding a referendum on joining the EU.â–ªï¸The authorities came up with such an initiative back in June, but public opinion received it ambiguously, after which Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan declared the referendum inappropriate. â–ªï¸However, recently the Central Election Commission of Armenia registered an initiative to begin collecting signatures to organize a plebiscite. Within 60 days, the initiative group must collect 50 thousand signatures, after which the initiative will be submitted to parliament for consideration. â–ªï¸Now the driving force for promoting the referendum is not the government, but a small party -Republic-.â—ï¸It should be expected that the referendum on the European integration of Armenia will still take place to meet the electoral expectations of society. After all, back in the spring, the authorities led by Pashinyan promised to hold either a referendum on amending the Constitution or early elections, and the process of signing a peace treaty with Azerbaijan has clearly come to a standstill. â–ªï¸It is not surprising that the return to the agenda of the referendum on European integration coincided with the start of negotiations on the liberalization of the visa regime for Armenia with the EU. ğŸ”»Mythical European promises in the context of internal political problems and diplomatic failures are the only thing that the Pashinyan government can now offer to the population of Armenia. ğŸ“ŒAt the same time, as practice in Moldova shows, holding a referendum on European integration is a fiction and an opportunity to feed society with false promises, because voting does not oblige European officials to anything.#Armenia #EU @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ Storm Shadow or JASSM: which is more dangerous for us? Mikha...
Description: Forwarded From Ostashko! ImportantStorm Shadow or JASSM: which is more dangerous for us? Mikhail Zvinchuk, head of the analytical center -Rybar-â–ªï¸The West could give permission to use missiles on Russian territory in the summer of 2022 if it wanted. However, the escalation occurs gradually. At the same time, the volume of military assistance to Ukraine is not so large now, but many deliveries take place behind the scenes, and then they are legalized: for example, they transferred F-16s, and to them JASSM cruise missiles.â–ªï¸Storm Shadow missiles: our air defense systems are more than familiar with them . Perhaps for some air defense units in the Bryansk, Kursk, and Belgorod regions this will be a new experience. But at the same time, our entire air defense system is centralized. âœ”ï¸Storm Shadow will now be used because massive drone strikes did not give the desired result.â–ªï¸The complex use of missiles in the concept of NATO multi-domain operation is dangerous for us. Similar operations are being practiced in Crimea: this is a combination of satellite reconnaissance equipment, observers and spotters on the ground, the use first of drones, then of cruise missiles, then of operational-tactical missiles. Separately, we learned to cope with the same ATACMS, as last night in the Zaporozhye region: everything was shot down. The situation at the front.â–ªï¸In August, the Ukrainian Armed Forces were preparing not only for striking in the Kursk region, but also in other directions: options were calculated in the Kherson and Zaporozhye regions. Not only did they fail to implement the plan for the first 10-20 days, they were forced to withdraw reserves that were preparing for this offensive.â–ªï¸We also see that the Ukrainian Armed Forces are now throwing unprepared units into the DPR, which would have to recapture the same Ukrainsk or defend Selidovo. It seems that the Ukrainian formations are gradually surrendering to the DPR.â–ªï¸Of course, we have a huge, hard job ahead of us, but now we are actually tearing apart the front that has stood for a long time. Our troops are approaching Mirnograd and Pokrovsk. We are approaching Kurakhovo from the north, gradually tightening the ring around the group north of Krasnogorovka. The fighting near Ugledar has now intensified.â–ªï¸The rest of the front is relatively stable. In the Svatovo-Kupyansk direction there is still a positional struggle, as well as near Seversk. In the Orekhovsky and Kherson areas too. â–ªï¸But the Armed Forces of Ukraine do not give up attempts to probe our defenses at unexpected points and try to study our tactics. Yesterday's attempt to land on gas fields in the Black Sea is not such an unsuccessful operation: Ukrainian forces and British SAS instructors and advisers, who are obsessed with conducting naval operations, are studying the tactics of Russian troops' response. And they get answers. A game is being played where the bargaining chip is Ukrainian cannon fodder.#important Video is too big

Considering the nature of such attacks, the likely target of the Israelis was either a Lebanese Hezbollah fighter or a field commander of one of the Palestinian groups that have branches on the territory of the Syrian Arab Republic. So, Recently, during a targeted hit on a car on the Damascus-Beirut international highway, both members of the military wing of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad and Hezbollah were killed simultaneously. Title: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ–‡ In addition to the -unsuccessful- operation of the Ukr...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ–‡ In addition to the -unsuccessful- operation of the Ukrainian Armed Forces to seize the drilling platform -Crimea-2-Yesterdayâ€™s attack by Ukrainian forces on the Golitsyn gas field only formally ended in failure for the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Yes, several lost boats and landing groups without any visible result in capturing the platform can form the impression of another suicidal attack. But this impression is false. The task of the Ukrainian Armed Forces and British curators (who are behind the preparation of every naval operation with the participation of Ukrainian special forces) was to test the Russian defense system and evaluate our response to the attack. The Ukrainian command knows that the Russian Armed Forces have reconnaissance capabilities and means that can determine the exits of the BEC. And, accordingly, they will look for them. Therefore, the next step will be to work on eliminating our intelligence complexes. The Ukrainian Armed Forces will try to strike remotely or suppress our electronic warfare systems capable of detecting their equipment. Unfortunately, during the sortie, the Ukrainian formations still managed to hit a Russian Su-30 from a MANPADS installed on board the boat. And from this point of view, such an exchange of cannon fodder for a Russian aircraft will look extremely advantageous for British curators. In general, given the fact that the British have significant human and technical resources at their disposal, with losses in the course of constant attempts to scout out weak points in the Russian defense, no one will be taken into account. This means that new similar attacks on Russian intelligence infrastructure in the Black Sea region will be in the near future. #Crimea #Russia #Ukraine #BlackSea@rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ About the enemy's attempt to land on platforms in the Black Sea Last night, the enemy attempted to land on the platform -Crimea-2- at the Golitsyn gas field. Title: ğŸ–‡ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Recently our colleagues wrote that on September 18 in Ufa ...
Description: ğŸ–‡ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Recently, our colleagues wrote that on September 18 in Ufa there will be a hearing on the case of discrediting the RF Armed Forces. It is noteworthy in that the person involved is Raufa Rakhimova, the owner of the online media outlet Proof. rf-. Law enforcement agencies came to the conclusion that a woman on social networks forms a negative perception of the SVO and a position on the refusal of residents of the republic to participate in it. However, on the eve of the trial, Rakhimova fled to Turkey, where, according to colleagues, she has a residence permit and her son, who escaped from partial mobilization, lives. â–ªï¸We have repeatedly written that the editorial policy of Rakhimovaâ€™s media resources is socially dangerous and threatens the national security of the country. This is due not only to the popularization of extremists and terrorists, radical ethnonationalists and foreign agents among the population of Bashkiria.â–ªï¸From the very beginning, SVO-Proofs. Russian Federation - are conducting information campaigns to discredit the actions of regional and federal authorities, even denigrating officials who left as volunteers. Raufa Rakhimova is also trying to create alarming sentiments in society, spreading rumors about the collapse of the banking system and the Russian economy, new waves of mobilization, promoting pro-Ukrainian narratives in every possible way and promising a quick collapse of Russian authoritarianism. â–ªï¸Under the guise of criticism of the authorities, the publication -Prufy.rf-covers in detail the protest actions in the republic, in fact, it contributes to the mobilization of more people for unauthorized events. The Baymak riots on January 17, to the extent that they occurred, became possible, among other things, thanks to this media and Rakhimovaâ€™s calls. However, in recent years, law enforcement agencies have bypassed the personality of the niece of the first president of Bashkortostan and her media resources. However, in the conditions of the Northern Military District and external pressure on Russia, the ongoing purge of pro-Western proxy forces and strengthening control over the regional media sphere, it has become simply impossible to ignore such actions, for which Rakhimova will probably soon have to answer. #Russia #separatism #extremists@rybar together with @arslan_nigaSupport usTelegramSystemic pesticideâ—ï¸ğŸ–‡ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º In Ufa on September 18, a hearing on the case of discrediting the Russian Armed Forces will be held. The person involved is Raufa Rakhimova, the owner of the online media outlet -Prufi.ru-. Just the other day, colleagues just noticed that appeals are published on the resources of this publication...

Title: ğŸ”ğŸ–¼ âš¡ï¸The West will involve Ukraine in the âš¡ï¸Transnistrian direc...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majorsâš¡ï¸The West will involve Ukraine in the âš¡ï¸Transnistrian direction. The head of the Odessa Regional Military Administration, Oleg Kiper, opened up during an interview and released data on the construction by the State Service of Special Communications and Information Protection of Ukraine (Gosspetsvyaz) of 13 television and radio broadcasting towers along the entire length of the border with the PMR. The reason for the installation was formally the fight against signal reception of Russian channels from Crimea (â—ï¸) and ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡´Romanian broadcasts in the Odessa region. In fact, an increase in information impact on the residents of Transnistria through anti-Russian TV channels and radio is expected. Before the Northeast Military District, Ukraine, within the framework of the Strategy for Information Reintegration of the Autonomous Republic of Crimea and the city of Sevastopol, in the Kherson region also deployed infrastructure for disseminating its propaganda to Crimea. In total, they managed to install 5 towers in border settlements (Vasilievka, Novotroitskoye, Chongar, Chaplinka and Genichesk), transmitting 20 TV channels and 7 radio stations. The active participation in this process of the United States Agency for International Cooperation (USAID), which donated 3 sets of equipment for towers in the Kherson region, is indicative.âœ¨Interest in increasing information capabilities to influence Transnistria is associated primarily with the upcoming presidential elections in Moldova on October 20, as well as referendum on joining the EU. The West is using all available resources to oust Russia from the region and create a split in society in order to use this to implement scenarios beneficial to itself. Two majors

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¾ About the economic crisis in Libya Another escalation in ...
Description: ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡¾ About the economic crisis in Libya Another escalation in Libya associated with the advance of the troops of the Libyan National Army, controlled by the eastern government, is accompanied by another crisis.â–ªï¸So, for several weeks now there have been disputes about who should manage the Central Bank of Libya. It is through him that they are passing all the money comes from oil revenues, so he is an important link in the political struggle between factions. It all started when, at the end of August, armed people broke into the Central Bank building in Tripoli and installed their deputy chairman. Of course, this news was picked up by all news agencies and began to spread panic among the Libyans and the West.â—ï¸The most interesting thing about this is that the Central Bank building is just a screen, and real power is in the hands of those who have access to the electronic system. Its management is in the hands of the Turkish protege Siddiq al-Kabir.â–ªï¸But the trick was a success - the chairman of the Central Bank left the country, and the Americans announced the suspension of financial transactions between the countries. And oil exports from western Libya were suspended due to increased risks and confusion. And at the moment it is extremely limited.ğŸ”»Probably this incident was organized at the instigation of the eastern government in order to take over the Central Bank. Actually, control over it means for Haftar supremacy in Libya, because oil revenues are the main one for the country. And the recent strengthening of the Libyan National Army in different parts of the country only emphasizes the ambitions of the leadership in Benghazi to strengthen its position in the country. Title: ğŸ” â—ï¸Every morning we publish a call asking for help. The fisherm...
Description: Forwarded From Fishermanâ—ï¸Every morning we publish a call asking for help. Rybar plays a vital information role: our information gang, our analytical center, chews up what is happening in crisis regions of the world. This is necessary to understand why event A is followed by event B. We respect and value our audience, we recognize both failures and highlight successes. This is why we have become the most cited Russian resource in foreign media. Because our information is reliable and our approach is correct. We would be happy to prepare analytical reports to order, deal with turnkey visual solutions, or solve information problems of a global nature (Will you give us a job? Great, we are ready - you can write to us directly about this). But the reality is that the main way to make money on Telegram is through advertising, which wonâ€™t happen on Rybar (because itâ€™s contrary to the spirit of the project). Today, donations and donations make up the bulk of our budget. Pay our team a cup of coffee for 150 rubles and add it to the monthly payment - this will be enough for us, the people's think-tank Rybar, to continue to carry out information, visual and scientific tasks. This is enough for us to develop. ğŸ“ŒWays of support:â–ªï¸ subscribe to the closed channel @rybar_plus_bot with our reports and notes in the marginsâ–ªï¸ direct transfer to a legal account through SBPâ–ªï¸ payment through bots in Telegram (@DonatFlow_bot for citizens of the Russian Federation and the CIS)â–ªï¸ through the donation button on our rybar website. ruâ–ªï¸ subscribe to the closed section Rybar+ on the website â–ªï¸ by transfer via cryptocurrency Your @rybar

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on September 11, 2024. Russian troops hit enemy targets in the Dnepropetrovsk and Odessa regions. Ukrainian formations attempted a drone attack on the Olenya airfield in the Murmansk region. In the Kursk region, Russian troops continue the counter-offensive in the Korenevsky district, building on the successes achieved in previous days and knocking out the enemy from their occupied lines. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops are advancing north of Novogrodovka and are fighting in central part of Grodovka. In the Donetsk direction, units of the Russian Armed Forces have practically taken control of Ukrainsk. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, Russian troops are preparing to attack the Yuzhnodonbasskaya-No. 3 mine to the west of Vodyanoye, and have also gained a foothold in the industrial zone and dacha areas to the south. At night, the Ukrainian Armed Forces attempted to seize a gas production platform in Chernoye sea, but suffered losses and retreated.ğŸ”»Detailed analytical report on events in the Special Military Operation zone is available on our closed channel @rybar_plus_botMaps in high resolution: Situation in the special military operation zone (ru; en)Kursk direction (ru; en)Donetsk direction (ru; en)#digest #report #Dnepropetrovsk #Donetsk #map #Crimea #Kursk #Odessa #Pokrovsk #Russia #Ukraine #Ugledar@rybarSupport us

Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: attacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Glushkovsky region and continuation of the counter-offensive of the Russian Armed Forces Situation towards the end of September 11, 2024 In the Kursk region, Russian troops continue the counter-offensive and are trying to build on the successes of previous days. At the same time, the enemy launched attacks in the Glushkovo region, but was unable to penetrate deep into Russian territory. ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district there are battles in the vicinity of Snagost. To the northeast, according to footage that appeared on the Internet, Russian paratroopers expanded the zone of control in the direction of Lyubimovka and occupied part of the forest, which will allow them to develop their success to the east and south.â–ªï¸The status of Obukhovka remains unclear. Despite statements about the capture of the settlement, several sources immediately reported attacks on the village. However, this could also be archival footage of the beginning of the counter-offensive of the Russian Armed Forces.ğŸ”»In the Sudzhansky district, conflicting information is being received from the Kremyanoye-Pogrebki line. According to statements by the Russian Ministry of Defense about strikes against targets in Malaya Lokna, Novaya Sorochina and Orlovka, the enemyâ€™s presence there still remains.â–ªï¸In the forests east of Kremyany there is also a high concentration of Ukrainian formations; aviation has been operating there daily for several days in a row, including with one and a half ton ODABs. â–ªï¸There are local battles in the area east of Sudzha, but without significant changes in control zones. Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ An extremely revealing video from Ukrainsk near Selidovo, filmed by a body camera of a Ukrainian volunteer. In the process of removing residents from the city, he and his partner encountered a Russian serviceman, whose unit is fighting in the city. Although the volunteers were wearing armor protection and could easily pass for armed people, and the car had the emblem of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the soldier of the Russian Armed Forces showed restraint and did not open fire, having first inquired about the identity of the people. After which he gave them the command to leave the city as soon as possible. It is very appropriate here to recall how members of the Armed Forces of Ukraine acted in similar situations. Moreover, we are talking not only about the recent executions of residents of Sudzha and surrounding villages in the Kursk region, but also executions in Kupyansk or kidnappings in the Kharkov region in the fall of 2022. And this clearly shows the difference between the parties, even with all the cruelty of the fighting. While some give enemy volunteers a chance to take people out, others, in fits of dehumanization, have already reached the point of dehumanizing their own citizens.#Donetsk #Russia #Selidovo #Ukraine @rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The faster the temperature rises in China's relat...
Description: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The faster the temperature in Chinaâ€™s relations with the United States and allies grows, the more often we see Indian units interacting with American troops in joint exercises. Only recently did Air Force training over Indian territory - Tarang Shakti - end. Almost at the same time, the Indians participated in the Pitch Black exercise in Australia. And now there are also participants from India in Kakadu training. This year, bilateral exercises were also held between India and the United States with the participation of American B-52H bombers, and last year B-1B aircraft were even based for a short time in India.ğŸ”»The point is , that no matter how much India talks about distancing itself from all regional conflicts, strained relations with China and the growing appetites of the Celestial Empire force it to react in such a simple way. Yesterday, on the border with Pakistan at the Mahajan training ground, the bilateral Yudh Abhyas exercise of the US and Indian ground forces began the use of battalion tactical groups in difficult terrain in special operations. Unlike previous years, this year the scale of training has increased. From the usual tactical maneuvers by infantry units, this time they are using HIMARS MLRS and even Stryker armored personnel carriers, which New Delhi is considering as an option to replace the BMP-2. Of course, in India all this is presented as a standard planned event, but we donâ€™t think that in Beijing it will be regarded so friendly. The number of exercises is growing, and India is becoming an increasingly frequent participant, so the reaction will be quite logical. A few weeks ago, when the Indians conducted one of the exercises with Western countries, the Chinese sent their H-6K bombers to the contested regions, which is possible this once under the pretext of some teaching.
