Title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the results of the presidential debates in the United ...
Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ About the results of the presidential debates in the United States At night, Moscow time, the long-awaited debate took place between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Neither candidate won a landslide victory - Trump defended himself well, without resorting to personal insults to his opponent, and Harris limited herself to populist statements and attacks, without making serious mistakes. However, the scales, contrary to statements from the local press, still swung in the direction Trump: Harris' allies in Congress admitted she was -weaker on the economy.- At the same time, they noted that the ex-president performed poorly on issues related to women's issues.â–ªï¸The discussion about abortion was indeed the most tense moment of the debate for Trump - Harris accused him of seeking to establish government control over the female body. However, Trump fought back well, declaring that the Democrats are executioners of children whom they plan to allow to be killed even in the 9th month of pregnancy, and compared this to a capital punishment sentence.â–ªï¸After the end of the event, the media sympathetic to the Democrats, for lack of anything else, latched on to the allegedly false statement Trump that Haitian immigrants in Springfield, Ohio are eating pets out of poverty. However, facts confirming this quickly spread on social network X.â–ªï¸ On the issue of foreign policy and in particular the conflict on the so-called. The parties did not say anything new to Ukraine - Trump spoke in favor of speedy negotiations, and Harris made it clear to everyone that she and her party would continue to advocate war until the last Ukrainian. â–ªï¸As a result of the debate, the press launched a massive information campaign to support Harris: CNN and The Washington Post gave her victory, and to enhance the media effect, the Democrats even brought up heavy artillery - singer Taylor Swift published a post in which she supported Trumpâ€™s opponent. At the same time, there is simply no significant evidence of Harrisâ€™s triumph, and the arguments in favor of this look like an attempt to -pull an owl onto the globe.- Ultimately, there is a completely reasonable explanation for the behavior of the Democrats - there is no one else to replace Kamala with, so until November they will have to work with what they have. So, an intense struggle between the candidates is guaranteed in the foreseeable future, since the honeymoon of Harris has approached end - judging by the latest polls, Donald Trump is again on the heels of the Democrats. #USA@rybar together with @usaperiodicalSupport usTelegramAmerican numberğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ™Judging by inside information, in Congress, Harris' party members consider her performance -normal-, however, they admit that she - was weaker in economic matters. Now figures with dubious experience have headed entire departments that are destroying Armenian sovereignty. An attempt to -solve- the language issue is a traditional practice of Western agents in the post-Soviet space to sever cultural ties between the former Soviet republics and Russia. Title: ğŸ” #Summary for the morning of September 11, 2024 â–ªï¸ In the Kursk...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors #Summary for the morning of September 11, 2024â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the Russian Army began counter-offensive actions on the western flank of the enemyâ€™s penetration, reducing the zone of control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces at the State Border. Units of the 51st Parachute Regiment, 155th Marine Brigade, with the support of aviation and artillery, successfully advanced near the village. Gordeevka, Vnezapnoe, Viktorovka, Byakhovo, Snagosti, Apanasovki, there were battles for Viktorovka. At the same time, the enemy remained active during the day in the Sudzhansky district, where there were oncoming battles near Cherkasskaya Konopelka, Kamyshevka, Maryevka and Borok.â–ªï¸ In the Toretsky (Dzerzhinsky direction), the Russian Armed Forces continue offensive operations in Toretsk itself and the settlement. Kirovo (Pivnichnoe).â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the offensive of the Russian Army continues; in Grodovka, our troops planted a flag over the Grodovsky kindergarten and continue assault operations along Kazatskaya Street. The Russian Armed Forces are bypassing Ukrainsk from the north, the enemy is forced to transfer elite units (1st Presidential Operational Brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine) in an attempt to stabilize the front.â–ªï¸ In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, in honor of the capture of Krasnogorovka and Vodyanoy, the Russian Defense Minister sent congratulations to the 5th Separate Motorized Rifle Brigade brigade and 7 separate guards motorized rifle brigade, respectively. â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region, the Armed Forces of Ukraine, using a UAV, attacked a private house in the village of Novaya Tavolzhanka, Shebekinsky urban district. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation for Septemb...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on September 10, 2024. Russian troops launched a series of UAV and missile attacks on various targets in enemy-controlled territory. The targets were military facilities and repair facilities of Ukrainian formations. The enemy again launched about one and a half hundred UAVs across the territory of the Russian Federation. Air defense systems intercepted 144 UAVs in eight regions; one civilian was killed and three civilians were injured in Ramenskoye. In the Kursk region, Russian troops launched a local counteroffensive in the Korenevsky district, starting battles in several settlements and, according to preliminary information, liberating Gordeevka and Vnezapnoye. In the Artemovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces advanced west of Zheleznodorozhny (Zaliznyansky), knocking out the enemy from several forest belts east of the M-03 (E40) highway. In the Aleksandro-Kalinovsky direction, Russian attack aircraft liberated another part of Kirovo (Pivnichny) and advanced on the eastern outskirts of Dzerzhinsk (Toretsk). The successes of the Russian Armed Forces are also recorded in the Yuzhnodonetsk direction. In the Georgievka-Victory section, several forest belts and at least one strong point in a dried-up reservoir came under the control of Russian troops. On the border of the Glushkovsky and Korenevsky districts, units of the 155th Marine Brigade and the 51st Guards Parachute The airborne regiment launched a counteroffensive at the Gordeevka - Snagost line. â–ªï¸To the north of the latter, Russian paratroopers made significant progress, taking control of the approaches to the village and entering its territory. Title: ğŸ”ğŸ¬ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ A local stand-up comedy came into the field of view of ...
Description: Forwarded From Operational reportsâ—ï¸ Nizhny Novgorod law enforcement officers came to the attention of a local stand-up comedian and blogger, Dima Gavrilov, who, frightened by mobilization, fled to Georgia for a long time. There he blabbed a lot of unnecessary things, pleasing the Tbilisi local audience with Russophobic jokes (see the clip of his -jokes-). After a while, Dmitry, by the way, a reserve officer of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, decided to return to touring Russia. During this process, the keen eye of the Nizhny Novgorod law enforcement agencies did not ignore the creativity of the fellow countryman. Further according to the classics - detention and repentance for sins, cancellation of the tour. On September 8, Gavrilov wanted to hold a whole concert at the concert venue -DKRT-. But alas, before the concert the comedian was detained and by a court decision found guilty of committing an administrative offense under Art. 20.3.1 Code of Administrative Offenses of the Russian Federation. He was sentenced to 13 days of administrative arrest. From now on, he and his colleagues will think about what is acceptable to joke about and what is unacceptable! Unfortunately, many such broadcasters and bloggers are replacing freedom of expression with permissiveness! Now Dima personally has 13 days to think about a new repertoire.ğŸ¯ @opersvodki

Title: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ On the future of relations between Japan and South Korea...
Description: ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ On the future of relations between Japan and South Korea Last week, Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida held his 12th meeting with South Korean President Yoon Seok Yeol. Negotiations between the leaders were probably the last - the fact is that at the end of September in Japan there will be elections for the leader of the ruling Liberal Democratic Party, in which Kishida is not taking part. At the meeting, grandiloquent statements were made about the importance of further development of relations between Tokyo and Seoul. Let us recall that the rapprochement of the countries began under pressure from Washington in March 2023 and not without enthusiasm on the part of the South Korean leader. The future of bilateral ties now remains unknown due to the elections in Japan. However, most likely, the change in the Japanese leader will not lead to a setback in relations. The development of ties with Seoul fits the main foreign policy priorities of the United States and Japan, which includes developing a response to the North Korean threat. Of course, if the post of Japanese Prime Minister is taken by a more conservative politician, relations between Tokyo and Seoul may be shaken. However, given the South Korean president's flexibility when it comes to Japan's past, the two sides are likely to find an option to further develop ties. Moreover, for Yun, the restoration of relations with Tokyo is almost the most important foreign policy achievement, which his administration will not simply abandon. #Republic of Korea #Japan@rybar with @awaken_dragonSupport us ReutersJapan PM Kishida seeks to solidify South Korea ties on farewell visitJapanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida arrived for a whirlwind visit to South Korea on Friday, seeking to seal a newfound partnership between the neighbors which will be tested by imminent changes of leaders in Tokyo and Washington.

Earlier, one of the leaders of the Israeli opposition, Benny Gantz, said that it is time for Israel to shift attention from the Gaza Strip to southern Lebanon, since the lack of a ceasefire agreement and the return of the hostages makes war with Iran-backed Hezbollah inevitable. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Look at the commotion around the US missile syste...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ You look at the commotion around the US missile systems that they are going to deploy in Japan, and you realize that it all looks familiar. The Americans act according to the manual, artificially escalating tension, and then, under the pretext of countering the next threat, they develop territories. In South Korea, in Japan, in the Philippines, everything followed the same scenario. And we are now seeing a similar situation in Australia, where the number of exercises is growing exponentially, and new military facilities are being built throughout the continent. The day before yesterday, for example, the Australians began a major exercise - Kakadu - in the waters of the Timor and Arafura seas near the Darwin naval base , and 28 countries participate in it, and in total about 3 thousand people, 15 ships and 30 airplanes and helicopters are involved. The main emphasis is on establishing interaction between sailors of different countries in the event of a crisis situation in the region. Participants will conduct firing training, patrolling as part of a group of ships and boats, as well as joint reconnaissance of a given area.ğŸ“Œ As you already understand from the attention paid to the Green Continent, the importance of Australia will only grow. Its considerable distance from China makes the country extremely convenient for creating a logistics chain through Australia in the event of a conflict with China. At the same time, if we recall the same experience of the US allies in the region, then in the coming years various types of American missile systems will probably reach Australia . Of course, under the pretext of containing the Celestial Empire. High resolution mapEnglish version#Australia #China #USA@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ On the deployment of American medium-range missiles in Japan A couple of days ago, US Secretary of the Army Christine Warmuth announced Washingtonâ€™s intentions to deploy a Typhon missile launcher in Japan, capable of launching medium-range missiles. It is not yet clear when such plans will be implemented - what is clear is that American equipment will arrive on Japanese territory as part of the exercises. These are the first such statements about the deployment of missiles in Japan made by leading US officials. Back in April, we assumed that Typhon would arrive in the region, but then the choice fell on the Philippines. Obviously, the United States now wants to test the missile launcher under different conditions. ğŸ”»A couple of important points remain unclear, the details of which we will most likely find out after some time. Firstly, at least the approximate location of the missile system is unknown. If it is deployed on the territory of Okinawa, the missiles will be able to reach the eastern part of China and almost the entire territory of the DPRK. If placed further north, the radius may also include the territory of the Russian Far East. Secondly, will Typhon be removed from Philippine territory. Yes, the system is due to go home after the completion of the Salaknib exercise evaluation in September. However, back in the summer, the Philippine authorities gave themselves some room to maneuver, mentioning that Typhon could remain in the future if necessary. Moreover, recently there have been some hints that the withdrawal of the missile system will depend on Chinaâ€™s behavior in the South China Sea. Given the situation in the region, the scenario of further deployment of Typhon in the Philippines is very likely. And then the PRC will be surrounded on both sides, which could lead to even greater tension in the Asia-Pacific region.#USA #Japan@rybar together with @awaken_dragonSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µğŸ‡µğŸ‡­ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ This year, the situation in the Asia-Pacific region risks becoming even more tense - the United States plans to deploy missile systems in the region that are capable of launching medium-range Tomahawk missiles, as well as SM-6 missiles. What is worth paying attention to in the context of settlements with the Sahel countries is Russian assistance in the transition from the CFA franc (which is issued in France) to other money or alternative instruments for settlements. The Ministry of Digital Development could very well get involved in this. In addition, it is quite possible to reach an agreement on transactions in local currencies. This topic has been raised before, but has not received proper development. We can only hope that our African projects, which are still in their infancy, will soon be able to experience the results of coordinated work and not drown in bureaucracy. #Africa #Russia@rybarSupport usKommersant -We do not ask for self-love, but if a business is ready to work, we do not turn away from anyone -Director of the Economic Service of the Russian Foreign Ministry on business with companies from unfriendly countries and key currencies in the Russian trade basket
